 Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

title: Umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika agiye kwemerera abagabo bafite abagore kuba abapadiri
content: Papa Francis, yemeye ko habaho ibiganiro ku guha abagabo bafite abagore n’abana uburenganzira bwo kuba abapadiri.

title: Kigali:Abanyarwanda bagiye kongera gutaramana na Alarm Ministries.
content: Kuri icyi cyumweru taliki ya 22/10/2017 kuva ku isaha ya saa munani (14:00),abantu bose barasabwa kuzitabira igitaramo cyateguwe na Alarm Ministries,aho izaba iramya ndetse igashimira Imana ku mirimo n’ibitangaza yakoze kizabera ku gisozi kuri Dove Hotel . Bamwe mu bari gutegura icyi gitaramo bavuga ko intego nyamukuru y’icyi gitaramo izaba ari ukuramya no guhimbaza Imana no gufata amashusho azakoreshwa muri  alubumu yabo nshya ya cumi bari gutegura ndetse benda no gushyira ahagaragara mu minsi ya vuba. Muri icyi gitaramo hazaba hari n’amwe mu matsinda akomeye mu Rwanda nka:      -Healing Worship team,      -true promises Ministries,      -New Melody Worship team,      -Gisubizo Ministries.

title: Bishop Tom Rwagasana wo muri ADEPR  yarekuwe
content:
Bishop Tom Rwagasana wahoze ari Umuvugizi wungirije ushinzwe ubuzima bw’itorero rya ADEPR Urukiko rukuru rwafashe umwanzuro wo kurekura by’agateganyo. akurikiranywe ho  ibyaha byo kunyereza umutungo .  Mu kwiregura, Tom Rwagasana yakunze kuvuga ko kuba yaragiye asinya ku masheki yari abifitiye ububasha, ahubwo agasaba ko abahabwaga ayo mafaranga babazwa icyo bayakoresheje kuko we yasinyaga ibyateguwe n’abandi babishinzwe. Umuvugizi w’Inkiko, Itamwa Emmanuel yavuze ko Bishop Rwagasana yarekuwe by’agateganyo kubera ikibazo cy’uburwayi. Ati “Nibyo, Urukiko Rukuru ejo rwafashe icyemezo cyo kumurekura by’agateganyo. Ubushinjacyaha bwari bwasabye ko akomeza gufungwa, bwari bwasabye ko icyemezo kimufunga by’agateganyo cyongerwa. Ariko bigeze mu Rukiko Rukuru barabiburana noneho n’ubushinjacyaha busaba ko yaba afunguwe by’agateganyo kuko ararwaye cyane.”
 “Urukiko Rukuru rwamwemereye ko afungurwa by’agateganyo ariko rugira ibyo rumutegeka agomba kubahirirza nko kujya yitaba ubushinjacyaha buri cyumweru, gutanga pasiporo ye n’ibindi. Bisobanuke ko atagizwe umwere ahubwo ari uko afunguwe by’agateganyo agakurikiranwa ari hanze.”
 Yanditswe na Chief Editor/Muhabura.rw

title: Kiliziya Gatolika irifuza ko ingengabihe y’amashuri ihinduka, umwaka ukajya utangira muri Nzeri
content:
Kiliziya Gatolika yasabye Leta y’u Rwanda guhindura ingengabihe y’amashuri ku buryo yakongera kujya atangira muri Nzeri, ikavuga ko byarushaho gufasha abanyeshuri mu myigire yabo. Hashize imyaka isaga 10 imiterere y’ingengabihe y’amashuri mu Rwanda isaba ko abanyeshuri batangira umwaka muri Mutarama ugasozwa mu Ugushyingo mu gihe mbere watangiraga muri Nzeri ugasozwa muri Kamena. Ubwo Kiliziya Gatolika yasozaga icyumweru cyahariwe uburezi kuri uyu wa 16 Kamena 2017 muri Paruwasi ya Zaza, Umushumba wa Diyoseze ya Gikongoro, Hakizimana Célestin yatanze ubutumwa mu izina ry’Umushumba w’iya Butare Ushinzwe uburezi Gatolika mu Rwanda, Phillipe Rukamba, avuga ko abanyeshuri babangamiwe no kuba biga mu mpeshyi. Yagize ati “Nagira ngo ngire icyo nisabira umushyitsi Mukuru (Uwari uhagarariye Minisitiri w’Uburezi), mu rwego rwo kunoza imikoranire myiza isanzwe iranga Leta na Kiliziya mu burezi, ndahera ku ngengabihe y’umwaka w’amashuri; hashize igihe twifuza ko umwaka w’amashuri wajya utangira mu kwezi kwa cyenda, ukarangira mu kwezi kwa Gatandatu.” Mu mpamvu batanga harimo kuba abanyeshuri biga mu gihe cy’izuba bikagira ingaruka ku myigire yabo. Ati “Impamvu ni nyinshi ariko cyane cyane ni igihe cy’izuba n’ibura ry’amazi tuzi twese ko biremerera abana bacu baba ku mashuri mu kwezi kwa munani, hakiyongeraho na gahunda zinyuranye ziba ziri muri ayo mezi mu rwego rwa Kiliziya no mu buzima mbonezamubano, bibangamira cyane abarezi baba bagomba kuzitabira.” Kugeza ubu amashuri abanza n’ayisumbuye mu Rwanda agera ku 3189, muri ayo yose, agera ku 1381 angana na 43,3% ni aya Kiliziya Gatolika. Mu banyeshuri hafi miliyoni eshatu biga mu mashuri abanza n’ayisumbuye, abagera kuri 1.175.369 barererwa mu ya Kiliziya Gatolika. Ibyo kandi biza byongera ku kuba Kiliziya Gatolika ifatwa n’uruhongore rw’intiti nyinshi ziri mu Rwanda ndetse byatumye Umuyobozi Mukuru wungirije w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Uburezi REB, Dr Michel Rwibasira, ashima uburezi n’Uburere Kiliziya ikomeje guha umwana w’Umunyarwanda avuga ko n’ibyo Kiliziya yasabye bazabyigana ubushishozi n’abo bireba bigakemuka. Yagize ati “ Kuba byagira ishingiro ni uko wabihuza n’izindi mpamvu zose, hari izuba noneho hari no kureba ibihugu biri mu karere ka Afurika y’Iburasirazuba. Tubihinduye tugomba kwiga tukareba ingaruka byagira abanyeshuri bava hanze batugana, baramutse basanze bitandukanye.” Yongeyeho ati “ Iyo ukemura ikibazo giterwa n’impamvu imwe byakoroha, tumaze iminsi natwe tubiganiraho ariko turashaka ngo tubanze duhuze n’impamvu nyinshi zirimo n’iyo y’abanyeshuri kugira ngo dufate umwanzuro. Bifite ishingiro ariko kugira ngo tubifataho umwanzuro bikenera ko dufata n’izindi mpamvu zirimo izo nababwiye kugira ngo nyuma tuzafate ukwiriye abanyeshuri, ukwiriye u Rwanda ariko ukwiriye n’abarezi.” Icyumweru cyahariwe uburezi Gatolika cyasorejwe mu Karere ka Ngoma, mu Ntara y’Uburasirazuba, muri Paruwasi ya Zaza, Diyoseze ya Kibungo. Cyari gifite insanganyamatsiko igira iti “ Nk’abakirisitu mu Ntangiriro ya Kiliziya, Ishuri ryacu turigire igicumbi cy’Ubumwe n’Ubufatanye.” Kugeza ubu muri iyo diyoseze, habarirwa ibigo by’amashuri 102, birimo amashuri abanza 36, amashuri yisumbuye y’uburezi bw’ibanze bw’imyaka icyenda na 12 agera kuri 56, ikagira n’amashuri 10 acumbikira abanyeshuri. Kwizihiza icyo cyumweru byari bibaye ku nshuro ya cyenda kuko byatangiye mu 2008. 
Yanditswe na Chief Editor/MUHABURA.rw

title: Abahoze ari abayobozi ba ADEPR urukiko Rukuru rwashimangiye ko    bafungwa
content: Urukiko Rukuru rwashimangiye umwanzuro uherutse gufatwa n’Urukiko Rwisumbuye rwa Gasabo wo gufunga by’agateganyo abayobozi b’Itorero rya Pentekote mu Rwanda, ADEPR, bakurikiranyweho ibyaha byo kunyereza umutungo w’itorero

title: Abayobozi b’amadini biyemeje gufatanya n’Ubuyobozi guhangana n’amakimbirane ndetse n’ibihuha
content:
Abayobozi b’amadini n’amatorero akorera mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba biyemeje kongera imbaraga bafatanyije n’ubuyobozi bw’Inzego z’ibanze n’izindi nzego mu guhangana n’ibyaha bigaragara hirya no hino muri iyi Ntara cyane cyane amakimbirane mu miryango, ibiyobyabwenge ndetse na bamwe mu biyita abahanuzi bakwirakwiza ibihuha mu baturage.. Ibi byagarutsweho mu nama nyunguranabitekerezo yahuje Ubuyobozi bw’Intara y’Iburasirazuba, Abayobozi b’amadini n’amatorero akorera muri iyi ntara, Inzego z’umutekano n’Abayobozi b’Uturere kuri uyu wa mbere tariki ya 29 Gicurasi 2017 hagamijwe kungurana ibitekerezo ku mikoranire y’amadini n’inzego z’ibanze, n’uruhare rwamadini mu guteza imbere abaturage. Guverineri Kazaire Judith uyobora iyi Ntara yabwiye abitabiriye ko Amadini afite uruhare rufatika mu iterambere ry’abaturage, abasaba kongera imbaraga mu kwegera abaturage bagafatanya na Leta mu gukangurira abaturage guhangana n’amakimbiran mu miryango, ibiyobyabwenge usanga cyan cyane byinjira biturutse  kubona muri iyi minsi hagaragara ibyaha byiinshi bishingiye ku makimbirane mu miryango, abitwaza amadini bakayobya abaturage, bitwaje ubuhanuzi bw’ibinyoma,  iyi nama ko yatumijwe

 Inzego zifite aho zihurira n’umutekano nazo zari zitabiriye iyi nama 
Umuyobozi wa Polisi mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba ACP Rutaganira Dismas yagaragaje ko muri rusange Umutekano mu Ntara y’’Iburazuba ariko ko ibyaha birimo amakimbirane mu ngo, ibiyobyabwenge, gukubita no gukomeretsa bikomeza kuza ku isonga mu bihungabanya umutekano. umuyobozi wa Peace Plan(Ihuriro ry’amatorero n’amadini rigamije amahoro) ku rwego rw’igihugu Musenyeri Birindabagabo Alexis avuga ko amadini afite uruhare rufatika mu kurwanya ibyaha uko abayarwanda benshi bafite amadini babarizwamo kuburyo umuyobozi w’idini agiye yigisha abayoboke kurwanya ibyaha byatanga umusaruro ufatika. Ku kibazo cy’ibihuha yagize ati  "Abahanuzi b’ibinyoma bakurwaho n’abahanuzi b’ukuri kandi aba ni bacye, ubuhanuzi bw’ibinyoma nitwe ba mbere dukwiye kuburwanya tugatangaza ubuhanuzi bw’ukuri kuko birahari, icyo twe dukwiye gukora ni ukugira ubufatanye tukamenya abantu bahanura ibyo binyoma natwe tukabanyomoza, byanarimba tukitabaza inzego za leta kugirango zidufashe ariko natwe twashyizeho akacu" Musenyeri NZAKAMWITA wa Sylverian wa Diyosezi ya BYUMBAMH avuga ko muri Kiliziya Gaturika hashyizweho Iyobokamana rishingiye ku ngo, hashyirwaho za komisiyo kuri buri byiciro mu rwego rwo kureba ibibazo byugarije ingo no kubishakira ibisubizo. Abayobozi b’amadini bashimiwe uruhare bagira mu bikorwa bitandukanye haba mu buvuzi, amashuri n’ibindi bikorwa by’amajyambere dore ko ngo iyo byigishijwe n’abanyamadini abanyarwanda babumva cyane kuko bo bafite umwihariko wo kubaka roho n’imibiri by’ababagana.
Musenyeri Kambanda Antoinne uyobora Diyoseze ya Kibungo
Musenyeri Nzakamwita Selverien uyobora Diyoseze ya Byumba


Yanditswe na Chief Editor/MUHABURA.rw

title: Abari abayobozi ba ADEPR begujwe, hatorwa abo kubasimbura
content:
Abagize inteko rusange ya ADEPR kuri uyu wa Kabiri bahuriye mu nteko rusange idasanzwe batoye Rev. Karuranga Ephraim nk’Umuvugizi w’iri torero.. Iyi nama yakorewe mu muhezo aho itangazamakuru ryaba irivuga n’iryandika ritemerewe kuhakandagiza ikirenge. Mu masaha ya saa tanu nibwo bamwe mu bagize inteko rusange batangiye kugera aho iri kubera mu gihe hari abakiri mu nzira. Abamaze kugera mu cyumba cy’inama bigabanyijemo ibice bibiri bari kuganira ku ngingo zitandukanye. Amakuru ava imbere mu cyumba ni uko amatora y’ubuyobozi bushya arimbanyije, ndetse humvikanyemo amashyi bisa n’aho hari icyo abarimo imbere bishimiye. Ni inama yateranye nyuma y’itabwa muri yombi ry’abayobozi ba Biro Nyobozi ya ADEPR bane barimo Bishop Sibomana Jean, Umuvugizi w’Itorero; Umwungirije Bishop Tom Rwagasana ; Ushinzwe Imari, Mutuyemariya Christine na Rev. Sebagabo Leonard wari Umujyanama waryo. Nyuma y’amakuru yakurikiye gufatwa kw’aba bose, kuwa Mbere tariki ya 29 Gicurasi 2017 hakozwe inama yahuje abayobozi b’indembo eshanu zigize ADEPR yayobowe na Rev.Rurangirwa, uri mu bahabwa amahirwe yo gusimbura Bishop Sibomana. Rev.Rurangirwa Emmanuel niwe Muyobozi Mukuru ukuriye abashumba b’indembo zose. Itegeko rigena uwasimbura umuvugizi wa ADEPR rivuga ko Umushumba w’ururembo uhagarariye abandi ari we uba ugomba gusimbura umuvugizi w’Itorero mu gihe komite yose yaba yavuyeho. Umuyobozi utorerwa gusimbura Bishop Sibomana azayobora inzibacyuho y’amezi atatu mu gihe byaba byemejwe n’Inteko Rusange, nayo ihagarariwe n’Inama Nkuru y’Abaporotesitanti mu Rwanda (CPR).
Mu bandi batowe harimo Umuvugizi wungirije ariwe Rev Karangwa John (yari umuyobozi mu rurembo rwa ADEPR Uganda) , Umunyamabanga Mukuru aba Pasiteri Ruzibiza Viateur wakoraga mu ishami ry’ivugabutumwa ashinzwe urubyiruko. Ushinzwe Imari n’Ubutegetsi watowe ni Umuhoza Aulerie wari usanzwe ari Umukirisitu w’i Remera, Umujyanama aba Pasiteri Nsengiyumva Patrick wari Umuyobozi w’urubyiruko rwa ADEPR ku rwego rw’igihugu. 

Aba nibo bayobozi bashya ba ADEPR Nyuma y’umuhango wo kubatora waberaga kuri Dove hotel Uhereye Ibumoso: Pasiteri Nsengiyumva Patrick, Umuhoza Aulerie, Pasiteri Ruzibiaza Viateur, Rev Karangwa John na Rev. Karuranga Ephraim  
Bishop Jean Sibomana wari umuvugizi mukuru wa ADEPR
Bishop Tom Rwagasana wari umuvugizi wungirije wa ADEPR

Mutuyemariya Christine yari ashinzwe ubukungu n’imari

Pasiteri Salton Niyitanga wakoraga mu biro bya Tom nk’umunyamabanga we

Gasana Valens wari ushinzwe icungamutungo muri ADEPR

Yanditswe na Chief Editor/MUHABURA.rw

title: Amadini n’amatorero yakuwe mu ihuriro rya Sosiyete Sivile nyarwanda
content: Hashize igihe amadini n’amatorero abarirwa mu miryango igize Sosiyete Sivile mu Rwanda ariko ubu yamaze gukurwamo ngo agende yikorere ihuriro ryayo. Mu nama yahuje imiryango igize Sosiyete Sivile Nyarwanda kuri uyu wa Kabiri, yiga ku mategeko no kwishyiraraho ubuyobozi ni bwo hatangajwe ko amadini n’amatorero agomba gukora ukwayo. Umuyobozi wa Sosiyete Sivile mu Rwanda, Munyamariza Edward, yatangaje ko itegeko rishya ry’Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’imiyoborere (RGB) rigenga Sosiyete Sivile, amadini n’amatorero atabarirwamo. Munyamariza yasobanuye ko gushyira ku ruhande amadini n’amatorero bishingiye ahanini ku kuba hari ibintu aba yemera bitandukanye n’ibyo Sosiyete sivile ishaka gukorera ubuvugizi, kubw’ibyo bikaba ari ngombwa ko na yo ajya ukwayo agashinga ihuriro ryayo. Yanditswe na Chief Editor/MUHABURA.rw

title: Kugira Ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside ni nko kugendana Cancer mu mubiri isaha iyo igeze irakwica- B Shop Birindabagabo ...
content:
Umuyobozi mukuru w’Itorero ry’Abanglican mu Rwanda Diyoseze ya Gahini, B Shop Birindabagabo Alex avuga ko kuri we kumva ko hari umunyarwanda waba ugifite ingengabitekerezo yaba ameze nk’umuntu ugendana indwara ya Cancer mu mubiri we nk’uko amaherezo iyo ndwara iba azamwica kandi vuba niko n’ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside iba izageraho igafungisha cyangwa igashyira mu byago uyifite cyangwa undi wese uyihemebera
 Ni ubutumwa bukubiye mu kiganiro kirambuye uyu mukozi w’Imana yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru Ukwezi.com. Aho yavuze ko kugeza ubu niba Leta y’u Rwanda ivuga ko imibare igaragaza  igipimo cy’Ubumwe n’ubwiyunge igeze kuri 92% hari imbaraga nyinshi baba barashyizemo nk’abavugabutumwa ariko ku rundi ruhande akavuga ko burya nk’abakozi b’Imana iyo babwiriza ubutumwa hari bamwe bemera abandi bakanangira ari naho hava iyi mibare igera ku 8% isigaye ngo abanyarwanda bagere ku bumwe n’ubwiyunge busesuye. Abajijwe ku kuba hakiri bamwe mu bakirisitu usanga bakigaragaraho ingengabitekerezo mu matorero n’amadini amwe n’amwe B Shop Alex uyobora EAR (Eglise Anglican au Rwanda) Diyoseze ya Gahini  yagize ati “Buriya iyo tuvuze ibohokamitima n’isanamitima ni ibintu bijyana n’umwuka twebwe mu butumwa bwiza tubwiriza abakristu harimo urukundo no kubana neza na bagenzi babo kandi batarobanuye rero urumva iyo habayeho guhinduka kuri bamwe ubwo ni babandi baba bafashijwe naho bamwe rero banangiye imitima urumva nyine baba banze kwihana ari nabwo iyo umuntu yanze kwihana  habaho guhana bivuze ngo na Leta yagakwiye kujya ishyira mu bikorwa ya mategeko ahana kuri babandi banze kwihana” B Shop Alex yakomeje avuga ati “Ikindi ni uko  ahanini ingengabitekerezo iterwa n’ibintu bibiri, icyambere kandi kireba twese abanyarwanda ni ubujiji ari naho dukwiye gukora akazi kanini ndetse gahoraho ko kwigisha. Ikindi kintu gitera ingengabitekerezo ni ubugome aho ho niho uruhare rwacu rwihariye rugomba kugaragarira ari nayo mpamvu tuvuga ubutumwa kugirango bano bantu bafite ubugome babe bakiwihana ariko mu gihe banangiye bahanwa n’amategeko gusa sinakwibagirwa n’ababyeyi nakwita ko bagaburira abana babo uburozi babigisha amagambo mabi cyane abo ndumva ko ari nka bamwe bagendana Cancer mu mubiri wabo kuko isaha ku isaha iba izabica ari nako n’Ingengabitekerezo iba izageza muri gereza cyangwa igashyira imiryango yabo  mu byago bikomeye” B Shop Alex akomeza asaba abakristu kwitandukanya n’icyitwa ikibi cyose by’umwihariko Ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside kuko bazi neza amahano yabaye mu Rwanda ahanini yatewe n’izo mvugo zihembera urwango mu bantu ari nazo zatumye habaho Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bo mu Rwanda muri Mata 1994. Yanditswe na Chief Editor/MUHABURA.rw

title: Perezida Kagame arasura na Papa François i Vatican
content: Kuri uyu wa mbere tariki 20 Werurwe 2017, Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame aragirira uruzinduko i Vatican mu Butaliyani, aho azahura na Papa François umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika ku Isi. Radio Vatican dukesha iyi nkuru ntiva imuzingo ibyo aba bayobozi bombi bashobora kuganiraho, gusa hari ingingo za Politike abantu bakeka ko bazaganiraho. Perezida Paul Kagame nubwo ari umukristu wa Kiliziya Gatolika (niho yabatirijwe) ibiganiro bye na Papa bishobora kuzagaruka ku mubano n’imikoranire ya Kiliziya Gatolika ndetse n’u Rwanda, dore ko Kiliziya ifite ishoramari n’imitungo myinshi mu Rwanda Gusa, hari n’abatekereza ko bashobora no kuzaganira ku ruhare rwa bamwe mu bayoboke ba Kiliziya bagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, kuo Leta y’u Rwanda ikunze gushyira igitutu kuri Kiliziya ngo ibasabire imbabazi. Yanditswe na Chief Editor/MUHABURA.rw

title: Papa Francis yashyizeho intumwa nshya imuhagararira mu Rwanda
content: Ku isaaha ya saa Sita y’i Roma, ikaba saa 13h00 zo mu Rwanda, kuri uyu wa Gatanadatu Papa Francis yashyizeho intumwa nshya yo kumuhararira mu Rwanda ari we Musenyeri Andrzej Józwowicz Mu ibaruwa yashyizwe hanze n’Inama y’Abepisikopi Gatolika mu Rwanda igashyirwaho umukono na Perezida wayo, Musenyeri Philippe Rukanga akaba n’Umwepiscope wa Diyoseze ya Butare, yamenyeshesheje abayoboke ba Kiliziya Gatulika mu Rwanda n’Abanyrwanda muri rusange iyi nkuru y’iyimikwa ry’Intumwa nshya ya Papa Francis. Msgr Andrzej Józwowic wagizwe intumwa nshya yo guhagararira Papa Francis mu Rwanda yavutse kuwa 14 Mutarama, 1 965  mu gihugu cya Pologne ahitwa Bocki. Nyirubutungane Andrzej Józwowic yimitswe nk’Umusaseridoti kuwa 24 Gicurasi 1 990. Afite impamyabumenyi y’ikirenga ya Doctorat mu mategeko y’ubuyobozi bwa Kiliziya Gatulika (Droit Canonique) no mu mategeko mbonezamubano (Droit Civil). Kuva kuwa 01 Nyakanga 1 997 iyi ntumwa nsha ya Papa mu Rwanda yagiye igirwa uhagarariye ibiro bya Kiliziya Gatulika mu bihugu nka Mozambique, Thailande, Hongrie, Syrie, Iran no mu Burusiya. Yanditswe na Chief Editor/MUHABURA.rw

title: Umwaka wa 2017:  Menya Inzira ebyiri mu kubaho k’umuntu
content:
Bavandimwe, izo nzira ebyiri nta zindi uretse ijyana mu bugingo n’ijyana mu cyorezo. Iyi nyigisho ku nzira ebyiri,Yezu yatangiye hejuru y’umusozi, ifite amateka maremare. Tuyisanga mu bitabo by’amategeko ya Musa, tuyisanga mu bitabo by’abahanuzi. 
 Yewe tuyisanga no mu bitabo by’abahanga, cyane cyane mu gitabo cy’umuririmbyi wa Zaburi. Ni inyigisho iremereye. Kandi iduhwitura.  Dore Inzira ebyiri mu kubaho k’umuntu 1 Hahirwa umuntu udakurikiza inama y’abagiranabi,akirinda inzira y’abanyabyaha,
kandi ntiyicarane n’abaneguranyi, 2 Ahubwo agahimbazwa n’amategeko y’Uhoraho,akayazirikana umunsi n’ijoro! 3 Ameze nk’igiti cyatewe iruhande rw’umugezi,kikera imbuto uko igihe kigeze,kandi amababi yacyo ntagire ubwo arabirana;uwo muntu ibyo akora byose biramuhira. 4 Naho ku bagiranabi si uko bigenda:bo bameze nk’umurama uhuhwa n’umuyaga. 5 Ni cyo gituma ku munsi w’urubanza batazegura umutwe,n’abanyabyaha ntibazajye mu iteraniro ry’intungane. 6 Kuko Uhoraho yita ku nzira y’intungane,naho inzira y’abagiranabi ikagusha ruhabo.
SRC: BIBLE

Menya Inzira ebyiri mu kubaho k’umuntu  
Yanditswe na Salongo Richard Muhabura.rw

title: Min Kaboneka yitabiriye ibirori byo kwizihiza imyaka 20 Chorale Ambassadors of Christ rimaze
content:
Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu, Francis Kaboneka yavuze ko ubuyobozi bw’u Rwanda bwashyizweho n’Imana kandi bukaba ari yo bukorera, bityo ko budashobora gutererana Abanyarwanda muri byose bahura na byo. Yabitangaje kuri uyu wa 24 Ukuboza 2016, mu birori byo kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 20 Chorale Ambassadors of Christ imaze ibwiriza ubutumwa mu buryo bw’indirimbo. Yabishingiye ku buhamya bwatanzwe buvuga uburyo mu ijoro ryo kuwa 9 Gicurasi 2011, Dar es Salaam-Kigali, yakoze impanuka abaririmbyi bayo bane bagakomereka abandi batatu bakitaba Imana. Nyuma yaho Perezida Paul Kagame yohereje indege ngo ijye gutabara abari basigaye, ndetse vuba aha iyi Chorale iherutse kumuha igikombe ku bw’ubwo butabazi. Kaboneka yagize ati “ Satani yashatse kurimbura iyi Chorale ariko ukuboko kw’Imana kubana nayo ndetse nk’uko umuyobozi mukuru yabivuze ubuyobozi bw’igihugu bwarahabaye ariko ni inshingano kubikorera Abanyarwanda. Ubuyobozi bukorera Imana bwashyizweho n’Imana, nta kuntu rero bwatererana Abanyarwanda.” Yashimye uruhare rw’iyi Chorale mu kubwiriza ubutumwa bwiza avuga ko bwagiriye u Rwanda akamaro, nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu mwaka wa 1994. Minisitiri Kaboneka yasabye abari bateraniye aho kugirirana urukundo hagati yabo,bakigana urwo umukuru w’Igihugu yagaragarije iyi Chorale ubwo yari yakoze impanuka. Ati “Imana yakunze Abanyarwanda ibaha abayobozi beza, ni urukundo twakabaye natwe twigisha. Perezida wa Repubulika ajya gufata icyemezo cyo kohereza indege n’imodoka mwakoze impanuka, nta mwana we wari urimo, nta mwene wabo wari urimo, yabikoze kubera ko akunda Abanyarwanda.” Umurava wa Chorale Ambassadors of Christ wagarutsweho n’Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Itorero ry’Abadivantisiti mu Rwanda Dr Hesron Byiringiro wavuze ko iyi yakoze umurimo ukomeye. Ati “Chorale Ambassadors of Christ yarabwirije, yamenyekanishje itorero ry’abadivantisiti b’umunsi wa karindwi mu Rwanda, mu bihugu byose bidukikije irazwi, Zambia yambwiye ko yayishimye ndetse abantu bo muri Angola bansabye ko yazajya kubaririmbira.” Ibirori by’isabukuru y’imyaka 20 Chorale Ambassadors of Christ imaze itangiye gukora umurimo w’Imana mu ndirimbo, byitabiriwe n’abantu basaga 2000, banezezwa n’indirimbo n’ubutumwa bwahatangiwe.

Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/MUHABURA.rw

title: Ese Koko tariki 25 UKuboza Wari Umunsi W’ibigirwamana cyangwa ni ho Yezu yavutse, yavutse ate?
content: Yezu ni umwe mu biremwa bitangaje, cyane kuko ari umwana w’Imana, ariko wigize Umuntu maze akabana natwe, maze akemera kuvuka nk’abantu kugira ngo yisanishe natwe, ndetse aza gupfira abantu twese kubera ibyaha byacu. Ivuka rye rero rikaba ritavugwaho rumwe cyane cyane amadini atandukanye, kuva na kera kugeza n’ ubu. Abakristo benshi bizihiza ivuka ry’uyu mucunguzi ku itarik ya 25 ukuboza buri mwaka.  Ese iyi tariki niyo koko yavutseho? Ese Bibiliya ibivuga ho Iki? Bibiliya ivuga ko hari abantu batatu bashobora kuba bazi neza igihe nyakuri Yezu yaba yaravukiye, mbese yaba yarageze kuri iyi Si dutuyemo.  Abo bagabo bazwi ku izina rya “Magi” aribo bitwa  abanyabwenge batatu bagiye kuramya Yezu bayobowe n’inyenyeri. Izi nyenyeri zamurikiye aba bagabo batatu ngo nizo zirekana igihe nyacyo Yezu yaba yaravukiye kuko ngo zagaragaye agahana mu kinyeshna cya 6 na 5 ku ngoma ya Herodi. Ariko na Bibiliya ntacyo itangaza kigaragara ku gihe nyakuri ku ivuka rya Yezu, ndetse ngo inavuge igihe  itariki n’umwaka bizihiriza ivuka ry’umukiza. Ariko iby’uyu munsi   washyizweho wo kuri 25 ukuboza ngo bifitanye isano n’Abaromani ba bapagani  bizihizaga uyu munsi baramya ikigirwamana cyabo “ Saturnalia” icyo kigirwamana kikaba cyari cy’umusaruro. Mbere y’ikigihe Abakristu  ntibigeraga bizihiza uyu munsi w’ivuka rya Yezu, uyu munsi rero ukaba waramenyekanye cyane cyane mu kinyeshna cya 19. Itariki ya 25 ukuboza byaje nyuma y’imyaka 320 yezu avutse. Ubwo rero mu nyuma y’imyaka 320 nibwo papa Juliua I  yashyizeho iyo tariki ngo ige iba umunsi wo kwizihiza ibirori by’ivuka rya yezu. Naho mu mwaka wa 325 Constantine the Great, umwami w’Abami w’abaromani nibwo yemeje iyo tariki kumugaragaro,maze Musenyeri w’I Roma Liberius ahita ategeka abakristo kwizihiza uwo munsi tariki 25 ukuboza. Iyi tariki rero ikaba yarashyizweho kumpamvu z’abapagani bagiraga umunsi mukuru w’ibigirwamana kuri iyi tariki ya 25 ukuboza, maze abakristu nabo bahita baboneraho kuwegurira umucunguzi ngo berekane ko umucunguzi nyakuri ari Yezu umwana w’Imana iruta izindi zose ku isi. Ariko ngo umwaka nyakuri Yezu yaziyeho ku isi ni umwaka wa 6 m kwezi kwa kane (4)  kuko nta mwaka 0 zero wabayeho. Arko abakristu bo batangiye kwizihiza uwo munsi cyane cyane mukinyeshana cya 19. Yanditswe na Ukurikiyimfura Lence/Muhabura.rw

title: Papa Francis yikomye ibinyamakuru bitangaza ibihuha abigereranya no kugabura amazirantoki
content: Papa Francis yavuze ko ibinyamakuru byibanda ku gutangaza byacitse no gutangaza amakuru y’impuha ntaho bitaniye no kugaburira abantu amazirantoki. Ibi Papa Francis yabivugiye mu kiganiro yagiranye n’itangazamakuru kuri uyu wa 07 Ukwakira 2016. Papa Francis yavuze ko gutangaza ibihuha ari kimwe mu bintu byangiza umuryango itangazamakuru rishobora gukora kurusha uko rikora ibintu byigisha abaturage. Yavuze ko ubusanzwe itangazamakuru rifite imbaraga zo guhindura ubuzima bw’abantu binyuze mu kwigisha, mu bintu byubaka batangaza, mu gutuma abantu batekereza cyane n’ibindi. Papa avuga ko hari ubwo rigira abarikoresha bagamije gutangaza ibihuha ngo bahindanye isura y’abandi cyane cyane muri politiki. Yagaye kandi abatangaza byacitse ndetse bakibanda ku gutangaza ibintu bibi gusa kuko bigira ingaruka mbi nkuko Reuters dukesha iyi nkuru ibitangaza. Yagize ati: "Ndatekereza ko itangazamakuru rikwiye gutangaza ukuri, kandi mu mucyo bakirinda gukora icyaha cyo kugaburira abantu amazirantoki ari byo bigereranywa no guhora batangaza byacitse, ni ibintu bibabaje kuko bishobora kwangiza" Yagaragaje uburyo bamwe mu banyepolitiki bakoresha itangazamamkuru kugirango bavugwe neza maze bo bakavuga abandi ibitari byo bagamije kubasebya, agaragaza ko ibyo nta muntu ubifitiye uburenganzira kandi ko ari n’icyaha. Yasabye abanyamakuru kwirinda gutangaza ukuri kw’igice no kwibanda ku nkuru zivuga ibintu bibi gusa kuko ari bo muyoboro wo kubakwa kwa sosiyete. Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/MUHABURA.rw

title: Abanyamadini barasabwa gukomeza kwamagana abayoboke barya/batanga ruswa
content:
Mu muri gahunda y’icyumweru cyahariwe gukumira no kurwanya ruswa, kuri uyu wa kane Urwego rw’Umuvunyi rwaganiriye n’abanyamadini banyuranye, rubibutsa ko bafite inshingano zo kwigisha abakristu babo kwirinda ruswa. Ariko ngo n’ufite amakuru ku muyoboke we wijanditse muri ruswa nta mpamvu yo kumuhishira.
Bernadette KANZAYIRE, Umuvunyi mukuru wungirije avuga ko bateguye kuganira n’abanyamadini byari bigamije gufasha abanyamadini kubona umwanya wo gusuzuma uruhare rwabo mu gukumira no kurwanya ruswa n’ibyaha bifitanye isano nabyo. Yavuze ko bashaka ko abanyamadini bareba ngo ese urwo ruhare rurahagije, hanyuma bafate ingamba kugira ngo urwo ruhare rukomere, bafashe abayoboke b’amadini yabo kurushaho kumva ko bafite inshingano zo gukumira no kurwanya ruswa, atari ukuyanga no kuyivuga mu magambo gusa, ahubwo bagakora ibikorwa bifatika. Kandi bagahora bakangurira abayoboke ko ruswa n’ibyaha bifitanye isano nabyo ari icyaha nk’uko bigaraga mu bitabo bitagatifu bagenderaho
Ati “Bagiye gukora iki cyatuma noneho nka bamwe mu batuye uru Rwanda bagaragara ko hari umusanzu ufatika bagize, ese hari ibimenyetso bajya batanga ko ruswa yatanzwe na bamwe mu banyamadini?” Ku birebana n’amakuru ku byaha abayoboke baba bakoze, abanyamadini bakayamenya ariko ntibayahe Leta, Umuvunyi KANZAYIRE avuga ko hagomba kurebwa niba hari amategeko abategeko ababuza kuba batanga ikimenyetso runaka. Ati “Nk’abenegihugu nabo bafite inshingano yo gutanga ibimenyetso, nibakomeza bakayihishira (ruswa) kandi babimenye, ejo izatera ibibazo kandi nabo izabagiraho ikibazo nabo. Niba tuvuga ngo hari kubakwa amashuri 10, hakubakwa abiri kubera ruswa yatanzwe, ni ukuvuga ngo abana b’igihugu bazaba batabonye amashuri meza bari bakwiye kubera ruswa yatanzwe, icyo gihe rero niba bayimenye, uko babimenye ni akazi kabo,… nibo bariburebe ingamba nyazo z’uko bazabikora kandi batishe n’umurongo w’idini.” Umuvunyi akavuga ko abanyamadini bashobora kwifashisha itegeko rirengera umuntu watanze amakuru, bakajya batanga amakuru ku rwego rw’umuvunyi cyangwa izindi nzego zikorana narwo atagaragaye. Padiri Etienne Mucyeragabiro, Umupadiri wa Diyoseze ya Nyundo, ushinzwe Komisiyo y’ubutabera n’amahoro muri iyo Diyoseze yabwiye Umuseke ko ruswa ari icyaha nk’ibindi amadini yigisha abayoboke bayo kureka. Ati “Dufite uruhare rukomeye cyane mu kwigisha abayoboke b’ayo madini, abanyarwanda muri rusange kugira ngo bacike kuri ruswa nk’icyaha, ariko noneho bihe n’uburyo igihugu gutera imbere kuko umutungo kiba gifite ukoreshwa neza, buri wese agahabwa icyo afitiye uburenganzira ahabwa n’amategeko.”
Ku birebana n’amakuru ku byaha abayoboke baba bakoze babaha mu gihe bihana, Padiri Mucyeragabiro avuga ko iyo Umupadiri yakiriye amabanga yo mu ntebe ya Penetensiya cyangwa umuntu aje kumugisha inama, ngo icyo uwo muntu aba ashaka ari ugukiranuka, no ugutunganira Imana. Ati “Icyo gihe rero mu biganiro ni ukumvikanisha ko umuntu ushaka gukira neza ku buryo bwuzuye, yiyunga n’Imana aca ukubiri n’icyaha yakoze, ariko ku rundi ruhande akaba agomba kwiyunga n’igihugu, n’abo yahemukiye. Niba umuntu yarariye ruswa, umufasha kumva ububi bwa ruswa, akumva ko ari icyaha gikomeye. Niba asabye imbabazi mu ntebe ya Penetensiya umuntu akaba yamubwira ko Imana yo ihora ibabarira, ariko na none Imana yifuza ko abantu bubahiriza amategeko, ni ukuvuga ngo niba yaribye, yaratwaye iby’abandi, icyo umuntu yamusaba ni uko abisubizwa, umuntu akagira uburenganzira kubyo yari yaravukijwe, ubundi noneho agashobora kubura amaso akabona uko yiyunga n’Imana neza.” Musenyeri Innocent Byakatonda, umusenyeri wa Orthodox mu karere we avuga ko mu gihe umuyoboke yireze akemera icyaha akwiye kubanza kuganirizwa akagirwa inama. Gusa, ngo hari n’aho biba ngobwa ko bamugira inama yo kujya kwirega mu nzego z’umutekano nk’iyo yakoze icyaha gikomeye cyangwa yarananiwe kwihana. 


 Yamditswe na Ubwanditsi/MUHABURA.rw

title: Ubu buhanuzi noneho ntibubaho! Ngo umuntu ukorana n’ibigo gikora nka Bank wese ntazajya mu ijuru?
content: Umugabo wo muri Nigeria, Akande Thomas yakwirakwije ubuhamya bushimangira ko umuntu winjiye muri gahunda yo gukorana n’ibigo bitsura amajyambere ntacyo azageraho. Yabishimangiraga nk’umuntu wafunguye konti mu kigega cyitwa MMM yarangiza akunguka ariko yajya gutanga icyacumi ku Mana, ikacyanga. Thomas abinyujije kuri rubuga rwa facebook, yavuze ko akurikije uburyo umuntu wabigiyemo ari umukirisitu Imaana yamwibwiriye ko amazina amazina y’abazabijyamo azasibwa mu gitabo cy’ubugingo. Dore uko inkuru ye yari imeze:  “bwa mbere njya muri MMM, nasenze Imana nyibaza niba yabihaye umugisha. Impakanira itabiciye ku ruhande, ngo umukirisutu wese ubigiemo izina rye risibwa mu gitabo cy’ubugingo. Nahise ngwa mu kantu ndetse ubwoba burantaha kuko nari ndi no gusenga njyenyine. Nkimara gusenga nahise nibaza nti ese ubundi irijwi rimbujije ni iry’Imana koko? Nkishidikanjya irindi jwi riramanukira rigira riti: “ntabwo ari iry’Imana ahubwo ni iry’umudayimoni ushaka kukuzirikira ku ngoyi y’ubukene” nkibyumva nahise ndeka iby’irya mbere numvira irya kabiri. nahise mfata umwanzuro wo gushora ibihumbi 250 muri MMM. Nyuma y’ukwezi byari ibyishimo ubwo nagarukaga aho nashoye. Imana yemeje wa mudayimoni maze impa umusaruro urenze. Nyuma yahoo nakurikijeho gutanga icyacumi. Nkitekereza ku byo kubikuza amafaranga Imana yarambwiye iti: “ntacyo mfite cyo gukoresha ayo mafaranga” nahise nturika ndarira nicuza impamvu nasuzuguye Imana. Nahise nsaba imbabazi kandi nzi ko nababariwe. Nakurikijeho gufunga konti yange yo muri MMM gusa n’ubu sundamena icyo nzakoresha ayo mafaranga Imana yanze.

title: Abapasiteri bageze mu zabukuru bishimiye ko bagiye gusaza neza
content:
Itorero Méthodiste Libre mu Rwanda ryagabiye inka abapasiteri 21 bageze mu zabukuru, mu rwego rwo kubafasha kugira amasaziro meza.
 Ubuyobozi bwi torero bwemeza ko ari ubwa mbere gahunda nk’iyi ibaye mu myaka hafi 75 rimaze rigeze mu Rwanda. Umwanzuro wo kugabira inka aba bapasiteri wafatiwe mu nama ya conference ya Kinyaga, yabereye muri aka karere, aho abapasiteri 20 kuri 21 bageze mu zabukuru mu Rwanda hose bagomba guhabwa izi nka bari bahari. Umwepisikopi w’iri torero akaba n’umuyobozi waryo mu Rwanda no muri Uganda, Musenyeri Samuel Kayinamura yavuze ko iki cyemezo gifashwe muri iriya nama yamaze iminsi 3, kikaba ari ikintu kitari cyarigeze gikorwa muri iri torero. Yagize ati “Hano habaye ikintu tutigeze dukora ahandi, aho twahuje abapasiteri bageze mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru bo mu Rwanda hose, tubazana hano mu karere ka Rusizi tubakorera umwiherero, tuganira na bo, tuganira amateka y’iri torero, cyane cyane ko tunitegura Yubile y’imyaka 75 rimaze rigeze mu Rwanda. Bariya bakaba ari bo bazajya baduha amateka yaryo, tukaba twafashe gahunda yo kujya dusajisha neza uwakoreye itorero tumugabira, buri mupasiteri ugiye mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru akazajya ahabwa inka, duhereye kuri bariya 21 bari basanzwe bari mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru.” Avuga ko iri ari ishimwe rikomye ry’imirimo baba barakoze iriya myaka yose, kandi ko umuntu witangiye abandi mu myaka ingana kuriya aba adakwiye gusaza nabi, cyangwa ngo asaze atanywa amata kandi aba yarigomwe ibyagombaga kumuha ayo mata, akitangira bagenzi be akabateza imbere mu buryo bw’umwuka n’ubw’umubiri. Yagize ati “Ubu ni uburyo bwiza bwo kugira ngo tububahishe n’abazaza nyuma bazabone ko abababanjirije batasuzuguwe mu murimo bakoreye Imana, kandi natwe twiyubahishe, kuko natwe tugenda dusatira icyo gihe, natwe abo tuzaba dusize inyuma bazadufate neza.” Pasiteri Sibomana Jean wo mu murenge wa Nyabitekeri ufite imyaka 68 ariko we utari muri bariya 21 akazayihabwa ubutaha, yavuze ko iki ari ikintu gishimishije cyane kuko buri wese ugeze muri kiriya kigero yahageraga ahangayikishijwe n’imisazire ye, mu gihe aba yarigomwe igihe cye cyo gushaka amasaziro akitangira umurimo w’Imana. Yagize ati “Ibi ni ibishya tubonye bitigeze bibaho mu itorero ryacu, biratunejeje cyane kuko bizadufasha gusaza tunywa amata, abana bacu batandaraye, tubona mituweli, mbese tudasabiriza kandi twarakoreye Imana n’itorero.” Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi Muhabura.rw

title: Papa Francis yashyizeho Abakaridinari 17 bashobora kuzavamo uzamusimbura
content:
Umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatorika Papa Francis yatangiye guca amarenga ku isimburwa rye aho yashyizeho abakaridinali bashya 17  bo mu bihugu bitandukanye byo ku Isi, bakazaba aribo bazavamo ushobora kuzamusimbura ubwo azaba ashoje ubutumwa bwe.
 Aba bakaridinali batshyizeho n’uyu  Mushumba wa Kiliziya Gatorika ni abo mu bihugu bya Repubulika ya Centrafrique , Bangladesh, Papua , Guinea na Mauritius,Ubutaliyani, Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika USA, Espagne, Brasil, Ububiligi, Venezuela, Lesotho , Malayisia, na Albania ;bose baturuka mu migabane itanu hakabamo n’intumwa y’i Vatican muri Syria. Gushyiraho abakaridinali ni imwe mu nshingano n’ububasha bya Papa dore ko bafatwa nk’ibikomangoma by’i Vatican. 13 mu bo Papa Francis yashyizeho, harimo abatagejeje ku myaka 80 bemerewe gutorwamo uzamusimbura igihe azaba yapfuye cyangwa yeguye.

Amazina y’Abakaridinali bashya Mario Zenari, (ukomoka mu Butaliyani)
Dieudonne Nzapalainga, (Centrafrique)
Carlos Osoro Sierra (Espagne)
Sergio da Rocha (Brazil)
Blase J Cupich(USA)
Patrick D’Rozario(Bangladesh)
Baltazar Enrique Porras Cardozo(Venezuela)
Jozef De Kesel(u Bubiligi)
Maurice Piat(Mauritius)
Kevin Joseph Farrell(USA)
Carlos Aguiar Retes(Mexico)
John Ribat(Papua New Guinea)
Joseph William Tobin(USA)
Anthony Soter Fernandez(Malaysia)
Renato Corti (u Butaliyani)
Sebastian Koto Khoarai(Lesotho)
Na Ernest Simoni(Albania) BBC dukesha iyi nkuru ivuga ko ari ubwa gatatu Papa Francis atoranyije Abakaridinali. Yakunze gukora uko ashoboye ashyiraho abatari abo ku mugabane w’u Burayi gusa. Mu muhango wabaye ejo ku wa Gatandatu, yanenze bikomeye icyo yise, ‘Urwango ruri kurushaho gufata indi ntera mu bantu’ akebura abubaka inkuta, bakanubaka za bariyeri. Yagize ati "Turi mu bihe ivangura, ubuhezanguni no kwigira ba nyamwigendaho ari byo abantu bafata nk’inzira nziza yo gukemura ibibazo byabo"
 Kalidinali Dieudonne Nzapalainga ukomoka mu Mujyi wa Bangui yambikwa ikamba na Papa Francis
 

 Kalidinali Anthony Soter Fernandez wambaye lunete 

Yanditswe na Chief Editor/MUHABURA.rw

title: Ese Yezu yaba yarashatse nk’uko benshi babitekereza
content:
Hirya no hiro ku isi , kuva  mu gihe cy’abasekuruza kugeza n’ubu benshi bagenda bumva inyigisho zitangwa abantu ko yezu  yaba yarashatse.  ni ukuvuga ko yaba yararongoye. Ndetse  banahamya bemye ko  Nyuma yo kujya mu ijuru ngo yagarutse  mu isi  akibanira n’umugore we.
 Ese koko  ibi ni ukuri? Ese Bibiliya twemera yo Ibivuga ho Iki? Bibiliya igaragaza neza yitonze ko rwose  Yezu atigeze ashaka, nu bwo Bibiliya itigeze igaragaza iby’ubugaragu bwe cyangwa iby’ubuzima bwe hanze y’iyobokamana  ariko ntibivuze ko  yarafite urugo hano mu Isi. Bibiliya  igaragaza iby’umuryango wa Yezu, ndetse n’abagore na bagabo bamuherekezaga umunsi ku munsi mu butumwa bwe bwo kogeza ingoma y’Imana, ndetse n’abari kumwe nawe   mu rugendo rw’urupfu rwe, ntaho Bibiliya igaragaza ibye N’umugore. Ruka (8:2-3) na Yohani (19:25). Yezu  niwe wabaye umusaseredote wa mbere, tugendeye kubahitamo kwiberaho nta gushaka Bibiliya yemera ko nabo bakorera Imana. Abigishwa baramubwira bati :Niba ari Uko Bimeze Ku mugabo n’umugore, Ikiruta ni ukudashaka. Nuko yezu arabasubiza  Ati : ’’Bose Ntibumva iyo mvugo,keretse ababihawe bonyine, kuko hari abavutse ari ibiremba n’abigize gutyo kubera ingoma y’Imana.Matayo (19:10-12) Yezu nawe yariyarahisemo kudashaka kubera ingoma y’Imana.
 Yezu Ntiyigeze ashaka umugore , kuko iyo aza kumugira ndetse n’abana, igihe yari agiye gupfa ntaba yarabwiye  Nyina na Nyina wabo Mariya muka Kilopa na Mariya Madalena ati ndetse nawamwigishwa yakundaga , maze agira ati :’’ Mubyeyi, dore  umwana wawe.; abwira na wamwigishwa yakundaga ati "dore nyoko" guhera icyo gihe, ubwo uwo mwigishwa amujyana iwe, aba yarabibwiye umugore we ndetse n’abana. Yohani (19:25-27) Bibiliya yakoresheje  Yezu nk’urugero rw’umugabo ariko  ntibisobanuye ko yari afite umugore  uretse ko yagize ati : Namwe bagabo ni mukunde abagore banyu, nk’uko Kristu yakunze kiliziya, maze akayitangiraAbanyafesi (5:25) ubwo rero iyo yezu aza kugira umugore kuri iyi si  aba yaritanzeho urugero ntaba yarakoresheje abagabo muri rusange. Benshi  bakunze kuyobya abantu bitewe n’ubushakatsi  bugenda bukorwa n’abantu batandukanye ku mibereho ya yezu ihabanye n’iy’iyokamana kuko ari yo Bibiliya yibanzeho gusa, bakavuga ko  Mariya wahoze ari Ihabara ariwe wabaye umugore wa yezu,  Gusa ibyo sibyo kuko  Bibiliya twemera igaragaza ko yari Umusaseredoti wiyeguriye Imana mu buryo bwo kudashaka. Yanditswe na Ukurikiyimfura Leonce/Muhabura.rw

title: Gusoma Yezu ibirenge kwa Mariya ngo byaba bifite byinshi bisobanura
content:
Benshi basesengura byinshi  ku byerekeye urukundo  ndetse n’umubano wihariye wari hagati ya Yezu na Mariya wahoze ari ihabara, bamwe twavuga ko ari Anti christu( Idini) bavuga ko Mariya kuba yarasomye Yezu ndetse na Yezu akemera bifite icyo byasobanuraga ku rukundo rwabo.
 Banabiheraho banavuga ko ngo Mariya yaba yari inshuti ye ku buryo budasazwe, bagira bati "Ijambo Mariya riboneka muri bibiriya inshuro nyinshi, kandi ngo ibyo abachritu bavuga ko Uwakane mutagatifu Yezu yaremyeho Ukarisitiya ngo  byari amabeshyo ahubwo ngo  bwari ubukwe bwa Yezu na Mariya."
 Banemeza ko Yezu nyuma yo kujya mu ijuru ngo yaba yaragarutse kubana na Mariya. Banavuga ko ngo kuba  uriya mugore wagiye kumva ye bwa mbere ari uriya mariya wamusomye! Bakanamuhuza n’uriya mushiki wa Razaro Yezu yazuye bati  " yamuzuye kubera Mariya."
 Ku rundi ruhande ngo kuba yaramusomye kubirenge bifite ibintu 4 by’ingenzi byerekana: kimwe mu bintu bikomeye bitera isoni, umuntu ashobora gukorera undi ni ukumusoma ku birenge  . Bisaba kunama ugaca bugufi  ugasoma kimwe mu bice byanduye by’umubiri. Iki kimenyetso  ni kimwe mu bikorwa bikomeye umuntu akora asa nk’aho yitesheje agaciro  mu buzima bwe ku muntu w’umunyacyubahiro cyangwa ugukuriye hamwe n’uwo wubashye. Kubera icyubahiro umuntu agira mu buzima no kwirata bya muntu,  nta muntu wapfa gukora icyo gukorera undi icyo gikorwa undi , Atari uko ari umucakara we cyangwa  umuyobozi we. Ku rundi ruhande, ngo icyo gikorwa ngo  ni kimwe mubyerekana icyubahiro n’igitinyiro ( icyusa) umuntu ashobora gukorera undi mu buzima. Aya mahirwe n’amwe mu buzima  Mariya yagize igihe yasomaga  Yezu ku birenge ndetse  akanamuhanaguza umubavu ku birenge akanamuhanaguza imisatsi ye, igihe yari agiye  kwa Simoni. Mariya  wari ihabara yo ku rwego rwo hejuru muri icyo gihe, ibyo yakoze asoma Yezu ibirenge ngo bifite byinshi bisobanura. 1.      Gusoma yezu  ku birenge ngo byagaragaje kwicisha bugufi  no kwanga icyaha kwa Mariya.
Uyu mugore wari ihabara ( indaya)  akaba umunyabyaha wo kurwego rwo hejuru, ngo iki kimenyetso cyo gusoma Yezu ibirenge cyagaragaje kwicisha bugufi no kwanga ibyaha imbere ya yezu. 2.      Gusoma Yezu ibirenge byagaragaje kwirega nta buryarya  byari ku mutima wa Mariya.
Mariya yabonye ko yezu ari umukiza kandi akaba umucunguzi we, ntiwakizwa ibyaha igihe utemera ko Yezu ari umucunguzi w’abantu bose.  Mariya yaramaze kubona ko Yezu afite imbaraga zo ku mukiza kandi akababarirwa ibyaha kugira ngo azajye mu ijuru. 3.      Gusoma ibirenge bya Yezu byagaragaje urukundo n’ukwemera kwa Mariya.
Iki n’ikimenyetso k’icyizere  n’urukundo no gucungurwa kwa Mariya,  uru rukundo Mariya yeretse Yezu  byamubereye ukwemera gushyitse imbere ya Yezu . Yezu ati " genda ukwemera kwawe kuragukijije" 4.      Gusoma Yezu ibirenge ngo byagaragaje  ukwihana kwa Mariya.
Mariya ntiyagize  isoni zo kwirega imbere ya Yezu ndetse n’imbere y’imbaga y’abantu yari aho. Yirengagije ibyishimo byo ku isi maze abona ko ntakamaro ahubwo akeneye ubugingo bw’iteka Uyu mugore wari ihabara,  yakundwaga n’abagabo kandi byari bimutunze rwose ariko yahisemo kubireka maze ahitamo kwirega  kwikubita imbere ya Yezu ngo amubabarire.. Ninde witeguye gusoma ibirenge bya Yezu?  Ni uwari we wese  witeguye kureka ibibi byose bitera ibyishimo hano ku isi maze akarangamira inzira y’ijuru, aho azabona ibyishimo bitagira iherezo.  Abigishwa ba Yezu bari hafi aho ndetse n’abandi  batangajwe n’ibyo ihabara ryakoreye Yezu , ariko we yabasubije ati " udakora icyaha namutere ibuye uko bose barikubura baragenda."




Yanditswe na Ukurikiyimfura Leonce/Muhabura.rw

title: “Turashaka kwigisha abakirisitu bacu gucika ku mfashanyo’’-  Musenyeri Onesphore Rwaje
content:
Umuyobozi mukuru w’Itorero ry’Abangilikani mu Rwanda, Musenyeri Onesphore Rwaje, arasaba abakirisitu b’iri torero muri Diyoseze ya Cyangugu gukoresha amahirwe y’iterambere igihugu n’itorero bibaha umunsi ku wundi, kugira ngo barusheho kwiteza imbere.
 Musenyeri Rwaje avuga ko bidakwiriye ko umukirisitu muzima udafite ikindi kibazo mu mubiri usanga ahora ataka ubukene, ngo abe ari we urwanira gushyirwa mu cyiciro cya mbere cy’ubudehe. Yasabye ko abayoboke b’Itorero ayoboye bakwiye guharanira kwiteza imbere bifatika, bahereye no ku bwenge n’imitekerereze Imana yabahaye, bagaharanira no guteza imbere abandi. Ni bimwe mu byo yatangarije mu karere ka Rusizi ubwo yifatanyaga n’abakirisitu ba paruwasi y’Angilikani Gashonga muri aka karere mu gutaha urusengero rw’iyi paruwasi yanabafunguriye ku mugaragaro. Nk’uko  yabitangarijwe n’umushumba wayo, Pasiteri Ndagijimana Ephrem, ngo rwuzuye rutwaye amafaranga arenga miliyoni 25. Mu ijambo rye, Nyiricyubahiro Musenyeri Onesphore Rwaje yunze mu ry’abandi bayobozi bakuru b’igihugu, aho yavuze ko bakwiriye kwagura imitekerereze bakareka kwibwira ko hari uzaturuka kure ngo aze abubakire ibyo bakagombye kwiyubakira. Abasaba guhera ku byo bafite bakabyongera bakiteza imbere, ibyo guhora bategereje imfashanyo bakabishyira ku ruhande. Yagize ati “Turashaka kwigisha abakirisitu bacu gucika ku mfashanyo kuko nubwo bavuga ngo ak’imuhana kaza imvura ihise, njye nongeraho ko iyo imvura ihise ari bwo aho yaguye harushaho kunyerera cyane n’ako k’imuhana wagafata kakaba kakunyererana kakangirika mu gihe akawe wari kuba wakabitse neza mbere y’uko iyo mvura igwa.” Yongeyeho ati “Hari abagiye batwizeza imfashanyo bakatugerekaho andi mategeko adakwiriye umuco wacu tudashobora kwihanganira, nk’ubutinganyi n’ibindi, hari n’abazifunze kandi ntacyo twashatse gukora ngo kitunanire, uyu muco wo gutegereza hanze ukaba ugomba kuva mu bakirisitu bacu, bagakora ibyabo, mu bushobozi bwabo.” Icyakora ashima abafatanyabikorwa babo b’Abanyamerika bibumbiye mu muryango ICM (International Coperation Ministries) babafasha kubaka insengero n’amashuri, aho batangiriye muri Diyoseze ya Cyangugu, bakaba bamaze gufasha mu kubaka insengero zirenga 20 zirimo n’urwo yafunguye ku mugaragaro, aho batanga miliyoni hafi 8 kuri buri rusengero, kandi bo ko nta mananiza babashyiraho. Musenyeri Nathan Rusengo Amoti, umwepisikopi wa Diyoseze ya Cyangugu, avuga ko iyi gahunda yo kwigisha abaturage kwiteza imbere bahereye ku byo bafite bayitangije mu bakirisitu babo, aho bahereye ku matsinda yo kuzigama no kugurizanya.

Umuyobozi mukuru w’Itorero ry’Abangilikani mu Rwanda, Musenyeri Onesphore Rwaje, arasaba abakirisitu b’iri torero muri Diyoseze ya Cyangugu gukoresha amahirwe y’iterambere igihugu n’itorero bibaha umunsi ku wundi, kugira ngo barusheho kwiteza imbere.
Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Urubyiruko rwo mu Itorero ERC mu giterane cy’ububyutse kiyobowe na  Apostle Joshua Masasu
content:
Urubyiruko rwo mu Itorero ry’Ivugabutumwa n’Isanamitima mu Rwanda (Evangelic Restoration Church), Paruwasi ya Nyarutarama rukomeje igiterane cy’ububyutse n’ivugabutumwa. Aho urubyiruko rusabwa kuba igitambo gishimwa n’Imana kandi rugatumbira Yesu Kristo mu buzima bwabo bwa buri munsi. 
 Iki giterane gifite insanganyamatsiko igira iti “Boneza amaso imbere yawe ugumye uhatumbire kandi utunganye inzira z’ibirenge byawe, kugira ngo ube igitambo gihindura umuryango”, iyi nsanganyamatiko iri mu Imigani 4; 25- 27. Iki giterane gikomeje kuzamo abavugabutumwa basizwe amavuta ndetse n’abahanzi bahimbaza Imana. Iki giterane cyatangiye tariki ya 25 Nzeri kugeza tariki ya 2 Ukwakira 2016, kibaba kibera i Nyarutarama hafi yo mu Kabuga ahari uru rusengero. Iki giterane cy’ububyutse kiba buri munsi kuva saa kumi kugeza saa moya n’igice z’ijoro mu minsi y’imibyizi ndetse no kuva saa munani z’amanywa kugeza saa moya n’igice z’ijoro mu minsi mu minsi y’isoza icyumweru (weekend). Umushumba wa ERC Nyarutarama, Pastor Seruhungo Alphonse yavuze ko iki giterane gifite intego yo kwegereza urubyiruko Imana ndetse no kugira ngo urubyiruko rwegere Imana runakire agakiza babere ibitambo imiryango yabo nayo ihinduke. Ubwo yatangizaga iki giterane ku mugaragaro, Apostle Masasu Joshua yavuze ko urubyiruko rufite imbaraga zihagije ku buryo babishatse bakorera Imana neza, aha kandi yatanze ubuhamya bw’uko yatangiye gukorera Imana akiri muto ku myaka gusa 22, aho yasenze akaba igitambo gishimwa n’Imana. Apostle Masasu yagize ati “Nkirangiza icyiciro cya mbere cya kaminuza nari mfite gusa imyaka 22 nibwo natangiye gukorera Imana; namwe ndabasaba kwegera Imana no kuyikorera mukiri bato mufite imbaraga kandi muzabona imigisha myinshi mu buzima bwanyu.” Umuyobozi w’urubyiruko rusengera kuri ERC Nyarutarama, Mwamini Zainabu avuga ko iki giterane kizakomeza kuba mu bihe bitandukanye kugira ngo urubyiruko rutandukanye rurusheho kubona umwanya wo kongera ubusabane bwabo n’Imana. Abavugabutumwa basizwe babwirije urubyiruko barimo Apostle Joshua Masasu, Pastor Ngoga Innocent, Pastor Seruhungo Alphonse na Pastor Masasu Patrick, Pastor Ruzindana Jean Marie na Pascale Keza. Abahanzi kandi bazataramira abazitabira igitaramo harimo Patient Bizimana, Gabby Irene Kamanzi, Liliane Kabaganza, Serge Iyamuremye, Nelson Mucyo, Arsene Tuyi na Kaneza Deborah. Ndetse hari n’abandi bahanzi benshi na worship teams zitandukanye harimo Total Praise worship team ya ERC Nyarutarama.

 Hakoreshwa uburyo bwose mu kuramya no guhimbaza iyi ni drama team ya shining stars

 Apostle Joshua Masasu iburyo pastor Seruhugo hagati hirya hari Maman pastor Iribagiza Rose na patient Bizimana inyuma


 Urubyiruko rwa ERC NYARUTARAMA mu kuramya no guhimbaza 






Magnifique MIGISHA Yanditswe na Magnifique MIGISHA

title: Ese  no ku batinganyi hari amahirwe yo kuzabona  u bwami bw’ Ijuru?
content:
Ubutinganyi kimwe mu bikorwa byigarurirye isi muri iki kinyejana cya 21, kibaba kimwe mu bibazo bihangayikishije isi muri rusange, hirya no hino mu bihugu  haratorwa amategeko abyemeza, imyigaragabyo irakorwa umunsi ku munsi igamije kubisabira uburenganzira. Ubundi abahanga mu bya tewologiya bavuga ko nta cyaha kitababarirwa, bityo abafata ubutinganyi nk’icyaha, bafite amahirwe yo kujya mu ijuru mu gihe baba bihannye bakagarukira Imana nk’uko bigenda ku bindibyaha, ukuyemo “Gutuka cyangwa guhakana Imana yawe” Amadini amwe n’amwe, asezeranya abahuje ibitsina, andi agasezeranya abantu n’inyaswa. byateje impagarara mu nadini: Anglican ryo  ryamaze  gutora itegeko ryemerera ababana bahuje ibitsina,  abasenyeri muri Cotholic bari kwegura bazira ubutinganyi. Umushakashatsi Moanti ( Moe-on-tee) yagaragaje bimwe mu bintu bituma abantu bakorana imibonano mpuzabitsina bahuje ibitsina: uguhitamo kwa muntu, ibigeragezo, ubudayimoni, uburwayi bwo mu mutwe, guhungabana, kubura ubushobozi ndetse n’akamenyero. Mariya (Madagarena) uvugwa muri Bibiliya wa hose ari ihabara yo ku rwego rwo hejuru yarababariwe ntagushidikanya ubu wicaranye na Yezu mu ijuru.  Abakora imibonano mpuzabitsina bahuje ibitsina barara amajoro basenga ngo Imana izabakire. Bibiliya ihamya ko ari icyaha kandi ngo ubutinganyi buhabanye n’ugushaka kw’imana  igihe yaremaga Admu na Eva nk’umugabo n’umugore.  Yezu ati “ Naje  gupfira ibyaha  byanyu” ariko nanone ikavuga ko icyaha kimwe kitababarirwa ni icyaha cyo kwihakana Imana bakunze kwita “gutuka Imana”. Ariko se niba abatinganyi bizera Yezu nk’umucunguzi wabo ariko ntibahinduke  ese bazajya mu ijuru? Bibiliya irongera ikavuga ko niba umuntu  yemera Imana byukuri mu buzima bwe, nta kintu nakimwe kizamubuza kujya mu bwami bw’Ijuru, Yohana 10:28. “Mbahaye kubaho mu buzima buhoraho  ntibazapfa ukundi, nta muntu n’umwe ushobora kubavana mu maboko yange” Ariko se kuki twemera Imana ariko ntudukore ibyo idutegeka? Nta kwemera Yezu udahinduka, menya Yezu unahinduke ukore ibyo ashaka. Igihe  abatinganyi bazarekeraho gukora icyaha cy’ubutinganyi ba kihana   bakamesa amakanzu yabo mu maraso ya ntama nta kabuza  bazataha ijuru. Yezu ati “ Mwikorere ibitwaro yanyu  muyizane ndabaruhura, ndi umunyampuhwe n’umunyambabazi  kubaza  banzanga.” Ubwo rero igihe cyose umunyabyaha ya kwihana akababarirwa nta kabuza yakwicarana n’Imana.

Ubutinganyi ni icyaha nk’ibindi, uwacyihana yakibabarirwa(photo internet) Yanditswe na Ngabo Leonce/Muhabura.rw

title: Mu  Bwongereza, umukinnyi yasezeye ku ikipe ye yigira mu byo gusenga
content:
Umukinnyi wo hagati akaba na myugariro witwa Jeremy Helan, ku myaka 24 yatunguye ikipe ye ya Sheffield Wednesday yo muri Championship ababwira ko ashaka kuva mu byo gukina agashyira inguvu mu gusenga. Sportsmail yasesenguye iby’uyu musore wakiniye France U19, bavuga ko yari yitezweho kuzaba Pafrice Evra mushya, ntibyaje kumuhira cyane ku buryo agiye kwerekeza Saudi Arabia nyuma y’aho ngo n’ubundi yongereye cyane ibihe byo kuba mu musigiti. Amasezerano ya Helan yari atararangira, yagombaga kuzashira ku musozo w’iyi season. Uyu musore asanzwe ari nyamwigendaho, nta bantu ajya abwira amakuru ye. Hari abavuga ko ari ibiri mu rwambariro, Helan yabibwiriye icyifuzo cye mu cyumweru gishize. Yavuze ko ashaka kwigira Saudi Arabiya ku mpamvu z’amasengesho. Mu ikipe nta byinshi bavuze gusa ngo baracyari kugira ibyo bavugana. 
Jeremy Helan n’ubundi ngo yarasigaye asa nk’uwibera mu musigiti i Sheffield(photo internet) Yanditswe na Lucky van Rukundo//Muhabura.rw

title: Pasiteri Bizimungu  umwe mu bitabiriye umuhango wo gushyingura Mgr Ngirabanyiginya
content:
Musenyeri Alexis Habiyambere ni we wayoboye umuhango wo gushyingura Mgr Ngirabanyiginya Dominic wari umusenyeri w’icyubahiro muri diyosezi ya Nyundo witabye Imana mu ijoro rishyira kuwa 7 Nzeli 2016. Mgr Ngirabanyiginya wazize uburwayi bwa diyabeti buri wa kane yajyaga Kigali mu Bitaro Byitiriwe Umwami Faical ( King Faysal Hospital); bivugwa ko hari hashize igihe kirekire akora izi ngendo buri cyumweru. Umuhango guherekeza Nyakwigendera ubaye mu gihe Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Nyundo yagiye i Roma mu Butaliyani mu nama yarangiye kuwa gatandatu ihuza abasenyeri bashya bo ku isi. Witabiriwe n’abandi basenyeri batandukanye ndetse na Pasteri Bizimungu wigeze kuba Perezida wa Repubulika y’u Rwanda. Mgr Ngirabanyiginya wari ufite imyaka 79 azwiho kuba yarareze abantu benshi bakomeye, barimo abapadiri, abasenyeri n’abayobozi... Azwi kandi nk’umuhanga usigiye Kiliziya Gatolika y’u Rwanda indirimbo nyinshi zihimbaza Imana. Yavukiye muri paruwasi ya Kabgayi mu 1937, atangira iseminari nto mu 1952, ahabwa ubupadiri mu 1964. Yabaye umwigisha mu iseminari amara imyaka myinshi muri seminari yitiriwe Mutagatifu Piyo wa X yo ku Nyundo. Abasenyeri bagaragaje agahinda gakomeye batewe no kuba babuze muganzi wabo wari ingirakamaro mu muryango nyarwanda ndetse n’uwa kiliziya Gatolika. Musenyeri Anaclet Mwumvaneza utabashije kwitabira uyu muhango wo gushyingura yagize ati "Nakiranye akababaro kenshi amakuru yo kubura Nyakwigendera gahunda ndimo i Roma yatumye ntaza kwifatanya namwe. Nyakwigendera yarangizaga inshingano ze natwe nka Diyosezi ya Nyundo ntituzigera kumwibagirwa."
 Yakomeje avuga ko na Seminari yitiriwe Pio wa X itazamwibagirwa kuko ari ho uyu mukambwe yabigishirije kuririmba n’ubundi bumenyi babona nk’umurage bazahora bazirikana. Ati "Nyagasani amuhe iruhuko ridashira."





Pasiteri Bizimungu  umwe mu bitabiriye umuhango wo gushyingura Mgr Ngirabanyiginya
 Yanditswe na  Ubwanditsi/ Muhabura.rw

title: Papa Francis ntiyitaye ku batamushyigikiye
content:
Papa Francis azaha umugisha ubutagatifu bwa Mama Teresa w’ I Calcutta kuri icyi cyumweru. Benshi mu bakozi ba Vatican ariko ntibabyumva. Kimwe n’abandi bahanga mu mateka ya Gatulika bari kubibonera mu ndorerwamo y’inyungu za papa Francis ku giti cye. Washington Post ivuga ko abakurikiranira hafi iby’ iki gikorwa bemeza ko Papa Francis ari gushyira abantu benshi mu batafatifu ku buryo butari busanzwe ho kuva no kuri Papa Yohana Pawulo wa II. Mu myaka itatu n’igice gusa amaze ku bupapa, Francis amaze gushyira abantu 29 bose mu batagatifu. Bivuze ko amaze kurusha uwo yasimbuye Papa Benedict wa XVI abantu 11 urebye abo yari amaze gushyiraho mu gihe nk’iki. Bigaragara ko hatagize igihinduka yazanakuraho agahigo kashyizweho mu kinyejana cya 15 aho babaye 813. Ikibazo si umubare gusa kuko n’uburya bikorwamo bivugwaho rumwe.  Umwe mu banditsi yitwa Austen Ivereigh, yanditse ibitabo birimo na The Great Reformer: Francis and the Making of a Radical Pope.”, yagizemo ati "mu gihe Pawulo wa II yapfaga hari amarangamutima akomeye ku buryo hari kuba harabayeho abatagatifu benshi, gusa kubikora byaritondeshejwe.”. Ubusanzwe muri Kiliziya Gatulika, gushyira umuntu mu batagatifu bitwara imyaka myinshi, hari n’ubwo bigera mu majana. Ari ko Mama Teresa ugiye gushyirwa muri iki cyikiro, amaze imyaka 19 gusa yitsbye Imana. Francis amaze guha umugisha abatagatifu batatu ku buryo bwihuse birenze urugero. Ni uyu Mama Teresa, Yohani Pawulo wa II n’umya espanyekazi witabye Imana mu 1998. Ngo ibi rero bikaba byazarangira Vatican yose yuzuye abatagafu. Edmund Arens ni umwalimu mu bijyanye n’amahame ya tewologiya muri kaminuza ya Arens mu Busuwisi, yavuze ko bigomba gutwara igihe gihagije kugira ngo hasuzumwe neza ubuzima b’umutagatifu. Yagize ati “niba umuntu yarabaye intangarugero mu buzima bwe, kuki hadafatwa umwanya uhagije wo kwimwigaho byimbitse?" Francis ashinjwa na bamwe mu bakozi ba Vatican gukora iki gikorwa uko abyumva kandi agendeye ku marangamutima ye. Rev. Robert Sarno ukorere Vatican yavuze ko n’ubwo ijambo rya nyumwa ari irya papa, bidakwiye ko yajya akora uko abyumva. Aba bafite aho bahuriye na Gatulika, bavuga ko uku kwihutisha ibintu ari uguharanira inyungu za Francis bwite cyane cyane ku bantu b’ ibirangirire nka Mama Teresa na Papa Yohani Pawulo wa II. Mana Teresa w ‘I Calcutta ho mu Buhinde, hari abatamwera nk’umuntu udasanzwe. Umunyamakuru w’Umwangereza Tariq Ali,yakoze icyegeranyo gipfabya Teresa mu 1994. Yagize ati “abantu yakizaga bari abantu bari aho ku bituro bategereje gushyingurwa, abantu batabonye ubuvuzi bukwiye. Abashavuye,”. Ibi Francis arimo si byokugira abantu bakoze ubusa abatagatifu si byo.


Mama Teresa w’i Calcutta Nyamara ariko uyu mubyeyi yatangiye no kwitwa umutagatifu na rubanda nyamwinshi n’igihe yari akiri muzima. Yamenyakanye cyane ku kwita ku bitabye Imana.  Mu 1971 niho yavuze iri jambo “indawara mbi  muri iyi minsi si Igituntu cyangwa Leprosy, ahubwo ikiruta ibyo ni ukwiyumvamo ko udakenewe,”. Umutagatifu ni umuntu uba warageregeje kuba intumwa y’Imana, akayibera aho itagaragara. Ibi bitangira gukorwa nibura nyuma y’imyaka itanu amaze gupfa. Byemerezwa I Vatican nyuma yo gusuzuma ibikorwa bye na rapora ituruka muri Dioseze aba ayrakoreregamo, biherekejwe n’ibitangaza nibura bibiri yakoze. 
Papa Francis azaha umugisha ubutagatifu bwa Mama Teresa w’ I Calcutta kuri icyi cyumweru. Benshi mu bakozi ba Vatican ariko ntibabyumva
 Yanditswe na Lucky van Rukundo/Muhabura.rw

title: Polisi y’u Rwanda irashima amadini ku ruhare rwayo mu kurwanya ibyaha bigisha
content:
Polisi y’u Rwanda irashima amadini ku ruhare rwayo mu kurwanya ibyaha bigisha abayoboke bayo kuba intangarugero.
 
Mu rwego rwo guteza imbere ubwo bufatanye no kubushimangira Polisi y’u Rwanda igirana ibiganiro n’abayoboke b’amadini atandukanye cyane cyane urubyiruko maze ikabaha ubumenyi ku buryo  barushaho kugira uruhare  mu gukumira ibyaha. Guhugura abayoboke b’amadini atandukanye bigamije kubasobanurira uruhare rwabo  mu kurwanya ikibi mu muryango nyarwanda; kandi byabyaye umusaruro ushimishije. Ni muri urwo rwego ku itariki 29 Nyakanga Polisi y’u Rwanda yagiranye ikiganiro n’ urubyiruko  rw’Abadivantisite b’Umunsi wa Karindwi rugera kuri 438 ruri mu ngando mu karere ka Nyanza ku bubi  bw’ibiyobyabwenge. Urwo rubyiruko ruturuka mu turere twa Nyanza, Kamonyi, Muhanga na Ruhango. Polisi y’u Rwanda yarwigishije ubwoko bw’ibiyobyabwenge kandi irusobanurira ingaruka zo kubyishoramo. Mu butumwa bwe, ushinzwe imikoranire ya Polisi y’u Rwanda n’abaturage ndetse n’izindi nzego mu karere ka Nyanza, Inspector of Police (IP) Jean Baptiste Bizimana yabwiye urwo rubyiruko ati:"Zimwe mu ngaruka urubyiruko runywa ibiyobyabwenge ruhura na zo harimo gutwara inda zitateganyijwe no gukora ibyaha birimo ubujura, gukubita no gukomeretsa, n’ibindi. Ni yo mpamvu ikoreshwa n’ikwirakwizwa ryabyo bigomba kurwanywa kandi buri wese akumva ko bimureba." Yakomeje ababwira ko uretse gushyira ubuzima bw’ababinywa mu kaga  ibiyobyabwenge biteje ikibazo muri rusange kubera ko bituma abantu bakora ibikorwa binyuranije n’amategeko. IP Bizimana yabwiye kandi urwo rubyiruko ati:" Nk’uko bivugitse  ibiyobyabwenge bihindura imitekerereze y’uwabinyoye. Uretse kumutesha  ubwenge; ubinywa nta buzima aba afite. Mugomba kwirinda ikintu cyose gishobora kwangiza ahazaza hanyu." Yarusobanuriye ko urumogi, Kanyanga n’ibindi biyobyabwenge bitera uwabinyoye gukora  ibyaha nko gufata ku ngufu, gusambanya abana, n’ibindi. Yagize ati:"Akora ibyaha kubera ko nta mutimanama aba afite. Turabasaba kuba abafatanyabikorwa mu gukangurira abandi kwirinda ibiyobyabwenge n’ibindi byaha muri rusange." IP Bizimana na none yagize ati:"Abanyamadini bagira uruhare rukomeye mu gushimangira ihame ry’ubufatanye hagati ya  Polisi y’u Rwanda n’abaturage,turabasaba gukomeza kugira uruhare mu kurwanya no gukumira ibyaha kugira ngo hagerwe ku mutekano usesuye."

 
Yanditswe na Sarongo/Muhabura.rw

title: Wamenya ute  ko impanda y’Imana izavuga nk’uko bivugwa?
content:
Abigisha baragwiriye abavuga ukuri n’abavuga ibinyoma, amadini menshi aravuka ubutitsa, inyota y’abantu benshi turashaka kubwirwa ko imbere yacu ari heza, amasezerano yacu agiye gusohora, imigisha tugiye kubura aho tuyikwiza, tugiye kwishima hejuru y’abanzi bacu n’ibindi nk’ibyo bihwanye n’ukunezerwa kwacu. Ariko uje atubwira kuba maso, utubwiye ko Isi igiye gushira kandi irashirana no kwifuza kwayo, uje avuga ngo twihane ibyaha byacu tube maso Yesu ari hafi kugaruka, uvuze atyo yitwa uwavangiwe .
 Abigisha baragwiriye abavuga ukuri n’abavuga ibinyoma, amadini menshi aravuka ubutitsa, inyota y’abantu benshi turashaka kubwirwa ko imbere yacu ari heza, amasezerano yacu agiye gusohora, imigisha tugiye kubura aho tuyikwiza, tugiye kwishima hejuru y’abanzi bacu n’ibindi nk’ibyo bihwanye n’ukunezerwa kwacu. Ariko uje atubwira kuba maso, utubwiye ko Isi igiye gushira kandi irashirana no kwifuza kwayo, uje avuga ngo twihane ibyaha byacu tube maso Yesu ari hafi kugaruka, uvuze atyo yitwa uwavangiwe n’umuyobe. Mu by’ukuri ni byiza kandi dukeneye rwose ko Imana itugirira neza ikaduha amasezerano menshi meza cyane cyane aduhumuriza kugira ngo tudakomeza guhungabanywa n’imiyaga ya Satani, ariko icyo dukwiriye kwibuka bakundwa, ni uko kuba umuntu yaba mu rusengero, mu Kiriziya n’ahandi hasengerwa, akabona atashye amahoro ejo n’ejobundi bikaba uko akibwira ko ari amahoro nyamara hari ibyo yimitse mu mutima we bibi bibabaza Imana yananiwe kureka ngo yakire imbabazi z’Imana, ibi ntibibuza Imana kumusohoreza isezerano yagiranye na we kugira ngo atazayita inyabinyoma, ariko atakwihana akazasigara kuko isezerano ry’Imana ntaho rihurira no kwezwa kw’ubugingo bw’umuntu kuko gusohora kw’isezerano ntibibuza nyiraryo kurimbuka iyo atihannye icyaha yananiwe kureka. Bibiliya iratubwira ngo “Mu mahanga yose uyubaha agakora ibyo gukiranuka uwo niwe Imana yemera.” Muri iyi minsi tugezemo indirimbo zivuga ko amasezerano asohoye ziraririmbwa tukanezerwa tukumva ko aribwo Imana ivuze, Ijambo ry’Imana rije rivuga ko ejo hacu ari heza niryo rihabwa umwanya ariko hagira ukoma gato ku byaha bikomeje kuyogoza Isi n’abari mu itorero badasigaye, abantu bose, yewe no mu mutima w’umuntu wumvise ubwe ko ariwe ubwirwa muri iryo Jambo ry’Imana agacyahira kure ngo si ibye, undi ati ibi ni ugutera abantu ubwoba n’ibindi. Nshuti bavandimwe turye tunywe tunezerwe ni byiza, iterambere tugenda tugeraho mu mibereho yacu ni ryiza rwose turarikeneye mu buzima bwacu bwa buri munsi, ariko twongere tuzirikane ko ibi byose bidashobora guhindura icyo Bibiliya Ijambo ry’Imana rivuga ko impanda y’Uwiteka izavuga kandi izavuga itunguranye nk’uko Yesu abyihamiriza ubwe ati: “Ariko uwo munsi n’icyo gihe nta we ubizi n’aho baba abamalayika bo mu ijuru cyangwa Umwana w’Imana keretse Data wenyine… Nuko namwe mwitegure kuko igihe mudatekereza ari cyo Umwana w’umuntu azazira.” (Matayo 24: 36 - 44) Nubwo duhora tubibwirwa kenshi tukabifata nk’inkuru zisanzwe zihora zivugwa, ariko mureke twongere twibukiranye ibyo Ijambo ry’Imana ritubwira ko Impanda y’Uwiteka Imana izavuga rwose kandi abejejwe mu mitima yabo nibo bonyine bazayumva basanganire Umwami Yesu ku bicu, abanduye mu mitima yabo n’abazaba batari maso ntibazamenya rwose n’igihe byabereye kuko Bibiliya itubwira ko ari igikorwa kizaba nko guhumbya no guhumura. Uku gutungurana kw’impanda y’imperuka nk’uko tubisoma mu butumwa bwiza uko bwanditswe na Mariko, niho Yesu ubwe atanga ikigereranyo ati: “Ni nk’umuntu wasize urugo rwe ajya mu kindi gihugu, aha abagaragu be ubutware, umuntu wese ahabwa umurimo we, ategeka umukumirizi kuba maso. Ni uko namwe mube maso kuko mutazi igihe nyiri urugo azaziramo atazabatungura agasanga musinziriye. Icyo mbabwira ndakibwira bose nti ‘Mube maso’” Mariko 13: 34-37. “Nk’uko byari biri mu minsi ya Nowa: abantu bararyaga, baranywaga, barashyingiraga, barashyingirwaga bari banezerewe, bageza ku munsi Nowa yinjiriye mu nkuge ntibabimenya. Uko niko bizaba bimeze no mu minsi y’imperuka, ubwo bazaba bavuga bati ni amahoro ni amahoro nibwo kugaruka kw’Umwami wacu Yesu kuzabatungura.” (Matayo 24: 37-44). “Ubwo nibwo bazabona Umwana w’umuntu aje ku bicu afite ubushobozi bwinshi n’ubwiza. Azatuma abamalayika, ateranye intore ze mu birere bine, uhereye ku mpera y’isi ukageza ku mpera y’ijuru” (Mariko 13: 26-27) Nk’uko tubisoma mu gitabo cy’Ibyahishuwe, Yohana yerekwa iby’impanda y’imperuka, yabonye amahanga menshi aterana ati: “Mbona intebe y’ubwami nini yera mbona n’Iyicayeho, isi n’ijuru bihunga mu maso hayo, ahabyo ntihaba hakiboneka. Mbona abapfuye, abakomeye n’aboroheje bahagaze imbere y’iyo ntebe, ni uko ibitabo birabumburwa kandi mbona n’ikindi gitabo kirabumburwa ari cyo gitabo cy’ubugingo, abapfuye bacirwa imanza z’ibyanditswe muri ibyo bitabo zikwiriye ibyo bakoze… Kandi mbona umuntu wese utabonetse ko yanditse muri cya gitabo cy’ubugingo, ajugunywa muri iyo Nyanja yaka umuriro” (Ibyahishuwe 20: 11-15). Bibiliya mu Byahishuriwe Yohana nk’uko ikomeza ibitubwira, igaragaza akaga gakomeye kazakurikirwa n’uko itorero rya Kristo rikuwe mu isi rigiye. Aha ni naho tubona bamwe mubo Ijambo ry’Imana ritubwira bazasigara ubwo Kristo azaba agarutse nk’uko ibyanditswe bitubwira: Abantu ba mbere Bibiliya ivuga ni abantu bose banze kumva ubutumwa bwiza bagakerensa ubuntu bw’Imana.
2. Abantu ba kabiri ni abakiristu bishushanya mu itorero ry’Imana bakirengagiza ukuri, bakibagirwa ko no mu mutima w’umuntu Imana ihabona neza nk’ahambaye ubusa.
3. Abandi bantu ba gatatu Bibiliya itubwira ni abakiristu bose bazaba batabaye maso. Uku kuba impanda izavuga itunguye benshi, nta kundi gusubira inyuma ngo hatangwe agahenge ko kwihana ku bazaba batunguwe nayo basigaye. Ibi mu by’ukuri byari bikwiriye gutuma buri wese wo muri twe yita ku iherezo rye ku giti cye, bigatuma ahora akurikirana uko abanye n’Imana mu mutima we buri munsi, buri saha na buri mwanya, kuko impanda yo kuvuga izavuga nk’uko Ibyanditswe Byera bibitubwira. (Mariko 13: 37) Imana umuremyi wacu, nubwo tutabasha kumunezeza nk’uko bikwiriye ariko aradukunda cyane kandi ntanezezwa n’uko twazarimburanwa na Satani, ahubwo yifuza ko twamwumvira tukazabana mu Bwami bwe iteka mu ijuru. Ndabifuriza kuba maso tukazabona ibihembo by’imirimo myiza twakoze nitugera mu ijuru. Imana idufashe.Abigisha baragwiriye abavuga ukuri n’abavuga ibinyoma, amadini menshi aravuka ubutitsa, inyota y’abantu benshi turashaka kubwirwa ko imbere yacu ari heza, amasezerano yacu agiye gusohora, imigisha tugiye kubura aho tuyikwiza, tugiye kwishima hejuru y’abanzi bacu n’ibindi nk’ibyo bihwanye n’ukunezerwa kwacu. Wamenya ute  ko impanda y’Imana izavuga nk’uko bivugwa?
 Yanditswe na Sarongo Richard

title: Mufti w’u Rwanda yamaganye Abayislamukazi bambara imyambaro ihisha isura hagasigara amaso gusa
content:
Asoza ukwezi kwahariwe Igisibo Gitagatifu ku bayoboke b’idini ya Islam, Umuyobozi w’idini ya Islam mu Rwanda, Sheikh Salim Hitimana yatangaje ko abayisilamukazi bo mu Rwanda batazongera kwambara umwambaro wa Niqab, mu rwego rwo guhashya burundu ibikorwa by’iterabwoba bigirwamo uruhare n’abiyitirira idini ya Islam. Ibi yabitangaje mu muhango wo gusoza ukwezi kw’ igisibo gitagatifu cya Ramadhan uzwi nka Eid Al Fitr wabereye kuri Stade ya Kigali Nyamirambo mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa gatatu, tariki ya 6 Nyakanga. Mufti w’u Rwanda, Sheikh Salim yagaragaje ko iki cyemezo bagifashe nyuma yuko bigaragaye ko uyu mwambaro wagiye ukoreshwa n’abantu batandukanye bagambiriye inyungu zabo mu bikorwa bisebya ndetse bigamije gusenya Islam. Ati “Tugamije guhashya burundu ibikorwa by’iterabwoba twivuye inyuma kuko hari abiyitirira Islam bakijandika mu bugizi bwa nabi.”
Mu minsi ishize, Sheikh Hitimana Salim yatangaje bazicara bagasuzuma ikibazo cy’imyambarire ishobora gukurura ibikorwa by’ubugizi bwa nabi yemezaga ko ishobora gutiza umurindi abakora ibikorwa by’iterabwoba. Umwe mu bayisilamu babashije kuganira natwe batashatse ko amazina yabo atangazwa bavuze ko iki cyemezo cuyafashwe gihabanye n’imyemerere y’idini ya Islam ndetse yibaza aho yaba igana. Niqab ni umwambaro w’abakobwa n’abagore b’Abayisilamu bambara bakipfuka umubiri wose kugeza mu isura bakagaragaza amaso yonyine. U Rwanda ruje rwiyongera ku bihugu nka Cameroun, Congo Brazza Ville, Gabon, Chad, Nigeria na Guinea byaciye iyi myambaro mu rwego rwo kwirinda ibikorwa by’iterabwoba.



 Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Abaturage b’Ubwongereza  kuva mu bihugu bigize EU bihuye n’ubuhanuzi  buri muri Bibiriya “”soma inkuru”
content:
Bizagira ingaruka zitandukanye kumadini amwe n’amwe harimo n’Itorero ry’Abadiventisiti b’Umunsi wa Karindwi.Byashoboka ko ari ubwa mbere wumvise ijambo "Brexit". Si igitangaza kuko iri ni ijambo rishya ryatangiye kwandikwa no mu nkoranyamagambo ! Brexit ni impine ya "Britain Exit" bisobanura icyemezo cyavuye muri Referandumu cg kamarampaka yabaye taliki ya 23/6/2016 yabaye mu bihugu 4 bigize ubwami bw’Ubwongereza aribyo Wales (Pays de Galles),England (Angleterre),Scotland (Ecosse) North Ireland (Ireland du Nord).  Amakuru nkesha BBC avuga ko Uretse Scotland yatoye kuguma mu Muryango wunze ubumwe w’Ibihugu by’Iburayi (EU) ku majwi 62%, ubwami bw’Ubwongereza muri rusange bwatoye kuva muri EU (European Union) ku majwi 52% ni ukuvuga abantu 17,410,742 mu gihe abasaga 48% ni ukuvuga abantu 16,141,241 batoye ko Ubwami bw’Ubwongereza bwaguma muri uyu muryango. 
Trans-Europian Division ariwe Nenad Jepuranovic
 Ushobora kuba wumva ibi ari ibisanzwe ariko siko biri kuko Ubumwe w’Uburayi (EU) ari umuryango washinzwe mu 1993 usimbuye EEC (European Economic Community) yari igamije gukemura ibibazo byatewe n’Intambara 2 z’Isi Yose,ngo Uburayi bwe kuzongera kurwana kandi ngo biteze imbere ubukungu,nk’uko bitangazwa n’urubuga rwa Wikipedia.
Kuba rero ibihugu biri gusohokamo birerekana ko bugiye gucika intege. Abadepite bamwe bo mu bihugu nk’ Ubufaransa,Ubuholande na Danmark nabo batangaje ko hakabaye kamarampaka ngo harebwe ko abaturage b’ibi bihugu bashaka ko byava muri EU. Amakuru ari ho aravuga ko Brexit kandi yatumye ifaranga ry’Abongereza bita Ipawundi (£) rigwa cyane ku buryo butigeze bubaho mu myaka 31 ishize. Ifaranga rya Euro rikoreshwa mu Bumwe bw’Iburayi naryo ryamanutse. Minisitiri w’Intebe w’Ubwongereza David Cameron nawe yaregiye,kandi abakuru b’ibihugu 27 bisigayemo bari gukora inama za huti huti ngo harebwe icyakorwa mu maguru mashya.

title: Gisagara: Urujijo mu rupfu rw’abapadiri babiri; harakekwa amarozi
content:
Mu gihe kitageze ku mezi atatu, abapadiri ba Kiliziya Gatolika bo muri paruwasi ya Byiza mu murenge wa Gikonko, mu karere ka Gisagara bitabye Imana mu buryo butavugwaho rumwe. Abaturage bahamya ko barozwe.


Nyakwigendera Padiri Felicien Hakizimana Padiri Augustin Musada na Felicien Hakizimana bazize indwara zifite ibimenyetso bijya gusa. Uwa mbere wari padiri mukuru, ari na mwarimu muri kaminuza zitandukanye, yapfuye ku wa 31 Werurwe 2016 afite imyaka 62, naho undi yapfuye ku wa 13 Kamena afite imyaka 41. Impfu zabo zakangaranyije cyane abatuye muri ako gace. Abaturage baho bavuga ko bazize uburozi “byanga byakunda” kandi bakongorerana abantu babiri bazi babishe nubwo batabavuga mu ruhame. Ubuyobozi bwa Kiliziya Gatolika mu Rwanda bwo burigengesera mu kwemeza ayo makuru. Musenyeri wa Diyosezi ya Butare akaba n’Umuvugizi wa Kiliziya Gatolika mu Rwanda, Philippe Rukamba, yagize ati” Ibizamini byo kwa muganga byagaragaje ko impyiko n’umwijima bya padiri Musada byangiritse kubera ikintu gifite ubumara yariye. Dutegereje ibisubizo by’ibizamini bya nyuma twakoresheje.” Yakomeje agira ati” Naho padiri Felicien Hakizimana ashobora kuba yarahitanwe n’indwara, yari ibihaha bye byari byarangiritse cyane, bishobora kuba byaragize ingaruka ku mutima.” Agace ka Byiza/Gisagara indiri y’imihango ya gipagani n’ubupfumu
Abaturage bo muri paruwasi ya Byiza baganiriye n’umunyamakuru wa La Nouvelle Releve bavuga ko bahora mu rwikekwe rukomeye rushingiye ku marozi.
Habineza, umuturage uturanye paruwasi avuga ko hari benshi cyane bapfa barozwe, kandi ko uburozi butangirwa cyane mu birori. Ati” Muri aka gace haba uburozi cyane, kandi butangirwa mu makwe no mu minsi mikuru. Bavuga ko padiri Musada yanyoye uburozi buvanze n’urwagwa ariko ntibavuga niba yararogewe mu kigo cya paruwasi cyangwa hanze.” Undi nawe utashatse ko izina ritangazwa yagize ati” Padiri Musada twese tuzi ko yarozwe. Na mbere y’uko yoherezwa muri Afurika y’Epfo aho yaguye amakuru yo kurogwa kwe yaracicikanaga bamwe banatangaje ko arapfa nta kabuza. Ariko ntawabyitagaho, njye ntekereza ko byanga byakunda yarozwe.” Abapadiri n’abandi bayobozi ba Kiliziya birinze kwemeza amakuru y’uburozi
Abayobozi ba diyoseze ya Butare banze gutangaza amakuru y’uko aba bapadiri barozwe. Bahisemo kuvuga ko abo bapadiri bazize “urupfu rusanzwe” kuko ibyo abaganga batangaje bitemeza ko abo bapadiri bishwe n’umuntu uturutse hanze. Abandi bapadiri bo bamaze kumva uburyo bagenzi babo bapfuye baguye mu kantu. Abakirisitu b’imena muri paruwasi ya Byiza bo birinze kubyinjiramo cyane batinya kuvuguruza amakuru yatanzwe n’ubuyobozi bwa kiliziya n’inzego z’ibanze. Umukuru wa santarari ya Musha, Onesphore Habineza yagize ati” Njye nahisemo gutegereza amakuru azatangwa n’ubuyobozi bwa kiliziya na Leta. Ariko ikigaragara ni uko hari icyihishe inyuma y’ibi bintu.”
Umuyobozi wa Caritas ya Butare, padiri Rebero we ntiyemeranya n’abavuga ko padiri Musada yaba yararogewe mu rwagwa. Ati” Nabanye na padiri Musada igihe kirekire i Nyanza n’i Butare. Ntawe bagiranaga ikibazo, aho yanyuraga hose abakirisitu baramwishimiraga. Yari umuntu wita ku buzima bwe cyane kandi yanywaga gake cyane gashoboka. Ibihuha by’uko yarozwe kuri ubu sinabyemera cyangwa ngo mbihakane, si ubwa mbere tubura abapadiri.” Musada akimara gufatwa, yabanje kuvurirwa mu bitaro bya Gikonko, amaze gukomerezwa yoherezwa muri Afurika y’Epfo ari naho yaguye. Padiri Medard Cyebambe wasimbuye Musada muri paruwasi Byiza avuga ko kugeza ubu abakirisitu baho bashenguwe n’agahinda. Ati” Birababaje sinarega abakirisitu cyangwa undi uwo ari we wese kuba yararoze bagenzi banjye. Urupfu rwa Musada na Felicien rwadusize mu gahinda gakomeye. Kuheza n’ubu ntiturabyakira ntituzabibagirwa. Nta wabura kugira ibyo akeka nyuma yo kubona uko bapfuye, turagerageza guhoza abakirisitu tubasaba gusenga cyane. Imana ibahe iruhuko ridashira.”


Fabien Hakizimana, umuvandimwe wa padiri Cyebambe afite ubwoba ko uyu mupadiri nawe ashobora kwicwa, mu igihe cyose uwishe abamubanjirije akidegembya. Ati “Mpangayikishijwe n’umuvandimwe wanjye wimuriwe muri paruwasi yica abapadiri bayo. Abantu bose bavuga ko bariya bapadiri barozwe. Ntawe uzi ngo ni inde, byagenze gute, bazize iki.” Abayobozi b’akarere ka Gisagara nabo batewe impungenge n’izi mpfu
Umuyobozi w’akarere ka Gissagara wungirije ushinzwe imibereho myiza y;abaturage, Clemence Gasengayire avuga urupfu rw’abo bapadiri rwasize abaturage mu rujijo n’ubwoba budasanzwe, cyane cyane abagatolika. Ati” Abakirisitu ba paruwasi Byiza baguye mu kantu kubera urupfu rw’abapadiri babo. Urebye uko bapfuye biteye urujijo. Hari byinshi byo gukemanga . Kuri ubu muri rusange ibintu byasubiye mu buryo.” Ku wa 19 Kamena, Musenyeri wa Diyosezi wa Butare, Philippe Rukamba yasuye paruwasi ya Byiza ahumuriza abakirisitu, abasaba gutegereza ibizamini bya nyuma byo kwa muganga bikemeza niba koko abo bapadiri bararo Yanditswe na LA NOUVELLE RELEVE MUHABURA.RW

title: Ndahiro Tom yatanze ubutumwa kuri Papa Francis ku byakozwe na Kiliziya ya Kabgayi
content:
Mgr Smaragde Mbonyintege wa Diyosezi ya Kabgayi ahakana ko bafite gahunda yo kwifatanya n’abapadiri mu kwizihiza yubile y’imyaka 25 barimo abahamijwe ibyaha bya Jenoside, umushakashatsi kuri Jenoside Tom Ndahiro akavuga ko nta kindi Mbonyintege yakora atari ukubihakana, ariko ko bikojeje isoni Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Kabgayi, Smaragde Mbonyintege, aravuga ko nta gahunda kiliziya gatulika ifite yo kwifatanya n’abapadiri barimo abajenosideri mu kwihiza yubile y’imyaka 25. Ibi arabihakana hashingiwe ku butumire bwanditswe mu izina rye ariko akavuga ko atari we wabwanditse. Ni ibaruwa y’ubutumire yakwirakwijwe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga nka Twitter. Umwe mu bayikwirakwije ni umushakashatsi kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, Tom Ndahiro, wemeza ko iyi baruwa yanditswe na Kiliziya Gatulika, ati “Ni bo bayanditse, ibyo kuyihakana birumvikana ko ari amatakirangoyi”. Tom Ndahiro, kuri Twitter, yabwiye Umushumba wa Kiliziya gatulika ku Isi, Papa Francis (@Pontifex) ko ibyakozwe na Kiliziya ya Kabgayi, byo gutangaza ko izifatanya n’abapadiri bizihiza yubile barimo abakoze jenoside (Rukundo Emmanuel na Ndagijimana Joseph), bikojeje isoni. 
Mgr Smaragde Mbonyintege wa Diyosezi ya Kabgayi ahakana ko bafite gahunda yo kwifatanya n’abapadiri mu kwizihiza yubile y’imyaka 25 barimo abahamijwe ibyaha bya Jenoside
Magingo aya Mgr Mbonyintege ntabwo ari mu Rwanda. Ari mu nama i Kinshasa muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo. Ubutumwa bwe bunyomoza buragira buti, “Njye nibaza n’uwabitangaje uwo ari we, icyo yashakaga. Ntabwo ari byo, ntabwo ari byo! Nabyumvise, tuzakora yubile y’abapadiri bitwaye neza bari mu gihugu. Ayo ni yo makuru twabatangariza.” Abajijwe uwo akeka waba wanditse ubwo butumire bwazamuye uburakari bwa benshi, Mgr Mbonyintege yagize ati “Ubwo butumire uwabukoze ni ibyo yiyandikiye ntaho bihuriye n’ubutumwa bw’umwepiskopi kuko ntabwo nakoze njyewe. Abazakorerwa yubile ni abari mu gihugu, ntabwo ari abafunze cyangwa abari mu mahanga. Abazakorerwa yubile ni batatu.” Nyuma yo kumva Mgr Mbonyintege ahakana ibyo kwandika iyi baruwa, Izubarirashe.rw ryashatse kumenya aho Tom Ndahiro yayikuye, yanga kuhatubwira ariko aduhamiriza ko yayihawe n’umuntu wo muri kiliziya kandi yizeye cyane ku buryo adatekereza ko yamupfunyikiye ikibiribiri. Ati “Ikibazo ni ukuvuga ngo, nibasohore lisite bariya bantu batarimo kuko ni abantu bari bagiye gukora yubile y’imyaka 25, icya kabiri nibavuge position yabo (aho bahagaze) ku muntu wakoze jenoside, ko amategeko y’isi yabahannye bo babagenje gute?” Tom Ndahiro avuga ko kuba kiliziya ibihakana n’ubundi nta kindi yakora atari ukubihakana. Ati “Ntabwo twavuga ababiduhaye kugira ngo batabamerera nabi, ariko birahari ntabwo duhubuka dutyo. Mu gihe gito nerekanye umupadiri wakatiwe ufungiye ku Gisenyi warimo asomana misa na musenyeri…” Aha yakomozaga ku mupadiri witwa Edouard Ntuliye wakatiwe gufungwa burundu nyuma yo guhamwa n’uruhare muri jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ugaragara ku ifoto ari kumwe na Musenyeri wa Diyosezi ya Nyundo Anaclet, barimo basoma misa muri gereza, iyi foto na yo Tom Ndahiro akaba yayishyize kuri Twitter. Abajijwe n’umunyamakuru w’Izubarirashe.rw aho yo yayikuye, yabaye nk’utangara ati “Erega mwibimbaza mugende murebe, nonese ntihari abafungwa imbere yabo? Erega ntabwo bari bonyine, hari n’abapadiri bandi babiri.” Mgr Mbonyintege avuga ko mu mategeko ya kiliziya gatulika bitemewe ko umupadiri wakatiwe uri muri gereza asoma misa, akavuga ko adakeka ko ibyo byabayeho, ko ababikwirakwije babeshya. Tom Ndahiro ushinjwa kubeshya ariko, akabaza ati “Ko ubutumire bwabo ubusanzwe butangwa mbere y’amezi abiri, ubu ngubu bazabukora ryari? (cyane ko yubile izaba kuwa 16 Nyakanga 2016).” Ashingira kuri ibi yemeza ko ubutumire yakwirakwije adashidikanya ko bwanditswe na kiliziya gatulika kuko yubile isigaje ukwezi kutagera no kuri kumwe. Musenyeri Mbonyintege avuga ko nagera mu Rwanda gukora ubwo butumire ari cyo kintu azaheraho, agahakana yivuye inyuma ko ubwakwirakwijwe ari ubwabo, agasaba abantu kutabuha agaciro, ati “ni iby’abantu bikorera ku bwo gushyushya imitwe, ibyo mwe kubyitaho.” Ku kibazo cy’umupadiri wagaragaye yambaye imyenda ya gipadiri asoma misa ari kumwe na Musenyeri wa Diyosezi wa Nyundo, byo avuga ko adakeka ko byabaye, ko umupadiri wakatiwe atemerewe gusoma misa, ariko ko kuba yakwambara umwenda wa gipadiri byo ntawe byagakwiye gutangaza. Ati “Ikibazo mugomba kumva, nka Leta, iyo umuntu ari umujenosideri aba ari Umunyarwanda nk’abandi. Leta iramutunga iramugaburira, iramwambika, nonese umupadiri wakoze jenoside ni we utatungwa, ni we utagaburirwa nk’abandi? Ntabwo akorerwa ibirori, ntabwo avuga misa, keretse igihe bavuze ko ari umwere cyangwa se afunguwe arangije ibihano. Ariko igihe ari muri gereza afunzwe arasurwa nk’izindi mfungwa zose, ahabwa ukarisitiya nk’abandi kuko biba bifatwa nk’aho yicujije. Iyaba bayisomaga ntabwo twagombaga kujyayo (abapadiri baturuka hanze ya gereza). Tujyayo kuzisoma kandi bahari, zisomwa n’umupadiri uvuye hanze. Umunyamakuru: Ariko uriya biragaragagara yambaye imyenda ya gipadiri asoma misa… Mgr Mbonyintege: Ariko se kwambara abandi baba barimo bo ntibaba bambaye? Nta kintu kimubuza kuyambara kuko niba imfungwa tuzikurikiranira hafi, tukazigaburira tukazambika, ntabwo bimubuza kuba ari umunyacyaha, ariko hariho uburenganzira bw’ibanze bugenerwa imfungwa. Via:Izuba

 Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Papa Francis, yavuze ko Kiliziya Gatolika ikwiye gusaba imbabazi abatinganyi
content:
