Papa Francis, yavuze ko Kiliziya Gatolika ayoboye ikwiye gusaba imbabazi abatinganyi kubera uburyo yabahaye akato mu gihe cyashize. Ibi yabivuze ubwo yari avuye muri Armenia ku Cyumweru mu kiganiro yagiranye n’itangazamakuru ari mu ndege.
Umunyamakuru yamubajije niba yemeranya n’umwe mu bajyanama be uherutse gutangaza ko Kiliziya ikwiye gusaba imbabazi kubera yabahaye akato.

title: Umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika yahumurije ibihumbi by’abanya-Armenia mu muhango wo kwibuka jenoside yabakorewe
content:
Umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika yahumurije ibihumbi by’abanya-Armenia bari bateraniye mu murwa mukuru Yerevan, abasaba kwifashisha ingufu z’urukundo mu guhindura ibikomere “isoko y’imbabazi n’amahoro” no gushaka ubwiyunge n’igihugu cy’abaturanyi cya Turikiya. Ubwo yasuraga urwibutso rwa Jenoside muri Yerevan, Papa yanditse mu gitabo cy’abashyitsi ati “Kwibuka ntibigomba gupfobywa cyangwa ngo byibagirane, kandi kwibuka ni isoko y’amahoro n’ahazaza heza.” Papa akomeza avuga ko kwibuka byuzuye urukundo bifasha umuntu gushaka ibisubizo bishya, aho icyari urwango gihinduka imishinga y’ubwiyunge. Gusa ibyo Papa yavuze ntibyanyuze Leta ya Turikiya, kuko Minisitiri w’Intebe wungirije Nurettin Canikli yavuze ko ayo magambo ye adakwiriye kuvugwa. Gusa mu isengesho rya Papa Francis yasabye Imana guha abanya-Armenia na Turikiya imbaraga ziberekeza mu nzira y’ubwiyunge. The NewYork Times yatangaje ko ubwo Papa yaherukaga kuvuga amagambo nk’aya muri Mata 2015, Turikiya yahise ihamagaza igitaraganya Ambasaderi wayo i Vatican, hashira amezi 10 nta wundi bohereje. Jenoside yakorewe abanya-Armenia yahitanye ababarirwa muri miliyoni n’igice, ikozwe n’ubwami bwa Ottoman, ariko Turikiya ntivuga rumwe n’abita ubwo bwicanyi ‘Jenoside’. 

Yanditswe na Eddie Mwerekande/Muhabura.rw

title: Abafurere bo mu Rwanda bafite impungenge zo gukendera burundu
content:
Abasore b’Abanyarwanda bagana inzira yo kwiha Imana “Ubufurere” bararushaho kugabanuka ndetse n’abagezeyo bagakurikirana inyungu bamara kuzibona bakigarukira mu buzima busanzwe. Iki kibazo gihangayikishije cyane abihaye Imana b’Abafurere Maristes bo mu Rwanda, bavuga ko bibagiraho ingaruka nyinshi, zirimo umurimo wo kurera abana benshi cyane barenze ubushobozi bwabo no kuba bafite impungenge z’ejo hazaza habo, igihe abarimo bazaba bashaje. Furere Rusanganwa Protais uyobora ishuri TTC Mururu yabwiye Imvaho Nshya ko kugeza ubu umubare w’abasore babagana ari muke cyane, aho bafite abafurere 25 gusa kandi hakurikijwe imirimo bakenewemo bagombye kuba nibura nka 50. Avuga ko aba 25 kandi na bo, bose badakora mu Rwanda gusa kuko hari n’abari mu bihugu byo hanze, akabona ari ikibazo cy’ingorabahizi. Avuga ko Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 yashegeshe cyane uyu muryango, kuko uretse guhitana abana benshi barererwaga mu mashuri yabo, n’abarimu babigishaga, Abafurere Maristes 7 na bo bishwe ku buryo byasize icyuho gikomeye cyane. Abajijwe impamvu abona abasore batakitabira kwiha Imana, yagize ati “Ntabwo ari uko bataza. Baraza ahubwo usanga baza bakurikiye izindi nyungu, nk’amashuri kuko ahenda cyane kandi twe tubigisha ku buntu, bakagera kure mu mahanga biga batarishye, barangiza ibyo hanze, cyane cyane imirimo yinjiza menshi, n’ibindi bihari bikabakurura kuko baba bafite ubumenyi bukenewe, abenshi bagahita bavamo bakigendera.’’ Ikindi abona kibakuramo ni uko ubundi ugiyemo arahirira kwiyemeza ubukene, aho umuntu atagira umutungo yigengaho, kandi bamwe baba bashaka gufasha imiryango yabo, atanga urugero nko ku baba barasigaye bonyine cyangwa barasigaye ari mbarwa mu miryango yabo kubera Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Abo ngo babona batazabishobora bagahitamo kuvamo bakajya gushaka akazi ahandi bazigengaho no kungura umuryango wabo bashaka abagore. Avuga ko bituma bavunika ndetse bamwe bakanavunika cyane kugeza ubwo bahabwa ibiruhuko bitari ngombwa, ariko ko babaye benshi byafasha. Yagize ati “Nk’ubu hano hari abanyeshuri benshi cyane kandi turi Abafurere 4 gusa, tugomba kuyobora no kwigisha, ugasanga biratuvunnye cyane kandi n’ahandi ni ko bimeze, ku buryo hari n’abaduha amashuri twitaho tukayanga kuko tutayashobora.” Avuga ko bagiye gukora ubukangurambaga bahereye ku bana biga mu byaro bakabakundisha uyu muryango, kugira ngo babone abawuzamo, akavuga ko ikibazo kiri hose, ku buryo amaherezo bizakorwa ku rwego rwa Kiliziya Gatulika yose. Ibi byanakozwe n’umushumba wa Diyoseze Gatulika ya Cyangugu, Musenyeri Bimenyimana Jean Damascène; ubwo yari muri TTC Mururu mu kwizihiza Mutagatifu Marcellin Champagnat washinze uyu muryango, yakanguriye abanyeshuri bahiga kuza kuziba icyuho kiri mu bihaye Imana bake muri rusange kandi ko bazakirwa neza.
 Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Islam mu Rwanda yabonye umuyobozi Mushya
content: Mufti mushya w’Idini ya Islam mu Rwanda, Sheikh Salim Hitimana yatangaje ko agiye kurwanya iterabwoba ryitirirwa abayisilamu bo mu Rwanda aho riva rikagera. Ibi uyu muyobozi mushya w’umuryango w’abayisilamu mu Rwanda (RMC)yabitangaje mu muhango w’ihererekanyabubasha n’uwo asimbuye wabaye kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya 3 Kamena 2016. Yagize ati “ Ndemeza ko ishusho y’abayislamu bo mu Rwanda ikiri nziza kandi turifuza ko yakomeza kuba nziza igihe cyose , n’utwo tubazo twabonetse twabonetse ku bantu bakeya cyane cyane ko abayislamu benshi badafite imyumvire y’iterabwoba kandi turi mu nkundura yo guhashya ibitekerezo nk’ibyo byototeye bamwe mu rubyiruko rwacu.” Mufti Sheikh Salim Hitimana yakomeje ashimangira ko afite ingamba zikomeye zo kurwanya iterabwoba ryitirirwa idini ya Islam. Yagize ati “ Ingamba zo kurirwanya zo zirahari kandi nyinshi ndetse zirimo no kugerageza no kuba twagera ku rwego rwo gushaka bariya bantu twibaza ko baba bafite ibitekerezo nka biriya tukabegeranya tukabashyira hamwe mu rwego rwo kugira ngo tubigishe tunabaha ishusho ndetse n’inyigisho z’ukuri za islam zitandukanye n’iriya myumvire kugira ngo ibavemo.” Uretse kurwanya iterabwoba ryitirirwa idini ya Islam, Mufti Sheikh Salim Hitimana yanemeje ko agiye kwita ku ireme ry’uburezi cyane cyane mu bigo by’abayisilamu birimo n’ibyigisha imyuga mu rwego rwo kuzamura urubyiruko mu bihe biri imbere. Mufti ucyuye igihe Sheikh Kayitare Ibrahimu, we yasabye umuyobozi mushya w’abayisilamu mu Rwanda gukomeza kunga ubumwe mu bayisilamu bo mu Rwanda. Yagize ati “ Imbogamizi ikomeye ni imwe nta yindi ni ubumwe bw’abayisilamu kuko amakimbirane yaranze abayisilamu ubwabo no mu nzego zabo zitandukanye.” Yakomeje avuga ko icyamushimishije ari uko asoje manda uku gushyamirana kose kwagiye kugaragara mu nzego zose zitandukanye za RMC kwararangiye, abayizilamu bose bavuga rumwe, ku buryo yizeye ko ikigiye kujyaho ari ugutangira kureba uko bakomeza kubaka uyu muryango. Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Bukavu: Urugendo rw’amahoro rwahuje abakirisitu Gatorika b’Abanyarwanda n’Abanye Congo
content:
Mu rwego rwo gushimangira ubufatanye n’ubuvandimwe busanzwe buranga Diyoseze gatulika ya Cyangugu yo mu Rwanda na Arikidiyoseze ya Bukavu muri RDC, abakirisitu bagera ku 3000 barimo abagera kuri 500 baturutse muri Diyoseze gatulika ya Cyangugu bahuriye mu rugendo rw’amahoro n’igitambo cya misa i Bukavu. Mu rugendo rw’ibilometero birenga 6 kuva ku mupaka w’u Rwanda na RDC wa Rusizi ya mbere mu karere ka Rusizi, kugera ku cyicaro cya Arikidiyoseze gatulika ya Bukavu, mu mujyi rwagati wa Bukavu, aba banyarwanda n’abanyekongo berekanye ko ari abavandimwe koko. Mu rugendo bakoze baririmbaga indirimbo zihimbaza Imana, bagaragaza ibyiza byo kubana kivandimwe nk’abana b’Imana imwe. Mu gitambo cya misa cyanitabiriwe na Minisitiri w’intara ya Kivu y’amajyepfo ushinzwe ubutegetsi bw’igihugu, umutekano, umuco no kwegereza abaturage ubuyobozi, Pasiteri Eciba Mboko Lutho na Perezida w’inteko ishinga amategeko y’intara ya Kivu y’amajyepfo Emile Baleke, abakirisitu bibukijwe guharanira amahoro. Musenyeri François Xavier Maroyi, umushumba wa Arikidiyoseze gatulika ya Bukavu, yabwiye iyo mbaga ko kiliziya zombi zafashe umurongo wo guharanira amahoro n’ubufatanye mu bakirisitu babo. Yakomeje avuga ko buri wese agomba guharanira ko mugenzi we abaho neza, ikiyaga cya Kivu n’umugezi wa Rusizi ntibibe umupaka, ahubwo bigafatwa nk’isangano rihuza abavandimwe bombi, bakagenderanira nta nkomyi. Minisitiri Eciba Mboko Lutho, yagize ati:“ Abanyarwanda n’abanyekongo turi abavandimwe kuva kera, nubwo muri kano gace dutuyemo hagiye hagaragara umutekano muke watewe n’intambara zagiye zihibasira, hakaba n’imitwe y’abagizi ba nabi yakomeje kuhashinga ibirindiro, bigasa n’ibihungabanije umubano w’abaturage bacu. Ariko turishimira ko icyizere cyagarutse, mukaba mukora ibikorwa byinshi bibahuza, nk’ibi by’amasengesho, ubusabane, ubucuruzi n’ibindi, tugashimira abasenyeri bombi imbaraga mushyira mu kubanisha abaturage bacu, tukaba tubari inyuma muri ibi bikorwa byiza mukora.” Musenyeri Bimenyimana Jean Damascène, umushumba wa Diyoseze gatulika ya Cyangugu, yatangarije Imvaho Nshya ko hamaze gukorwa byinshi mu mubano mwiza w’abakirisitu ba Diyoseze zombi, bikaba bigomba kongerwamo ingufu bigakomeza. Yagize ati:“Twashyizeho ihuriro COSOPAX ry’abagore bakora ubucuruzi bwambukiranya imipaka muri Diyoseze za Cyangugu, Uvira, Bujumbura na Arikidiyoseze ya Bukavu, rihuje abagore 60, hateganijwe n’ibindi byinshi tuzahuriraho. Kuba tubasha guhuza imbaga ingana gutya y’ibihugu byombi, bagasengana, bagasabana nta bwishishanye, ni intambwe ikomeye yatewe mu mubano w’abaturage bombi kandi tuzayikomeza, tukifuza ko yagera mu madini n’amatorero yose, ari yo mpamvu nazanye na bamwe mu bapasiteri ngo baturebereho.” Abakirisitu na bo bagaragaje ibyishimo baterwa n’ibi bikorwa byiza bibahuza, biyemeza gukomeza kubishyigikira.

 Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Minisitiri w’Intebe yitabiriye umuhango wo kwimika Musenyeri wa Diyosezi ya Nyundo
content:
Ubwo yari mu birori byo kwimika Umushumba mukuru wa Diyosezi Gaturika ya Nyundo, Mwumvaneza Anaclet , Minisitiri w’Intebe Murekezi Anastase yongeye gusaba abanyamadini bamamaza ibihuha n’ubuhanuzi bw’ibinyoma ko bakwihana.  Umuhango wo kwimika Musenyeri mushya wa Diyosezi Gatolika ya Nyundo wabaye ejo hashize ku wa gatandatu tariki ya 21 Gicurasi 2016. Muri uyu muhango, Musenyeri Mwumvaneza Anaclet yasimbuye Alexis Habiyambere. Uyu muhango witabiriwe na Minisitiri w’Intebe Murekezi Anastase wasabye Abanyarwanda, abanyamadini n’amatorero guhora babyaza umusaruro amahirwe bahabwa n’ubuvandimwe, kuko ubuvandimwe babutozwa na gahunda ya “Ndi Umunyarwanda” ifasha komora ibikomere Abanyarwanda batewe n’ibihe bibi igihugu cyanyuzemo. Minisitiri w’Intebe akaba yaraboneyeho kwamagana abanyamadini bitwaza amadini yabo bakayifashisha mu kwamamaza ibihuha n’ubuhanuzi bw’ibinyoma, maze abasaba kwihana. Ati “Dukwiye kubana n’Imana duharanira kubana neza nk’abanyagihugu, dukunda igihugu n’abagituye.” Murekezi akaba yarasabye abanyamaini n’amatorero kurwanya abafite ibitecyerezo bibi birimo gusenya, kwiba, amacakubiri, bakayoboka inzira y’Imana n’inzira y’iterambere ry’u Rwanda. Yavuze ko iyo nzira nziza izirana n’amakimbirane. Minisitiri w’Intebe yavuze ko ibibazo byose bikwiye gukemuka, dore ko ahanini biterwa n’imiryango itakigendera ku ndangagaciro na kirazira y’umuco nyarwada. Yavuze ko Abanyarwanda bose nibakundana bizatuma igihugu kirushaho gutera imbere. Murekezi akaba yaravuze ko leta izashyigikira imibereho myiza ya Diyosezi ya Nyundo kuko ihuye na gahunda ya leta yo guteza imbere Abanyarwanda. Yashimiye Musenyeri Habiyambere uruhare yagize mu guteza imbere Abakirisitu n’abaturage muri rusange. Yasabye Musenyeri mushya Mwumvaneza Anaclet kugira uruhare mu guhanangana n’ibibazo byose biri muri Diyoseze ye. Yanamusabye gukomeza amateka iyi diyoseze yasigiwe na Musenyeri Aloyizi Bigirumwami washize Diyosezi Gaturiaka ya Nyundo, akanaba musenyeri wa mbere w’u Rwanda w’Umwirabura. Yamusabye kugendera ku nama nziza azakomeza kugirwa na Musenyeri ucyuye igihe. Yongeyeho ko Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ishima uburyo higishwa ijambo ry’Imana, ikanashima Kirizaya Gaturika ubufatanye mu burezi, ubuvuzi, imibereho myiza y’abaturage, ubumwe n’ubwiyunge. Ati “Turifuza gukomeza gukorana neza, duharanira kwihutisha iterambere ry’Abanyarwanda muri rusange.” Musenyeri Habiyambere Alexis ucyuye igihe yari amaze imyaka 19 ayobora Diyosezi Gatolika ya Nyundo, akaba agiye mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru. Yashimye abakirisitu n’abaturage bahinduye imyumvire bakamufasha kugera ku byo yari yari yariyemeje. Naho Musenyeri Mwumvaneza Anaclet yashimiye Perezida Paul Kagame uburyo ashyigikiye Kiriziya Gaturika n’Abanyarwada muri rusamge mu iterambere ryabo. Yijeje gukomeza umurongo abamubanjirije batangiye wo guteza imbere iyi diyoseze.
Kugeza ubu Diyosezi Gatolika ya Nyundo ifite abapadiri bakababaka 100, n’abadiyakoni n’abapadiri icyenda bazabuhabwa uyu mwaka. Iyi diyosezi ifite amaparuwasi 24. Musenyeri mushya wimitswe, Mwumvaneza Anaclet, ni uwa gatanu mu bayoboye iyi Diyosezi imaze imyaka 64 ishinzwe.


 
Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Rubavu:Umuyobozi w’Itorero ry’Abadivantisiti yahaye u Rwanda Umugisha
content:
Umuyobozi W’Itorero ry’Abadivantisiti b’Umunsi wa Karindwi, Ted Wilson, yahamije umugisha Imana yahaye ubutaka bw’u Rwanda mu ruzinduko yagiriye mu karere ka Rubavu guhera kuri uyu wa Gatanu. Ted Wilson, wageze mu Rwanda guhera ku mugoroba wok u wa Kane yakiriwe bidasanzwe mu Karere ka Rubavu aho azamara ibyumweru bibiri mu ivugabutumwa rigamije gukangurira abanyarwanda kugandukira Imana bumvira amategeko yayo n’ay’igihugu. Iri vugabutumwa riteganyijwe mu turere 30 tw’u Rwanda rizakorerwa mu duce dusaga 2300. Akigera mu karere ka Rubavu kuri uyu wa gatanu, Ted Wilson yakiranywe ibyishimo byinshi n’imbaga y’Abadivantisiti bari bamaze iminsi myinshi bamwiteguye cyane ko ibikorwa byo kumwitegura byari bimaze igihe kitari gito bikorwa. Ted Wilson yavuze ko na we yashimishijwe n’uburyo yakiriwe n’abakirisito, anavuga ko ubutaka bw’u Rwanda bwahawe umugisha ndetse yongera gusaba Imana gukomeza kurwongerera imigisha. Yahamije ko kuba u Rwanda rufite ibyiza nyaburanga byinshi n’umutekano usesuye nta gisa na byo, ati “Mufite igihugu cyiza gituje, ni ahantu nabonye heza ho kuba; muri Abanyamugisha banyarwanda. Naje kubasura ngira ngo tumarane ibyumweru bibiri nabakunze cyane kandi nakunze igihugu cyanyu muratekanye. Ubutumwa nzatanga mfite icyizere ko buzacengera imitima kuko ibisabwa byose mubyujuje murusheho gukundana.” Abakirisito b’Abadivantisite bavuga ko uku gusura u Rwanda n’Akarere ka Rubavu by’umwihariko hari umusaruro mwinshi bizatanga yaba mu ivugabutumwa ndetse no mu bikorwa bifatika dore ko hazabaho kuvura abaturage ku buntu, kuremera abatishoboye n’ibindi. Murenzi Janvier, Umuyobozi w’akarere ka Rubavu wungirije ushinzwe iterambere, imari n’ubukungu yishimiye uru ruzinduko anavuga ko ari amahirwe menshi ku baturage muri rusange. Yagize ati “Uyu ni umugisha udasanzwe ku Rwanda cyane abakiristo kuko ni amahirwe adapfa kubonwa n’igihugu icyo aricyo cyose. Uru ruzinduko ruzafasha mu iyogezabutumwa no mu buzima busanzwe bwongera ubukungu bw’Akarere muri rusange. Iirimo yo kwitegura yakozwe neza kandi yatanze akazi abaturage barinjiza, amahoteli agiye kwakira abashyitsi, turabona inyungu zizagera ku bantu benshi muri rusange.” Yakomeje ashimira uburyo Abadivantisiti bakomeje gufasha mu iterambere ry’ibikorwa remezo mu karere ka Rubavu no mu gihugu muri rusange. Biteganyijwe ko Ted Wilson azigishiriza ku itorero y’Abadiventiste ryitwa Gate of Hope riri mu mujyi wa Gisenyi i Rubavu.Src:Imvaho




Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Ese Waba uzi ibitangaza bitanu biruta ibindi byose ?
content:
Abantu benshi, cyane cyane mu Matorero y’Ubutumwa Bwiza, yizera Yesu (Evangelical churches), bifuza kubona ibitangaza by’Imana, kandi koko birakenewe (Abaheburayo 2: 4). MUHABURA.RW  yabashakiye Ibitangaza bitanu biruta ibindi byose, ngo bitumen nawe  ibindi ubishaka kurushaho.  1.Kuremwa n’Imana  Iki ni igitangaza kibimburira ibindi byose, kuko Ibyanditswe Byera bitubwira ko Imana yaremye umuntu mw’ishusho yayo (Itangiriro 1: 26-27). Kandi wibuke ko Imana yakuremye kubera ubushake bwayo (Ibyahishuwe 4:11). Kuko iyo Imana itakurema ubu uba uri ubusa gusa, kandi nta n’uwakizwa ngo azajye mw’Ijuru atarabanje kuremwa! Imana ihabwe icyubahiro, kandi ishyirwe hejuru.
 Iki gitangaza cyo ntawe utaragikorewe, uriho wese yakagombye guha Imana icyubahiro.

2.Kumva Inkuru nziza y’agakiza Kumva Inkuru Nziza y’Agakiza gatangwa ku buntu kubwo kwizera Yesu Kristo, Umwana w’Imana (Abefeso 2:8), ni igitangaza gikomeye cyane, kuko ntawakwizera atumvise, “kuko kwizera kuzanwa no kumva, kumva kukazanwa n’ Ijambo rya Kristo” (Abaroma 10: 14, 17). Hari abantu benshi bapfira mu byaha batumvise Inkuru Nziza y’Agakiza, barumvise inyigisho z’ibinyoma zitera kurimbuka.
Hari ibihugu byinshi, ubu bigera hafi kuri 50! bitemera ko Inkuru Nziza y’Agakiza ibwirizwa-dukwiriye kubibuka mu masengesho, kandi Imana yadushoboza, tumaze kuzura Umwuka wera, tukabashyira Ubutumwa Bwiza.

3. Guhinduka Icyiremwa gishya   Guhinduka icyaremwe gishya, umwana w’Imana, n’umuragwa w’ubugingo buhoraho, kubwo kwihana ibyaha (kubabazwa n’ibyaha, ukabyatura, ukabireka burundu) no kwizera Yesu Kristo, Umwuka Wera akaguturamo (Yohana 1: 12/2 Abakorinto 7: 10/Abaroma 8: 15-17). Iki gitangaza kirakomeye cyane, kuko utarakiriye icyo gitangaza, ntabwo azajya mw’Ijuru, ahubwo azarimbuka iteka ryose, mu muriro utazima (Ibyahishuwe 21: 8).  4.Kunesha icyaha  Ibyanditswe Byera bitubwira ko icyibi kidakwiriye kutunesha, ahubwo dukwiriye kuneshesha ikibi icyiza (Abaroma 12: 21). Iki ni igitangaza nacyo gikomeye cyane, kuko unesha niwe ufite icyo azaragwa mu bwami bw’Imana (Ibyahishuwe 2: 7, 11, 17, 26/ 3: 5, 12, 21). Nicyo gituma, niba koko warakiriye Yesu Kristo nk’Umukiza n’Umwami, ukwiriye gusaba Imana ikakuzuza Umwuka Wera, kubika mu mutima Ijambo ry’Imana no gurihishurirwa ngo ubashe kunesha icyaha (Abafiripi 4: 13/ Zaburi 119 : 11, 130). Kunesha ni kimwe mu bimenyetso biranga abana b’Imana nyakuri (1 Yohana 5: 4-5).  5. Gupfa upfiriye  mu  Mumwami Yesu  Ijambo ry’Imana ritubwira ngo hahirwa abapfa bapfira mu Mwami wacu (Ibyahishuwe 14: 13). Kuki iki gitangaza aricyo kiruta ibindi bitangaza byose?
Iherezo ry’ikintu riruta itangiriro ryacyo (Umubwiriza 7: 8)
Umunsi wo gupfamo uruta umunsi wo kuvukamo (Umubwiriza 7: 1)
Urupfu rw’abakunzi b’Uwiteka ni urw’igiciro cyinshi mu maso yayo (Zaburi 116: 15)
Imiruho yose iba ishize, umuntu atabarutse amahoro, ategereje ingororano ze (Ibyahishuwe 14: 13) Umuntu aba akijijwe ibyago byenda kuza (Yesaya 57: 1-2)
Bene Data, dukwiriye kwihangana kugeza igihe Yesu Kristo azazira, kandi, dukwiriye kuguma muri Yesu, nawe akaguma muri twe kugeza igihe tuviriye mu mubiri, cyangwa agarutse (Yakobo 5: 7-8/ Yoh. 15: 4-5) Niho Agakiza kacu kazaba kagize agaciro kako. Yanditswe na Sarongo Richard/Muhabura.rw

title: Bagore, mwubahe cyane abagabo banyu!
content:
“ Bagore, mugandukire abagabo banyu.”—ABEFESO 5:22. 1. Kuki kumvira umugabo akenshi bigorana?
 MU BIHUGU byinshi, iyo umugabo n’umugore bashyingiranywe, umugeni ahiga umuhigo avuga ko azubaha cyane umugabo we
. 
Icyakora, uburyo abagabo benshi bafata abagore babo butuma guhigura uwo muhigo byoroha cyangwa bikagorana. Ariko rero, umuryango wari watangiye neza. Imana yakuye urubavu mu muntu wa mbere, ari we Adamu, iruhinduramo umugore. Adamu yavuganye ibyishimo ati “uyu ni igufwa ryo mu magufwa yanjye, ni akara ko mu mara yanjye.”—Itangiriro 2:19-23. 2. Ni gute mu bihe bya vuba aha inshingano z’abagore mu muryango ndetse n’uko babona ishyingiranwa byahindutse? 2 Nubwo umuryango wari waragize iyo ntangiriro nziza, mu ntangiriro y’imyaka ya za 60 muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika hatangiye poropagande yiswe kwibohoza kw’abagore, ni ukuvuga ko abagore baharaniraga kwibohoza ku butegetsi bw’abagabo. 
Icyo gihe, ugereranyije abagabo 300 ku mugore 1 bataga imiryango yabo. Mu mpera y’imyaka ya za 60, uwo mubare wari warahindutse, abagabo bata imiryango yabo baba 100 ku mugore 1. Muri iki gihe usanga abagore bavuga amagambo y’urukozasoni, bagasinda, bakanywa itabi kandi bakiyandarika kimwe n’abagabo. None se ubu ni bwo abagore barushijeho kugira ibyishimo? Ashwi da! Mu bihugu bimwe na bimwe, hafi kimwe cya kabiri cy’abantu bashyingiranwa, amaherezo baratana. Ese imihati abagore bamwe bashyizeho kugira ngo bakemure ibibazo byo mu miryango yabo, yaba yaratumye ibintu birushaho kuba byiza cyangwa byarushijeho kuzamba?—2 Timoteyo 3:1-5. 3. Ni ikihe kibazo cy’ibanze kigira ingaruka mbi ku bashakanye?
 3 Ikibazo cy’ibanze ni ikihe? Mu rugero runaka, ni ikibazo cyavutse igihe Eva yashukwaga na marayika wigometse, ari we “ya nzoka ya kera yitwa Umwanzi na Satani” (Ibyahishuwe 12:9; 1 Timoteyo 2:13, 14). Satani yagoretse ibyo Imana yigisha. Urugero, Satani yatumye abantu babona ko umuryango ubabuza kwisanzura kandi ko ugoranye. Imitekerereze akwirakwiza mu binyamakuru byo muri iyi si ategeka, igamije kwereka abantu ko inama Imana itanga atari iz’ukuri kandi ko zidahuje n’igihe (2 Abakorinto 4:3, 4).  Ariko rero, nidusuzuma icyo Imana ivuga ku birebana n’inshingano z’umugore mu muryango nta ho tubogamiye, turasanga inama zo mu Ijambo ry’Imana zihuje n’ubwenge kandi ari ingirakamaro.
Inama ku bantu bashinga imiryango 4, 5. (a) Kuki umuntu w’igitsina gore yagombye kwitonda mu gihe ateganya gushaka? (b) Ni iki umuntu w’igitsina gore yagombye gukora mbere y’uko yemerera umugabo kuzashakana na we?
 4 Hari umuburo Bibiliya itanga. Ivuga ko muri iyi si iyoborwa na Satani, n’abafite ishyingiranwa ryiza bazagira “imibabaro.” Bityo rero, nubwo ishyingiranwa ryatangijwe n’Imana, Bibiliya iburira abashyingiranwa. Umwanditsi umwe wahumekewe yavuze ibyo umugore wapfushije umugabo, bityo akaba afite uburenganzira bwo kongera gushaka ati “naguma uko ari ni ho azarushaho guhirwa.” Nanone, Yesu yatanze inama yo kudashyingiranwa ku ‘babasha kubyemera.’ Icyakora, niba umuntu ahisemo gushaka, yagombye gushaka “uri mu Mwami,” ni ukuvuga umuntu usenga Imana, wayiyeguriye kandi wabatijwe.—1 Abakorinto 7:28, 36-40; Matayo 19:10-12. 5 Impamvu umuntu w’igitsina gore by’umwihariko yagombye kwitonda mu gihe ashaka uwo babana, ni umuburo watanzwe na Bibiliya ugira uti “amategeko ahambira umugore ku mugabo we. ” Iyo umugabo apfuye cyangwa agasambana maze agatandukana n’umugore we, umugore “ntaba agitegekwa n’ayo mategeko” (Abaroma 7:2, 3).  Kubona umuntu ugahita umukunda bishobora gutuma abantu bagirana ubucuti bw’agahararo, ariko si rwo rufatiro rukwiriye rwo kugira umuryango wishimye. Ku bw’ibyo rero, umuntu w’igitsina gore utarashaka agomba kwibaza ati ‘ese niteguye gusezerana n’uyu mugabo ko nzumvira amategeko ye?’ Umuntu asuzuma icyo kibazo mbere yo gushyingiranwa, ntabwo ari nyuma yaho. 6. Ni uwuhe mwanzuro abantu b’igitsina gore benshi bashobora gufata muri iki gihe, kandi se kuki ari uw’ingenzi cyane?
 6 Muri iki gihe, ahantu henshi umuntu w’igitsina gore ashobora kwemerera umuntu umusaba ko babana cyangwa akamuhakanira. 
Ariko kandi, guhitamo neza bishobora kuba ari cyo kintu gikomeye kurusha ibindi umuntu w’igitsina gore ashobora gukora. Ibyo biterwa n’uko ashobora kuba yifuza cyane kubona umugabo umuba hafi kandi umukunda, ibyo bikaba bishoboka mu ishyingiranwa. Hari umwanditsi wagize ati “uko turushaho kumva dushaka gukora ikintu, cyaba gushaka cyangwa kuzamuka umusozi runaka, ni ko turushaho kwibwira ko ari nta kibazo gihari maze tukita gusa ku makuru atubwira ibyo twifuza kumva. ” Umuntu uzamuka umusozi aramutse afashe umwanzuro udahuje n’ubwenge, bishobora gutuma atakaza ubuzima bwe; umuntu ahisemo nabi uwo bazabana, na byo bishobora kumuteza akaga. 7. Ni iyihe nama ihuje n’ubwenge yatanzwe ku birebana no gushaka umugabo?
 7 Umuntu w’igitsina gore yagombye gutekereza cyane ku bintu bikubiye mu kugandukira itegeko ry’umugabo umusaba gushyingiranwa na we.
 Mu myaka ishize, hari umukobwa w’Umuhinde wemeye yicishije bugufi ati “ababyeyi bacu barakuze kandi baturusha ubwenge, kandi ntibashobora gushukwa mu buryo bworoshye nkatwe. . . . Jye nshobora gukora ikosa mu buryo bworoshye. ” Ubufasha ababyeyi hamwe n’abandi bashobora gutanga ni ingenzi. Hari umusaza w’Umukristo w’inararibonye umaze igihe kirekire atera abakiri bato inkunga yo kumenya ababyeyi b’umuntu bifuza kuzashyingiranwa na we no kwitegereza bitonze imishyikirano uwo muntu agirana n’ababyeyi be hamwe n’abandi bagize umuryango we. Yanditswe na Sarongo Richard/Muhabura.rw

title: Ibyifuzo 3 abantu bafite bifuza kubaza Imana!
content:
Uruhurirane rw’ibibazo bitari bimwe abari mu Isi bahura nabyo , bituma rimwe na rimwe bumva hari ibibazo babaza Imana baramutse bayibonye.Hari abibaza impamvu Imana yemera ko abantu babazwa, abanti bati kuki turi ku Isi, naho abandi ngo kuki amadini yuzuyemo uburyarya n’ibindi. Abantu benshi bahuye n’ibyago cyangwa bakibonera abantu bahura na byo, ntibabona ibisubizo by’ibibazo bibaza. Hari n’abageze aho bahakana ko Imana ibaho, abandi bo bashobora kudahakana burundu ko Imana ibaho ariko bakabishidikanyaho. Abatemera ko Imana ibaho n’ababishidikanyaho, si ko buri gihe baba badafite idini babarizwamo, ahubwo ibyo baba barigishijwe n’amadini ni byo akenshi bituma bareka kwizera Imana. Bashobora gutekereza ko amadini akomeye yananiwe gusubiza ibibazo bikomeye abantu bibaza. Igishishikaje ni uko ibyo bibazo akenshi usanga ari na byo abantu bavuga ko bemera Imana baburiye ibisubizo. Reka dusuzume ibibazo bitatu abantu benshi bifuza kubaza Imana n’ibisubizo byabyo biboneka muri Bibiliya nkuko bitangazwa n’akanyamakuru k’Abahamya ba Yehova. 1.Kuki Imana ireka imibabaro ikabaho ? Abenshi baravuga bati “Niba Imana idukunda yagombye kuturinda imibabaro.” Abenshi bavuga ko kuba hariho imibabaro bigaragaza ko Imana itabaho. Ariko iyo bamaze kumenya impamvu ireka imibabaro ikabaho, bahita bemera ko Imana ibaho. Ibitekerezo by’Imana n’inzira zayo bitandukanye n’ibyacu (Yesaya 55:8, 9). Ku bw’ibyo, ntidushobora guhita dusobanukirwa ibikorwa byayo n’impamvu yifata ntihite ikora ibintu runaka. 2.Kuki amadini yuzuyemo uburyarya? Hari abashobora gutekereza bati “Niba Imana yanga uburyarya, n’abayisenga ntibagombye kuba indyarya.”
Urugero, reka tuvuge ko umubyeyi areze neza umwana we, ariko umwana akanga akamunanira, bikagera ubwo avuye mu rugo maze akitwara nabi. Uwo mubyeyi areke uwo mwana akora ibyo ashaka, nubwo atabishyigikiye? Ese byaba bikwiriye kuvuga ko uwo mubyeyi yareze nabi, tukaba twanavuga ko umwana atagira se? Urwo rugero rugaragaza ko Imana itemera uburyarya burangwa mu madini, ahubwo ko ireka abantu bagahitamo ibibanogeye. Imana yanga uburyarya burangwa mu madini (Yeremiya 7:29-31; 32:35). Ariko nanone yemerera abantu guhitamo ibibanogeye. Abenshi mu bavuga ko bemera Imana, bahitamo gukurikiza inyigisho zahimbwe n’abantu kandi bakishyiriraho amahame agenga umuco. Matayo 15:7-9. Icyakora idini Imana yemera ryo ntirirangwamo uburyarya. Yesu yaravuze ati “ibyo ni byo bose bazabamenyeraho ko muri abigishwa banjye, nimukundana” (Yohana 13:35). Urwo rukundo ntirugomba “kugira uburyarya” (Abaroma 12:9).
Amadini menshi ntiyubahiriza iryo hame. Urugero, igihe Jenoside yabaga mu Rwanda mu wa 1994, abantu babarirwa mu bihumbi bishe bagenzi babo bahuje idini, bitewe gusa n’uko badahuje ubwoko. 3. Kuki turi mu Isi? Hari abashobora kwibaza bati “ Kuki abantu babaho imyaka 80 cyangwa 90 gusa, hanyuma bagapfa? Kubaho igihe gito nk’icyo bimaze iki?” Nubwo hari abantu benshi babona ko igihe gito tumara ku Isi ari ikimenyetso kigaragaza ko nta Mana iriho, ibidukikije byo bihamya mu buryo bwuzuye ko hariho Umuremyi (Abaroma 1:20). Yabiremye abifitiye umugambi kandi kuba turiho bifitanye isano n’uwo mugambi. Imana yaremeye abantu kubaho iteka ku Isi, kandi izabikora nta kabuza. Zaburi 37:11, 29; Yesaya 55:11. Ibi ni bimwe mu bibazo abantu bamwe bifuza kubaza Imana baramutse bayibonye , nk’uko akanyamakuru ‘Réveillez vous’ ko mu Kwakira 2015 kabitangaje. Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/MUHABURA.RW

title: Papa Francis yahinduye Musenyeri wa Diyosezi ya Nyundo
content:
Papa Francis, Umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika yatoye Padiri Anaclet Mwumvaneza wari Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Caritas mu Rwanda gusimbura Musenyeri Alexis Habiyambere ku buyobozi bwa Diyosezi ya Nyundo. Nk’uko bitangazwa n’urubuga rwa Vatikani, news.va, Musenyeri Alexis Habiyambere w’imyaka 76,   asimbuwe kubera ko yasabye gusezera kuko yari ageze mu za bukuru. Padiri Anaclet Mwumvaneza yavutse ku ya 4 Ukuboza 1956, avukira i Murambi, muri paruwasi ya Rulindo, muri Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali. Hagati ya 1963 na 1969 yize amashuri  abanza i Rulindo, ayarangije akomeza ajya mu Iseminari nto ya Kabgayi guhera mu mwaka wa 1969 na 1973. Mu kigero cy’imyaka 25 yaje gusubira mu iseminari nto i Kabgayi mu cyiciro cy’abigaga bakuze.

 Musenyeri Habyarimana Alexis wasimbuwe kubushumba bwa Diyoseze ya Nyundo
  Nyuma y’imyaka 4 yatangiye iseminari nkuru i Rutongo (1984-1985), ahavuye yakomeje mu cyiciro cya Filozofiya (1985-1987), akomereza muri Tewolojiya (1987-1991) muri Seminari nkuru ya Nyakibanda, muri Diyosezi ya Butare. Yahawe Isakaramentu ry’Ubusaseridoti ku ya 25 Nyakanga 1991. Ubutumwa bwe yabukoreye muri Paruwasi ya Kabuye 1991-1992 no Paruwasi y’Umuryango Mutagatifu mu mwaka wa 1992-2000, aho yavuye agiye gukomeza amasomo ye i Roma hagati y’umwaka wa 2000 na 2004 akaba yarahavanye impamyabumenyi y’ikirenga mu by’amategeko ya Kiliziya.

 Mwumvaneza Anaclet ugiye kuba umushumba wa Diyoseze ya Nyundo  Agarutse mu Rwanda yakoze ubutumwa bwe muri paruwasi Kicukiro (2004-2005), akaba yari n’umwarimu mu iseminari nkuru ya Nyakibanda; yabaye kandi umuyobozi wa Caritas ya Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali hagati y’umwaka wa 2005 na 2013. Guhera muri uwo mwaka akaba yari Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Caritas Rwanda. Musenyeri Alexis Habiyambere ucyuye igihe yatangiye kuyobora Diyoseze ya Nyundo guhera mu mwaka wa 1997.

Yanditswe na Akayezu Snappy/Muhabura.rw

title: Ijambo ry’Imana: Ibi byagufasha niba uri umugore wamenye Imana
content: Ubuzima tubamo bwa buri munsi usigaye ubona ingo nyinshi zitakirangwa n’ubwumvikane buhamye ndetse usanga abenshi muri bo baba wenda ugansanga mu rugo rw’umugabo n’umugore umwe arakijijwe cyangwa akunda gusenga ariko ku rundi ruhande undi nawe ntago abikozwa. aha rero twaguteguriye zimwe mu ngingo zagufasha kumenya umugore wamenye Imana 1. Ntugacire umugabo wawe urubanza kuko nta mugabo numwe unezezwa n’umugore w’ingare (abef 4.29) 2. Umugore w’umunebwe ntagira icyo yitaho. Ntanamenya ko umubiri we ukeneye gusukurwa no kwoga (imigani 24.27, imigani 20.13) 3. Hari imitekere umugabo wawe akunda? Ujye ugerageza guhinduranya amafunguro. Nta mugabo utita kw’ifunguro ategurirwa (imigani 31.14) 4. Ntukifuze ibintu cyane ku mugabo, unezezwe iteka n’ibibonetse (luka 11.3) 5. Ujye umenya kwakira neza umugabo wawe cg undi wese winjiye iwawe. Niyo yaba ari ikirahure cy’amazi ufite. Umutima n’imyitwarire myiza nibwo bwiza bw’umugore mwiza (imigani 31.11) 6. Ntukifatanye n’abagore bananiwe ingo zabo cg bananiwe urushako rwabo (imigani 22.14) 7. Urugo rwawe rugira agaciro kuko uruhaye agaciro. Kwifata nabi ntibyemewe (abaheburayo 13.4) 8. Imbuto zo munda yawe ni umugisha uva ku Mana, ujye ukunda abana bawe ubigishe neza (imigani 22.6) 9. Ntabwo ukuze cyane byagira ingaruka ku rugo rwawe ngo urutererane. Ntukareke kurwitaho ku mpamvu iyo ariyo yose. (Imigani 31.28) 10. Umugore usenga Imana (cg wizera Yesu) aba yuzuye kandi aba yujuje ibisabwa. Iteka ujye usengera umugabo wawe n’umuryango wawe. (Abates 5.27 Yanditswe na Pastor Sarongo Richard/Muhabura.rw

title: Abapasiteri n’abandi bakozi b’Imana barinubira imishahara
content: Abakora imirimo itandukanye mu itorero ry’abapantekote mu Rwanda (ADEPR) bazwi ku izina ry’Abakozi b’Imana, bo mu turere twa Rusizi na Nyamasheke, ntibavuga rumwe ku mishahara mishya itorero ryabo ryemeje ko bagomba kujya bahembwa, aho bamwe batayishimiye na gato. Imishahara ya bamwe mu bakozi b’Imana yagabanyijwe hagamijwe kuringaniza imishahara yabo, kuko kuba imishahara itaringaniye ngo byatezaga ibibazo bitandukanye nk’uko ubuyobozi bw’iri torero bubivuga. Iri ringaniza ry’imishahara muri iri torero ryatangiranye n’ukwezi kwa Mutarama, ngo ryari rimaze igihe ryigwaho. Ubuyobozi bwa ADEPR buvuga ko noneho abayobozi bo ku rwego rumwe bahembwa amafaranga angana, mu gihe mu bihe bishize umuntu yahembwaga bitewe n’aho ari, umushumba uri muri paruwasi yinjiza menshi agahembwa menshi, uri muri paruwasi ikennye agahabwa make, bikaba ngo byarakururaga amakimbirane muri aba Bakozi b’Imana. Umwe mu bashumba ba paruwasi mu karere ka Nyamasheke, yabwiye Imvaho Nshya ati:“Twe tumaze igihe baratubangamiye rwose.Nkanjye nahembwaga arenze 200.000 none banshyize ku mafaranga 101.000. Ubwo se azantunga n’umuryango wanjye, nzarivamo se, nzaka pansiyo y’imburagihe cyangwa?” Umuvugizi w’iri torero wungirije ushinzwe ubuzima bw’itorero, Rev. Pasiteri Rwagasana Tom, ubwo yari mu muhango wo kwimika abakozi b’Imana muri Paruwasi ya Muraza mu karere ka Nyamasheke, yasobanuye ko icyemezo cyo kuringaniza imishahara cyafashwe hagamije gukemura bimwe mu bibazo bikomeye. Yagize ati:“Kuringaniza imishahara byunguye byinshi nubwo hari bamwe batabyishimiye, ariko icya mbere ni uko byaciye ingeso ya ruswa no guhakwa, ahari hamaze gukwira imvugo yitwa ‘Agaparuwasi keza’, ushyizwe muri paruwasi ikize cyane ntashake kuyivamo, ushyizwe mu ikennye cyane agahorana ishyari ridashira kandi ari umukozi w’Imana. Hakaba abahora bapfukamye imbere y’abavugizi ngo babashyire aheza cyangwa ntibabakure aho babashyize, dusanga byaraterwaga ahanini n’imishahara bahabonaga duhitamo kuyiringaniza.” Uyu muyobozi mu itorero rya ADEPR yakomeje avuga ko byanaciye ingeso yo gupfunyikira abayobozi bakuru b’itorero amabahasha y’amafaranga, kuko hari igihe umuyobozi mukuru yatumagaho ko azasura paruwasi runaka, umushumba wayo agategura ‘ibahasha ya shefu’ kugira ngo akomeze atoneshwe. Rev.Pasiteri Rwagasana Tom yavuze ko abakozi b’Imana bakwiye kururuka mu byubahiro bishyiramo bagakorera Imana, aho kurarikira ibihembo, ibyo umuntu ahembwe bikamunyura.Src:Imvaho Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Musanze: Abayobozi b’Idini ya Islam ntibavuga rumwe n’abayiharabika
content:
Mufti w’u Rwanda, Sheikh Kayitare Ibrahim yavuze ko ingengabitekerezo y’ubutagondwa, ari kimwe mu biharabika idini rya Islam, ashishikariza urubyiruko kwima amatwi ababashukisha amafaranga na za buruse zo kujya kwiga mu mahanga, bagamije kubashora mu bikorwa by’iterabwoba.
 Mu biganiro nyunguranabitekerezo byahuje Mufti w’u Rwanda, Abayobozi b’Abayisilamu mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru ndetse n’urubyiruko rw’aba Islam kuwa Kane tariki ya 11 Gashyantare, hagamijwe gukumira ingengabitekerezo y’ubutagondwa no gushishikariza urubyiruko kugendera kure iyo mitekerereze. Muri ibyo biganiro, Guverineri w’Intara y’Amajyaruguru, Aimé Bosenibamwe, yasabye Abayisilamu kudahishira abihisha inyuma y’idini yabo bigisha ingengabitekerezo y’ubutagondwa ahubwo ko bakwiye gutanga amakuru ku bashinzwe umutekano k’uwo bakekaho iyo mikorere. Mu kubikumira, Mufti w’u Rwanda Sheikh Kayitare Ibrahim, yasabye urwo rubyiruko kumvira abarimu babo b’idini no kwima amatwi abaza babashukisha amafaranga na za buruse zo kujya kwiga mu mahanga. Urubyiruko rw’abayisilamu rwo mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru, rwavuze ko rugiye gushishikariza bagenzi babo kwirinda ababashuka babigisha ibijyanye n’ingengabitekerezo y’ubutagondwa n’iterabwoba, bya bamwe mu bagoreka amahame y’idini ya Islam, bagamije ahanini kuryanisha abayisilamu n’andi madini. Abo basore n’inkumi bavuze ko ari ngombwa kubana mu mahoro n’abandi bo mu yandi madini. Nkuko babigaragaza akenshi ngo kutubaha imyemerere y’abandi ni kimwe mu bishobora gukurura amakimbirane, bikaba byateza ibibazo mu gihugu. Ibyo kandi ngo byaba bitandukanye n’amahame y’idini ya Islam, abasaba gukunda igihugu, nk’uko Mutuyimana yabivuze. Yagize ati ‘‘Mu kubikumira no kubyirinda, ni ngombwa kubaha no gukurikiza ibyo abarimu b’idini ryacu batwigisha, tukirinda abatubibamo urwango no kwironda’’. Ibiganiro nk’ibyo birakorwa nyuma y’uko mu mpera za Mutarama, Mohammed Mugemangango wakekwagaho iterabwoba no kwinjiza Abanyarwanda mu mutwe w’iterabwoba ISIS arashwe agerageza gutoroka polisi.Src:Igihe Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: ADEPR yamaganiye kure abahanura intambara mu Rwanda
content:
Itorero ry’abapantekote mu Rwanda (ADEPR) “ryongeye kwikoma bamwe mu bahanuzi bakwirakwiza amakuru y’uko mu Rwanda hazaba intambara, ryibutsa abayoboke baryo n’abanyarwanda muri rusange, kwima amatwi aya makuru agamije kubakura umutima. Mu muhango wo kwimika abashumba bashya wabereye mu karere ka Rwamagana mu mpera z’icyumweru gishize, umuvugizi wungirije w’itorero rya ADEPR Rev. Pasiteri Rwagasana Tom, yamaganiye kure abahanura intambara mu Rwanda. Rwagasana yavuze ko uwumva afite ubuhanuzi bw’intambara adakwiye kuyihanurira abasiviri, amugira inama yo kujya ajyana ubuhanuzi bwe mu kigo cya gisirikare kuko aribo barebwa no kwitegura no guhangana n’intambara. Yagize ati:“Twebwe kuza kuduhanurira iby’intambara ntabwo turi abasirikare, niba ari iby’intambara akaba ari umuntu ukunze igihugu najye mu kigo cy’abasirikare ababwire ko hari abashaka kurwana, babitegure niba bahari. Ariko twebwe kutubwira iby’intambara ntacyo babitubwiraho ibyacu ni ugusengera abantu kugira ngo bakizwe, turinda iby’ubugingo, naho iby’intambara bifite ba nyirabyo, ibyo kandi nibyo abakristo bacu bumva neza kandi bakabishyira mu bikorwa.” Yakomeje asaba abakirisitu kwitondera aba bahanura ibyo yise ibinyoma.Ati:“Bibiliya iravuga ngo uhanura ahanure ibihumuriza abantu umutima niko Pawulo yandikiye Abakorinto, mu byakozwe n’intumwa haravuga ngo mwirinde kandi murinde n’umukumbi mwaragijwe na Pawulo. Yavugaga ko hari amasega aryana azaca inyuma agatangira kujya mu mukumbi, ayo masega rero ni ayo, ni abantu bashaka kwikurura ku bandi kubera indamu zabo, twabikanguriye abakristo kandi itorero ryafashe ingamba.” Ubuhanuzi nk’ubu bwakunze kuvugwa cyane mu gihugu hose, ndetse iri torero ryumvikanye kenshi ribwamaganira kure ndetse rikabwita ubw’ibinyoma. Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw
{}

title: Musenyeri Kambanda yikomye abagore baboneza urubyaro bakoresheje imiti
content:
Musenyeri wa Diyosezi ya Kibungo, aravuga ko biteye agahinda kubona hari abagore bahitamo kwica imbyaro kuko ngo aribyo bituma bisanzura. Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda avuga ko ibi biri mu bikomeje gutuma ingo z’iki gihe zikomeje gusenyuka uko bukeye n’uko bwije zitamaze kabiri. Ibi Musenyeri Kambanda yabivuze ubwo yatangaga ikiganiro kigamije mu kumenya ibanga ry’umuryango Nyarwanda ku bibazo byugarije isi. Bimwe mu bibazo bikomeye ngo birimo kugaragara mu miryango y’abashakanye, birimo ingo zirimo gusenyuka zitamaze kabiri, abagore bahitamo kwanga kubyara bavuga ko bagamije kuringaniza imbyaro. Ibi ngo babikora birengagije ko impamvu yo gushakana ari ukubona urubyaro. Gusa Musenyeri Kambanda aravuga ko bidakwiye kumvikana ko Kiliziya gaturika idashaka ko abantu babyara abo bashoboye kurera, gusa ngo imiti ntabwo ari yo yagombye gukoreshwa. Uyu muyobozi agira ati “Kuringaniza imbyaro bigera aho bigafata indi sura itari yo, bigera aho bikaba nk’ikintu cyo kwanga urubyaro, hari abo ubona ukabona banze imbyaro, hari abagore bamwe basigaye babona kubyara nk’uburyo bubabuza kwisanzura!.” Yakomeje agira ati “Ubundi umugabo aryamana n’umugore bashaka urubyaro, baba badashaka gukurikiza umwana akiri muto bakifata ntibagire imibonano mu gihe cy’uburumbuke, ubu nibwo buryo bwa kamere kiriziya yigisha kuko nibwo buha agaciro urugo,  nibyo biha agaciro abashakanye kandi bukabafasha kurushaho kubana mu bw’umvikane no mu rukundo.” Uyu muyobozi gusa avuga ko ibirimo kuba usanga byaragiye byandikwa. Avuga ko bifite amateka kuko mu mwaka wa 1960 aribwo hadutse impinduramatwara mu mubinano mpuzabitsinda aho abantu batangiye gukoresha cyane iyi miti. Ku birebana n’uko Kiliziya gaturika yaba ibuza kuringaniza imbyaro, Musenyeri Kambanda arabihakana akagira ati “hari igihe bagira ngo kiliziya ibuza guteganya kw’imbyaro, nyamara kiliziya yigisha ingo kubyara abo zishobora kurera kuko ntabwo bihagije kubyara gusa,  umuntu afite n’inshigano zo kurera neza abo abyaye.” Aravuga ko aho kugira ngo abagore bakoreshe imiti, ahubwo bakoresha uburyo bwa kamere. Musenyari Kambanda avuga ko ibirimo kuba aho ingo inyinshi zisenyuka, biri no mi ibaruwa yanditswe na Papa Muhire wa 6, mu ibaruwa yanditse mu mwaka wa 1960, aho yavugaga ko gusenyuka ku ingo usanga kurimo guterwa n’abantu batacyubaha ubuzima, bakaba barashyize imbere ikoreshwa ry’imiti yica imbyaro. Avuga ko “Gufata imiti yica imbyaro mu gihe nyamara imibona yabashakanye ari  ukurema ubuzima, ibi rwose bigira ingaruka ku mibano n’ubumwe bw’abashakanye kuko aho kubaha ubuzima no kubukunda, ahubwo abantu basigaye baburwanya bakabuhiga bakoresheje imiti, ndetse bakaba bageza n’aho bakuramo inda mu gihe imiti itakoze ibyo umugore yashakaga.” Avuga ko iyo abantu bimitse irari ry’umubiri rigasimbura  Imana, igikurikiraho ari uko nta mategeko yandi baba bakigenderaho. Nubwo kugeza ubu Minisiteri ifite umuryango munshingano zayo ivuga ko idafite imibare igaragaza ingo zirimo gusenyuka, gusa iravuga ko iki kibazo gikomeje gufata indi ntera.

Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Ubutumwa Perezia Paul Kagame yageneye Abanyarwanda ku munsi mukuru wa Noheli
content:
Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame yifurije Abanyarwanda bose umunsi Mukuru mwiza wa Noheli n’umwaka mushya Muhire wa 2016 nk’uko asanzwe abikora mu bihe nk’ibi.
 Abinyujije ku rukuta rwe rwa Twitter, Perezida Kagame yagize ati “Mbifurije mwese, ibihe byiza by’ikuruhuko byuzuye amahoro.” Ubusanzwe Perezida wa Repubulika y’U Rwanda akaba asanzwe ari umwe mu bakuru b’ibihugu bagerageza kwifatanya n’amadini yose asengera mu gihugu atarobanuye nk’uko bijya bikunda kubaho cyane mu bihugu bimwe na bimwe by’Abarabu ndetse no hirya no hino ku isi.


 Amagambo Perezida Paul Kagame yatangaje ku rukuta rwe rwa Twitter  Mu ntangiriro z’umwaka mushya wa 2015, Perezida Kagame, yari yifurije Abanyarwanda kurushaho gutera imbere no guha u Rwanda isura nziza kurushaho, bakubaka igihugu n’ubuzima bibabereye. Icyo gihe kandi yabifurije ubuzima burambye, n’umutekano mu miryango yabo mu mwaka wa 2015 urimo kugana ku musozo. Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Imyanzuro 13 y’inama y’Umushyikirano
content: Inama ya 13 y’Umushyikirano yateranye ku ya 21 na 22 Ukuboza 2015 iyobowe na Perezida wa Repubulika y’u Rwanda Paul Kagame yemeje imyanzuro ikurikira: 1. Gutangiza Icyerekezo 2050 kigamije kongera ubukungu kugira ngo Abanyarwanda barusheho kwigira no kwigenera ejo bashaka . 2. Gukomeza gusigasira no kurinda ibyiza twagezeho dukesha Inkiko Gacaca no kurushaho kubungabunga ibindi bimenyetso bya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi birimo inzibutso za Jenoside no kwandika amateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Turere dutandukanye, mu bigo bya Leta, iby’abikorera n’amadini kugira ngo bikomeze gushyigikira ubumwe bw’Abanyarwanda. 3. Kurushaho kunoza ishyirwa mu bikorwa rya gahunda ya Ndi Umunyarwanda n’izindi gahunda zose zigamije komora ibikomere Abanyarwanda batewe n’amateka mabi yaranze u Rwanda, bityo bigafasha Abanyarwanda kurushaho gukunda igihugu cyabo, gushyira hamwe no gufatanya mu cyateza imbere u Rwanda. 4. Kongera imbaraga mu gukemura ibibazo by’abaturage kugira ngo bikemurirwe igihe kandi neza no kuzamura uruhare rwabo mu bikorwa bibateza imbere, bakarushaho kugira uruhare mu igenamigambi, ikurikirana n’ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’ibibakorerwa. 5. Kurushaho kunoza imitangire ya serivisi zihabwa abaturage mu nzego za Leta n’iz’abikorera urwego rw’igihugu rushinzwe imiyoborere (RGB) n’ urwego rw’igihugu rushinzwe iterambere (RDB) zikarushaho gukurikirana uko izo serivisi zitangwa no kubikangurira inzego bireba. 6. Kurushaho gukurikirana no kunoza uburyo gahunda z’igihugu zo kwishakamo ibisubizo (home ground solutions) cyane gahunda ya girinka, umuganda n’izindi gahunda ziteza imbere abaturage, zigakorerwa isuzuma rihoraho kugira ngo zitezwe imbere kandi zirusheho gutanga umusaruro. 7. Kurushaho guteza imbere ubucuruzi bw’ibintu na serivisi hagati y’u Rwanda n’ibihugu by’amahanga cyane cyane ibyo muri Afurika. 8. Nk’uko Abanyarwanda babisabye, hagomba gushyirwaho uburyo buhamye bwo kunyomoza ibivugwa ku Rwanda bitari ukuri no kugaragaza isura nyayo y’u Rwanda ishingiye ku byo Abanyarwanda bihitiyemo kandi uguhitamo bw’Abanyarwanda bikubahwa. 9. Kwihutisha ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’ingamba zigamije gukumira no kurwanya ku buryo bwose bushoboka indwara ya Malariya yiyongereye muri tumwe mu Turere tw’Igihugu. 10. Gushishikariza Abanyarwanda b’ingeri zose kugira uruhare mu muco wo kwizigamira harimo no guteganyiriza iza bukuru no gukoresha ibikorerwa mu Rwanda (Made in Rwanda) no kongera umusaruro w’ibikomoka ku buhinzi n’ubworozi n’ibyoherezwa hanze. 11. Kubaka bitarenze ukwezi kwa Kamena 2016 umuhanda ugera ku kigo nderabuzima cya Kabaya mu Karere ka Ngororero, no kwihutisha inyingo y’iyubakwa ry’umuhanda wa Cyanika-Musanze-Ngororero, gutangiza kubaka umuhanda wa Ngoma-Bugesera-Nyanza n’indi mihanda ihuza Uturere kugira ngo byorohereze ubuhahirane hagati y’abaturage. 12. Gukemura burundu kandi buva ikibazo cy’inguzanyo igenerwa abanyeshuri itinda kubagezwaho. 13. Gushyiraho ingamba zo guteza imbere ururimi rw’Ikinyarwanda n’indangagacizo z’umuco Nyarwanda mu mashuri yose bigakomeza kwigishwa no mu mashuri yisumbuye, amakuru na za kaminuza. Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Bibiliya ivuga iki ku byerekeye abagore bari mu mirimo y’Imana?
content: Igisubizo: Muri iki gihe, ndakeka ko mu Itorero, nta kibazo cyagiweho impaka nyinshi kurusha ikibazo cy’abagore bakora umurimo w’ubushumba cyangwa w’ivugabutumwa. Kubera izo mpamvu rero, ntitugomba kureba iki kibazo nk’aho abagabo bashyamiranye n’abagore. Hari abagore biyumvisha ko nta mugore ugomba gukora umurimo w’ubushumba ndetse ko na Bibiliya ikumira abagore mu murimo w’Imana, ariko na none hari n’abagabo bemera ko abagore bashobora gukora umurimo w’ivugabutumwa kandi ko nta nzitizi zishobora kubabuza gukora umurimo w’Imana. Ibi ntabwo ari ikibazo cyo kwikunda cyane kw’abagabo cyangwa se ikibazo cyo kuvangura ibitsina. Ni ikibazo cyo gusobanukirwa Bibiliya. Ijambo ry’Imana ritubwira ngo: “Umugore yigane ituze kandi aganduke rwose. Kuko nanga ko umugore yigisha cyangwa ngo ategeke umugabo; ahubwo agire ituze” (1 Timoteyo 2:11-12). Mu Rusengero, Imana itangamo imirimo itandukanye ku bagabo no ku bagore. Ni ingaruka z’ukuntu abantu baremwe n’ukuntu icyaha cyinjiye mu isi (1 Timoteyo 2:13-14). Imana, ibinyujije mu ntumwa Pawulo, ibuza abagore gukora imirimo yo kwigisha cyangwa guhabwa ubutware mu mwuka bwo kuyobora abagabo. Bisobanuye ko abagore babujijwe gukora umurimo w’ubushumba, ugizwe no kuvuga ubutumwa, kwigisha no guhabwa ubutware mu mwuka bwo kuyobora abagabo Hari “impamvu nyinshi zo kutavuga rumwe” ku gitekerezo cy’abagore cyerekeye gukora umurimo w’Imana. Impamvu imwe ya rusange, n’uko Pawulo abuza abagore kwigisha kuko mu kinyejana cya mbere, abagore barangwaga no kutigaga. Ariko, muri 1 Timoteyo 2:11-14 ntabwo hasobanura uko kwiga byakorwaga. N’ubwo kwiga byateguraga abantu gukora umurimo w’Imana, nyamara abenshi mu bigishwa ba Yesu ntabwo bari barize. Impamvu ya kabiri rusange, n’uko ari abagore bo muri Efeso bonyine Pawulo yabujije kwigisha (Urwandiko rwa mbere rwa Timoteyo rwandikiwe Timoteyo, wari umushumba w’Itorero rya Efeso). Umujyi wa Efeso wari waramamaye cyane kubera urusengero rwaho rwa Arutemi, ikigirwamana cy’igitsina gore cy’Abagereki n’Abaroma. Abagore nibo bayoboraga imihango yo kuramya Arutemi. Ariko, mu gitabo cya mbere cya Timoteyo nta na hamwe bavuga Arutemi, ndestse na Pawulo ntaho avuga muri 1 Timoteyo 2:11-12 ko guhimbaza Arutemi byaba ari impamvu yo gukumira abagore mu murimo w’ubushumba. Impamvu ya gatatu rusange n’uko ari abatware b’ingo n’abafasha babo bonyine Pawulo avuga, ntabwo avuga abagabo n’abagore muri rusange. Amagambo y’Ikigereki muri icyo gice ashobora kuba yaravugaga abagabo n’abagore; ariko, icyo ayo magambo asobanuye mbere y’ibindi n’abagabo n’abagore. Ikindi n’uko amagambo asa n’ayo y’Ikigereki yakoreshejwe no mu mirongo ya 8-10. Mbese ni abagabo bonyine bafite abafasha bagomba kurambura ibiganza byera bagasenga, badafite umujinya cyangwa batajya impaka (umurongo wa 8)? Mbese ni abagore bonyine bagomba kwambara imyambaro ikwiye, gukora imirimo myiza, no guhimbaza Imana (imirongo ya 9-10)? Oya si cyo bivuze. Imirongo ya 8-10 ivuga mu buryo bwumvikana neza ko ari abagabo n’abagore bose muri rusange, ntabwo ivuga gusa abagabo n’abagore bashyingiranwe. Rero nta kintu na kimwe mu mirongo ya 11-14, cyerekana ko bavugaga abagabo n’abagore bashyingiranwe bonyine. Nyamara indi mpamvu yo kutavuga rumwe, ikunze kugaragara inshuro nyinshi kuri aya magambo avugwa ku bagore bari mu murimo w’Imana, ni byerekeye abagore bari bafite imyanya y’ubuyobozi bavugwa muri Bibiliya, cyane cyane Miriyamu, Debora, na Hulida bavugwa mu Isezerano rya Kera. Uku kutavuga rumwe ntikwashoboye kugaragaza ingingo zifatika zimwe na zimwe bishingikiriza. Icya mbere Debora ni we wenyine wari umucamanza w’igitsina gore mu bacamanza b’abagabo 13. Hulida ni we wari umuhanuzi w’igitsina gore mu bahanuzi b’abagabo barenga 12 bavugwa muri Bibiliya. Icyatumye Miriyamu ajya mu buyobozi n’uko yari mushiki wa Mosi na Aroni. Abagore babiri b’ibyamamare cyane mu gihe cy’Abami, ni Ataliya na Yezebeli—ingero ziruhije z’abayobozi b’ingare b’igitsina gore. Ikirenzeho, n’uko ubutware bw’abagore mu Isezerano rya Kera budafite aho buhuriye n’iki kibazo. Igitabo cya mbere cya Timoteyo n’izindi Nyandiko zandikiwe abashumba, zirereka Itorero—umubiri wa Kristo icyitegererezo gishya—kandi uru rugero rurerekana uko ubuyobozi bwari buteye mu Itorero, ntabwo rushaka kwerekana uko ubuyobozi bw’igihugu cya Isirayeli bwari buteye cyangwa se ubw’irindi shyirahamwe rivugwa mu Isezerano rya Kera. izindi ngingo zisa n’izimaze kuvugwa, zigizwe n’ukuntu Purisikila na Foyibe bakoreshejwe mu Isezerano Rishya. Mu Ibyakozwe n’Intumwa 18, Purisikila na Akwila baragaragazwa nk’abakozi ba Kristo bari barizewe. Izina rya Purisikila ni ryo ryavuzwe mbere, kugira ngo wenda berekane ko “yari icyamamare” cyane mu murimo w’Imana kurusha umugabo we. Ariko, ntaho bagaragaza ko Purisikila yigeze kugira uruhare mu murimo w’Imana waba warunyuranye n’ibivugwa muri 1 Timoteyo 2:11-14. Purisikila na Akwila bajyanye Apolo mu rugo iwabo, bombi bamugira umwigishwa wabo, bamusobanurira Ijambo ry’Imana kugira ngo arusheho kurimenya neza (Ibyakozwe n’Intumwa 18:26). Mu Abaroma 16:1, n’ubwo Foyibe yafatwaga “nk’umudiyakoni” mu cyimbo “cy’umukozi ugabura ijambo ry’Imana,” ibi ntibivuze ko Foyibe yajyaga yigisha mu Rusengero. “Ushobora kwigisha” ni izina ryahabwaga abakuru b’Itorero, ntabwo ryahabwaga abadiyakoni (1 Timoteyo 3:1-13; Tito 1:6-9). Abakuru b’Itorero, abepisikopi n’abadiyakoni bagaragazwa “nk’abagabo bafite umugore umwe,” “abagabo bafite abana bizera,” “n’abagabo batariho umugayo”. Ikigaragara cyane rero n’uko aya mazina yose ari ay’abagabo. Ikindi n’uko muri 1 Timoteyo 3:1-13 no muri Tito 1:6-9, amazina ya kigabo ni yo yonyine akoreshwa iyo bashaka kuvuga abakuru b’Itorero, abepisikopi n’abadiyakoni. Imbonerahamwe y’iki gice cya 1 Timoteyo 2:11-14 ni yo “itanga impamvu” nyayo kandi yumvikana. Umurongo wa 13 utangira ugira uti: “kubera” kandi ugatanga “impamvu” y’ibyo Pawulo ahamya mu mirongo 11-12. Kuki abagore batagombaga kwigisha cyangwa ngo bahabwe ubutware bwo kuyobora abagabo? Kubera ko “Adamu yaremwe mbere, Eva agakurikiraho. Kandi ntabwo Adamu ari we wa mbere washutswe; umugore ni we washutswe.” Imana yabanje kurema Adamu, nyuma irema Eva ngo abe “umufasha” wa Adamu. Iyi gahunda yo kuremwa ikoreshwa ku isi yose no ku muryango (Abefeso 5:22-33) no ku Itorero. Kuba Eva yarashutswe, ni indi mpamvu ituma abagore batemererwa gukora umurimo w’ubushumba cyangwa guhabwa ubutware mu mwuka bwo kuyobora abagabo. Ibi bikaba bituma bamwe bemera ko abagore batagomba kwigisha, kubera ko bashukika ku buryo bworoshye cyane. Iyo myumvire ni iyo kugibwaho impaka, none se niba abagore bashukika ku buryo bworoshye cyane, kuki bemererwa kwigisha abana (kandi nabo bashukika ku buryo bworoshye cyane) n’abandi bagore (nabo bacyekwaho gushukika cyane)? Ibi sibyo inyandiko ishaka kuvuga. Abagore ntibagomba kwigisha abagabo cyangwa kugira ubutware mu mwuka bwo kuyobora abagabo kubera ko Eva yashutswe. Icyo ni cyo cyatumye Imana iha abagabo mbere y’ibindi ubutware bwo kwigisha mu Rusengero. Abagore benshu ni indashyikirwa mu mpano zo kwakira abashyitsi, kugira ubuntu, kwigisha, no gufasha abandi. Umurimo munini w’Imana mu Itorero ry’ahantu aho ari ho hose, ukorwa n’abagore. Mu Itorero, abagore ntibabujijwe gusenga cyangwa guhanura mu ruhame (1 Abakorinto 11:5), ikibujijwe n’uguhabwa ubutware mu mwuka bwo kwigisha abagabo. Bibiliya ntabwo ibuza abagore gukoresha impano z’Umwuka Wera (1 Abakorinto 12). Abagore, kimwe n’abagabo, basabwa kuyobora abandi, kugaragaza imbuto z’Umwuka (Abagalatiya 5:22-23), kandi bagomba kubwira ubutumwa bwiza intama zazimiye (Matayo 28:18-20; Ibyakozwe n’Intumwa 1:8; 1 Petero 3:15). Imana yatanze itegeko ko abagabo bonyine ari bo bagomba gukora umurimo w’ ubutware bwo kwigisha iby’umwuka mu Itorero. Ibi, si ukubera ko abagabo ari bo bonyine bazobereye cyane mu byerekeye kwigisha, cyangwa kubera ko abagore basuzuguritse cyangwa bakaba ari abanyabwenge buke (kandi atari ko bimeze). Ahubwo niko Imana yagennye imikorere y’Itorero. Abagabo nibo bagomba gutanga urugero, ku byerekeye ubuyobozi mu by’umwuka—mu buzima bwabo bwa buri munsi ndetse no mu magambo bavuga. Abagore nabo, bagomba kugira uruhare ruciriritse mu buyobozi. Kandi barashishikarizwa kwigisha abandi bagore (Tito 2:3-5). Na none, ntabwo Bibiliya ibuza abagore kwigisha abana. Igikorwa cyonyine abagore babujijwe n’ukwigisha abagabo cyangwa guhabwa ubutware bw’umwuka kuri bo. Ibi rero bizabuza, ku buryo bwumvikana, abagore gukora umurimo w’ubushumba n’uw’ivugabutumwa. Ibi ntibigomba gutesha abagore agaciro kabo, mu buryo ubwo ari bwo bwose, ahubwo bigomba kubaha icyerekezo cyo gukora umurimo w’Imana kurushaho, hubahirijwe gahunda zose z’Imana n’impano Yabagabiye. Yanditswe na Sarongo Richard/muhabura.rw

title: Mgr. Philippe Rukamba yatorewe kuba umuyobozi mushya w’inama y’Abepiskopi
content:
Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Butare, Musenyeri Philipe Rukamba yatorewe kuba Perezida w’inama y’Abepisokopi mu Rwanda asimbuye Musenyeri Smaragde Mbonyintege wa Diyosezi ya Kabgayi wari umaze igihe cy’imyaka itandatu kuri uyu mwanya. Mgr. Smaragde Mbonyintege, ucyuye igihe yavutse ku ya 2 Gashyantare i Rutobwe mu cyahoze ari perefegitura Gitarama, ubu ni mu karere ka Muhanga, yahawe ubupadiri mu 1975 naho mu 2006 agirwa Musenyeri wa Diyosezi ya Kagbayi. Mgr.Philippe Rukamba umusimbuye we yavukiye I Kabarondo mu karere ka Kayonza, ahabwa ubupadiri mu 1974, naho ku ya 2 MUtarama 1997 agirwa Musenyeri wa Diyosezi ya Butare. Ku ya 28 Gicurasi 2012, yahawe kuyobora na Diyosezi ya Gikongoro itari ifite uyiyobora nyuma y’urupfu rwa Musenyeri Misago Augustin. Uwo mwanya yongeye kuwuhabwa ku ya 26 Ugushyingo 2014 awuvaho Musenyeri Celestin Hakizimana yimitswe ku ya 24 Mutarama 2015.

Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Papa Francis yagize icyo avuka kuburyo  yakiriwe muri Afurika
content:
Umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika, Papa Francis yatangaje ko yatangajwe bikomeye n’uburyo abatuye umugabane wa  Afurika bamwakiriye bakanamugaragariza ibyishimo kandi bugarijwe n’intambara, inzara n’ibindi biza. Ubwo yari mu ndege asubira i Roma, nyuma y’urugendo muri Kenya, Uganda na Centrafrique, papa Francis ntiyahishe ubwuzu yavanye muri Afurika. Ati” Afurika yarantangaje, bafite umuco wo kwakira abantu, baba bishimiye ko umuntu abasura. Icyantangaje kurushaho ni uburyo baba bangana babukereye, ibyishimo byabo, n’uburyo bashobora gukora umunsi mukuru kandi mu gifu harimo ubusa.”
Uyu mushumba w’Umunyargentine, ni bwo bwa mbere yari ageze ku mugabane wa Afurika. Yongeye ati “uyu mugabane wabaye nk’akarima ka bamwe, yanagarutse ku ngaruka za zimwe muri gahunda z’iterambere zirimo n’izirwanya ubucucike bw’abaturage zikabuza abantu kubyara. Bergoglio w’imyaka 78, yagaragaje akababaro yatewe n’ubukene bukabije yabonye ku Banyafurika. Ati” Ejo hashize nagiye ku bitaro by’abana bya Bangui. Nabonye abana bari mu byumba by’indembe, ntibafite ibyuma bibaha umwuka wa Oxygene. Muganga yambwiye ko abo bana bari barwaye malariya kandi bagaburirwa nabi ku buryo benshi muri bo bashobora gupfa.” Ibiro Ntaramakuru by’Abafaransa, AFP, bivuga ko Papa Francis yanatunguwe n’uburyo abaturage ba Centafrique bafite ubushake bwo kwiyunga, kubabarirana no kubiba amahoro. Ati” Abagatolika, Abaporoso n’Abayisilamu usanga bashaka kubana kivandimwe” Yongeyeho ko yishimiye gusengera mu musigiti muri karitsiye PK-5 ya Bangui kandi Imam waho akamusanganira mu modoka ye “Papemobile”.
Abajijwe niba azagaruka ku mugabane wa Afurika ati” Simbizi, ndashaje kandi ingendo zirarushya.

Yanditswe na Akayezu Snappy/Muhabura.rw

title: Papa Francis yasuye Umusigiti uzengurutswe n’umutwe witwaje intwaro w’Abakirisitu
content:
Papa Francis yahuye  n’umuyobozi w’idini ya Kisilamu(Imam) mu gace karimo abayisilamu 15,000 bazengurutswe n’umutwe w’abakirisitu bitwaje intwaro muri Centre Africa. Inkuru ya The Guardian iravuga ko Papa Francis yitanze cyane, kuva yaba Papa ubwo yasuraga umuzigiti uzengurutswe n’imitwe y’Abakirisitu yitwaje intwaro i Bangui, umurwa mukuru wa Centre Afurika. Yahatangiye ubutumwa bw’amahoro n’ubwiyunge mu kugaragaza kwifatanya nabo. Arinzwe cyane n’ingabo z’umuryango w’abubumbye  zo kugarura amahoro muri Centre Africa na Vatican, Papa yahuye na Imam w’umuzigiti mukuru  ahitwa PK5(point kilometre 5-ibilometero 5 kuva mu mujyi hagati). Ngo mbere y’uko intambara yo gusubiranamo itangira muri 2013, Abayisilamu mu murwa mukuru bari 122,000 ariko ubu abenshi bakaba barahunze. Papa yabwiye imbaga yari yakoraniye mu Muzigiti ati“Abakirisitu n’Abayisilamu ni abavandimwe. Hamwe tugomba kwamagana urwango, guhora n’ubugizi bwa nabi, cyane cyane ubugizi bwa nabi bukorwa mw’izina ry’idini cyangwa Imana ubwayo”. Papa Francis yavuze ko uruzinduko rwe muri Centre Africa rutari kuba rwuzuye iyo ataza kuba harimo gusura umuryango w’Abayisilamu. 

Uruzinduko rw’amasaha 26 i Bangui muri Centre Africa ngo n’urwa mbere agiriye mu gace k’igihugu karimo intambara. Centre Africa imaze igihe mu ntambara yo gusubiranamo kuva uwahoze ayobora Centre Africa, François Bozize yahirikwa ku butegetsi n’inyeshamba z’Abayisilamu. Iyi ntambara ngo muri rusange ibonwa nk’intambara y’amacakubiri hagati y’Abakirisitu benshi n’abanyamuke b’Abayisilamu. Ibihumbi by’abantu barishwe, abagera kuri miliyoni bakuwe mu byabo ibintu byabo birasahurwa cyangwa birangizwa. Mu kuvogera uburenganzira bwa muntu harimo : kwica binyuranije n’amategeko, abantu kubura, iyica rubozo, gufata ku ngufu byabaye karande n’ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina. Urugendo rwa Papa i Bangui ngo rukurikiranirwa hafi n’abashinzwe umutekano i Vatican.


Kuri iki cyumweru, Papa yahamagariye impande zirwana gushyira imbunda hasi. Asoma misa i Bangui muri Centre Africa, yavuze ko ahubwo bakwiriye kwitwaza intwaro z’ubutabera, urukundo, imbabazi n’amahoro nyayo. Mu isengesho ry’umugoroba ku cyumweru, Papa yahamagariye urubyiruko gufata inzira yo  kwamagana intambara, urwango n’amacakubiri. Papa yakomeje agira ati: “guhunga ibibazo siwo muti. Guhangana nabyo birakenewe. Kugira ubutwari bwo guhangana no guharanira ikiza. Uhunga ntaba afite umurava wo gutanga ubuzima.” Nyuma y’amacakubiri yavuze muri Centre Africa hagati y’Abayisiramu n’Abakirisiti, yatumye imijyi n’ibyaro bicikamo ibice hashingiwe ku idini, ibihumbi by’amagana  by’abantu biva mu byabo. Kuva muri 2014 kugeza ubu hari ingabo z’umuryango w’abibumbye 10,000 zo kugarura amahoro muri Centre Africa. Centre Africa ituwe n’abantu bagera kuri miliyoni 4.6 bityo 50% akaba ari Abakirisitu, 15% ari Abayisilamu naho 35% ari abamadini gakondo. Aha niho byitezwe ko Papa asoreza uruzindiko rw’iminsi itandatu muri Afurika nyuma ya Kenya na Uganda. Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Ingabo z’u Rwanda zarinze umutekano wa Papa
content:
Ingabo z’u Rwanda ziri mu butumwa bw’Amahoro muri Centrafrique zagaragaye mu barinze umutekano wa Papa Francis ubwo yasesekaraga mu murwa Mukuru w’iki gihugu, Bangui, kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 29 Ugushyingo 2015. Nk’uko bigaragara ku ifoto yatangajwe n’ikinyamakuru BBC n’andi acicikana ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, abasirikare b’u Rwanda bari bagaragiye Papa Francis ni abasanzwe barinda umutekano wa Perezida Catherine Samba-Panza ari na we wakiriye uyu mushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika. BBC yatangaje ko mu butumwa bw’ibanze Papa Francis yatanze muri iki gihugu kirangwamo amakimbirane yitirirwa amadini burimo icyizere afitiye amatora yitezwe mu kwezi k’Ukuboza akomeza yigisha n’abanyagihugu kubana batishishanya..
Papa Francis yashimangiye icyizere afitiye umusaruro w’amatora ashobora guhosha amakimbirane hagati y’imitwe y’Abakirisitu(Anti Balaka) n’Abayisilamu (Séléka), akimara gusesekara mu Ngoro ya Perezida i Bangui.
Yakanguriye abaturage bo muri iki gihugu kugira ubumwe no kwirinda ibishuko bibatera gutinyana, kudasabana n’abadahuje ubwoko cyangwa imyumvire ya Politiki n’imyemerere.
Mu ruzinduko rwe biteganyijwe ko azifatanya n’Abayoboke ba kiliziya Gatolika ndetse akanahura n’Umuyobozi mukuru w’Abayisilamu ku musigiti w’Umujyi wa Bangui, ahazwi cyane nka PK5







 Yanditswe na Sarongo Richard/Muhabura.rw

title: Amafoto: Perezida Museveni yongeye kwerekana agashya ubwo yakiraga Papa Francis
content: Umushumba mukuru wa Kiliziya Gatorika Papa Francis ari muruzinduko mu gihugu cya Uganda aho yahageze ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatani tariki ya 27 Ugushyingo 2015 akaba yarahageze avuye mu gihugu cya Kenya. Umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika ku Isi, Papa Francis, nyuma yo kuva muri Kenya yari maze iminsi 3, kuri ubu yamaze gusesekara muri Uganda akomereje uruzinduko rwe ku mugabane wa Afurika ruzasorezwa mu gihugu cya Centrafrica. Mu kwakira Papa Francis Perezida Museveni yagaragaye yikoreye igikapu cyari cyazanwe na Papa Francis ndetse benshi bakaba batasobanukiwe icyo Perezida Museveni yashatse gusobanura.  Dore amafoto amwe n’amwe yaranze umuhango wo kwakira Papa mu gihugu cya Uganda

title: Mu mvura y’amahindu abaturage bo muri Kenya bitabiriye Misa ya Papa Francis
content:
Papa Francis yasomeye misa abakirisitu babarirwa mu bihumbi magana kuri Kaminuza ya Nairobi, mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Kane, nyamara hari bamwe bahisemo gutaha misa itaratangira batinya ko umubyigano wabahitana nk’uko biherutse kugendekera Abayisilamu bari i Maka. Ubuyobozi bwa Kenya bwari bwatangaje ko iyo misa iritabirwa n’abantu basaga miliyoni n’ibihumbi magana ane, naho Vatikani ikavuga ko iritabirwa nibura na 500 000. Umwe mu bayobozi bari bitabiriye misa, Sarah Ondiso yabwiye AP ko yageze aho yagombaga kubera saa kumi n’igice ariko agasubirayo misa itaratangira.
Yasobanuye ko yategereje amasaha abiri ku murongo utava aho uri, nyuma imbaga y’abari bategereje ikoherezwa ku yandi marembo hakaba akavuyo ku buryo n’abashinzwe umutekano babuze icyo bakora. Ati” Byari biteguye nabi, twese byatubabaje.”  Uretse umuvundo, abashoboye kwinjira banyagiwe amasaha menshi bategereje ko misa ya papa itangira.




 Papa yanenze imitegurire y’iyi misa  Mu nyigisho ye, Papa Francis yasabye rubanda kwirinda ikintu cyose cyatuma umwana utaravuka avutswa ubuzima. Ati” Duhamagariwe kwirinda imico ikurura ubwirasi mu bagabo, igakomeretsa cyangwa ikandavuza abagore, igashyira mu kaga ubuzima bw’umwana muziranenge utaravuka.” Yabasabye gushinga ingo kandi bakirinda ko zasenyuka. Ati’ Ukwemera dufite mu ijambo ry’Imana kuduhamagarira gufasha imiryango mu nshingano ifite muri sosiyete, kwemera umwana nk’umugisha muri iyi Si.” Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Umugore wamenye Imana agomba kwitwararika ku mugabo we. Igice cya 1
content:
Bibiriya ni igitabo  Gitagatifu ku bayemera ndetse bakemera n’ubuhanuzi buvugwa muri iki gitabo. Mu gitabo cya Bibiriya havugwamo byinshi ku mugore yaba ufite umugabo ndetse n’utamufite ariko ubarurirwa mu bagore.  Hano hari ibimenyetso twakusanyije biranga umugore wamenye Imana ndetse unakurikiza amategeko y’Imana aho ava akagera, muzakurikirana mu bice bitandukanye kimwe n’uko uwazabona afite igitekerezo cyangwa ubwunganizi yazatwandikira kuri Email yacu ya muhabura1@gmail.com  1. Ntukigere uzamura ijwi ku mpamvu iyo ariyo yose imbere y’umugabo wawe. Yabifata nk’ agasuzuguro (Imigani 15:1): Burya no mu muco w’abatubanjirije ngo cyaraziraga kubona umugore afata ijambo hagati kuba yavugira mu mugabo we cyangwa undi mugabo uwo ariwe wese. Aha bisobanuye kubaha nanone bitandukanye n’uburenganzira bw’umugore. 2. Ntuzigere ugaragaza kamere yawe igihe uganira n’ umugabo wawe kuko utazi uko azabifata. Umugore ukunda kuburana no kwishyira aheza, ntagira urugo runezerewe (imigani 15-13) 3. Ntukagereranye umugabo wawe n’abandi bagabo kuko utazi ubuzima babayeho. Bishobora kugabanya urukundo agufitiye. 4. Ntuzagaragarize umuryango wawe cyangwa  inshuti zawe  intege nke z’ umugabo wawe. Kuko nawe byakugiraho ingaruka, mujye mubikirana amabanga (abef. 5-12): niba umugabo wawe umubonamo ubushobozi bukeya birashoboka cyane ko wamufasha mu buryo bwawe bwite cyangwa mukaba mwafatanya n’ubundi nicyo umufasha bivuga rero sibyiza kujya gushaka ubufasha hanze y’urugo rwanyu ahubwo wowe shikama n’umugabo wawe mushake umuti w’ibibazo byanyu mureke kujya kwishyira ku karubanda 5. Ntugafate nabi inshuti z’umugabo wawe kuko utabakunze. Ujye ureka umugabo wawe ariwe umenya uko abatwara (imigani 11:22) 6. Ntuzibagirwe ko umugabo wawe yagushatse. Ntabwo ari umukozi wawe cg undi uwo ariwe wese. Kora inshingano zawe (itang. 2:24) 7. Ntuzagire undi uha inshingano zo kwita ku mugabo wawe. Abandi bagukorera ibintu byose ariko ibijyanye n’umugabo wawe ni inshingano zawe z’umwihariko (abef 5:33) 8. Ntuzarenganye umugabo wawe ngo nuko ntacyo atahanye. Ahubwo ujye umusubizamo imbaraga (gutegekwa kwa 2; 3-28) 9. Ntugasesagure kuko umutungo w’umugabo wawe ari uwagaciro ntukwiye kwangirika. 10. Ntukagerageze kwirwaza kugirango uhunge inshingano zo muburiri. Ujye wubahiriza umugabo wawe nkuko abishaka. Imibonano ni ikintu cy’ingenzi k’umugabo kuko ukomeje kumwima undi ashobora gufata izo nshingano. Nta mugabo wakwihanganira ibyongibyo igihe kirekire (ndetse na bamwe basenga cyane)

Yanditswe na Pastor Sarongo Richard/Muhabura.rw

title: Mu mafoto: Uburyo Papa Francis yakiriwe mu gihugu cya Kenya bwagaragaje ko  ariwe mu yobozi w’Isi
content:
Umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatorika Papa Farancis ari mu ruzinduko mu bihugu bya Afurika y’Iburasirazuba aho ateganya gusura Igihugu cya Kenya yagezemo kuri uyu munsi ndetse akaba azava muri ki gihugu yerekeza mu gihugu cya Uganda akazava muri Uganda akomereza muri Centre Afurika  Amafoto agaragaza uburyo Papa ari umuntu wubashywe cyane kurenza abandi kuko na Perezida Barack Obanma ubwo yageraga aha muri Kenya ntago yakiriwe n’imbaga y’abantu nk’abari baje kwakira Papa Francis
 
Reba mu mafoto uko byari bimeze Papa akigera kukbuga cy’idege 


 Papa Francis akigera ku kibuga ki’indege cya Jomo Kenyatta 


 Ibyapa biha ikaze Papa muri Kenya byari byinshi 


 Yamanje Guha umugisha perezida Uhuru Kenyatta nawe usanzwe ari umuyoboke w’idini Gatorika 




 Abandi bayobozi batandukanye nabo bahanwe umugisha harimo na minisitiri w’intebe wa Kenya 

















Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Papa Francis yatangaje ko isi iri muntambara ya gatatu y’Isi yose
content:
Umushumba wa kiriziya gatolika Papa Francis yatangaje ko isi n’abayituye badashaka amahoro ahubwo bashaka ubutware n’ubudahangarwa ndetse anatangaza ko imfu n’ubwicanyi bitagabanuka, ibi akaba yabitangaje Mu gihe  arimo kwitegura gusura ibihugu bya Afurika nka Kenya, Uganda na Centre Africa mu mpera z’uku kwezi k’Ugushyingo 2015. Papa Francis yakomeje avuga ko n’ubwo Noheli yegereje ndetse hakaba hazaba urumuri n’ibirori by’umucunguzi, Isi yo yibereye mu ntambara zidashira ntago ishaka kwakira urumuri n’amahoro, ibi akaba yabitangarije kuri uyu wa kane tariki ya 19 Ugushyingo 2015, muri Paroise ya Muragatifu Piyeri ubwo yatangizaga ibihe byo kwitegura umunsi mukuru wa Noheli. Papa Francis yagize ati:“Ahantu hose huzuye intambara n’urwango, abanyakuri barapfa, abana ntago barimo kwiga, abandi bibereye mu gucura intwaro za kirimbuzi umunsi ku munsi, bamwe bugarijwe n’inzara  ariko abandi barimo bujuje amafaranga imifuko ndetse ntago bitaye kuri babandi bagowe n’ubuzima nditse bari mu kababaro ka buri munsi” Yakomeje avuga ati ibi ni ibimenyetso bigaragaza ko intambara y’isi hagati ya gatatu n’ubwo ibimenyetso by’iyi ntambara bitari byajya ahagaragara. Ibi nta busobanuro bwabyo gusa bitera Imana agahinda nk’uko yakomeje abivuga. Papa kandi yasabye abakristu gusenga no gusaba Nyagasani mu masengesho dusabira Isi itazi inzira y’amahoro, yibera mu ntambara n’amacakubiri ndetse akaba yasoje avuga ko isi iri muntambara ya gatatu y’Isi iteruye.

Yanditswe na Sarongo Richard/Muhabura.rw

title: Abahanuzi b’Ibinyoma mu bagendere kure: Umuvugizi w’Itorero rya  ADPR
content:
Abayoboke b’Itorero ry’Abapantekoti mu Rwanda ADPR barasabwa kwamagana abahanzuzi b’ibinyoma ndetse n’abandi bose bashaka guharabika Idini bitwaje ubuhanuzi kandi mu by’ukuri ari ibinyoma bahanura. Ibi ni ibyatangajwe na Sibomana Jean umuvugizi mu kuru wa ADPR Mu Rwanda, ubwo bizihizaga imyaka 75 iri torero rimaze ribayeho hano mu Rwanda, aho Sibomana Jean yongeye kugaruka ku buryo burambuye ku kintu abantu bita ubuhanuzi ndetse anasobanura ko abahanuzi b’ibinyoma nabo babaho cyane bamwe uzumva bahanura intambara, iherezo ry’isi ndetse n’ibindi biteye ubwoba abakirisitu ndetse n’abayoboke b’iri Torero rya ADPR muri rusange kuko aba bahanuzi b’ibinyoma nibo babangamira iterambere ry’umukristu. Uyu mu Pasiteri Jean yasobanuye ko hari abantu bamwe usanga bagenda bazana ubuhanuzi buvangiye abo ngabo buri mukristu wese akwiye kwirinda bene abo. Mu magambo ye yagize ati: Twagiye tubabona baza iwacu bavuga ngo intambara muri iki gihugu kandi wareba ugasanga twebwe abanyarwanda Twifitye amahoro n’umutekano usesuye I wacu i Rwanda , uwo ariwe wese w’Umupantekoti akwiye  ndetse n’undi mu kristu muri rusange uzabazanira ubuhanuzi bumeze gutyo mu mwirinde ariko mu mugerageze ”. Pasiteri Jean yagarutse ku bikorwa byiza abakristu bagenda bageraho umunsi ku munsi ndetse anahamya ko ADPR ikomeje kugira uruhare mu kubaka no guhindura Sosiyete Nyarwanda kuva iri torero ryabaho mu mwaka wa 1940 aho ryatangiriye mu karere ka Nyamasheke,mu ntara y’Uburengerazuba ritangijwe n’Umumisiyoneri wo muri Swede witwaga Alvar Lindskog naho Uwitwa Sagatwa Louis niwe muntu wa mbere wabatijwe muri iri torero rya ADPR hano mu Rwamda ndetse n’ubu uyu musaza aracyariho.

Yanditswe na Akayezu Snappy/Muhabura.rw

title: Urukundo rw’Imana ruruta uko rumenywa kubantu bose.
content:
Mumenye n’urukundo rwa kristo ruruta uko rumenywa ruruta uko rumenywa, ngo mwuzuzwe kugera ku kuzura kw’Imana .(Abefeso 3:19) Rimwe mu magambo ashobora kuba akoreshwa n’abantu kurusha ayandi yose ni Ijambo urukundo, ndetse wenda byanashoboka ko ntawabibonera igisobanuro cyimbitse, gusa ikigaragara ni uko nta muntu n’umwe ufite umubiri ururwanya ahubwo usanga buri wese arwifuza n’ubwo yaba atazi kurusobanura ariko yumva arukeneye! Ikindi kandi biragoye gusobanura uburyo muri buri muco, amoko y’abantu, indimi zitandukanye bafite uburyo barusobanura ubwabo baziranyeho. Bityo rero bishimangira uburyo iri jambo ari iry’ingenzi mu buzima bw’abatuye isi!
Ariko se ni iki Bibiliya ivuga kidasanzwe ku rukundo?  

Cima_da_conegliano__god_the_father.jpg

title: Ubuhamya: Nyuma yo kumara imyaka myinshi mu mateka mabi ubu ndi umusore uhimbaza Imana
content:
Kamugisha Ronald nyuma y’igihe kirekire yamaze mu bupfubyi ndetse akaza no kujya kuba ku muhanda kubw’impamvu zo kubura imibereho akajya anywa  ibiyobyabwenge gusa kuri ubu  ni umuhanzi uririmba indirimbo zihimbaza Imana(Gospel) mwamenye mu ndirimbo zitandukanye nk’iyitwa Yewe Yesu Nzajya Nkwirahira n’izindi nyinshi zibumbiye muri Album imwe amaze gukora kuva yatangira umuziki. 

Nyuma yo kugirirwa ubuntu n’Imana ubu arayivuga ibigwi Mu kiganiro kirambuye yagiranye n’Umunyamakuru wa Muhabura.rw, Kamugisha Ronald yadutangarijeko kuva mu mwaka wa 2006 yatangira umuziki abinyujije mu kuramya no Guhimbaza Imana yabonye ibitangaza byinshi Imana igenda imukorera ndetse ibi nibyo bimwubaka mo imbaraga zo gukomeza gukorera Imana no kuvuga ubuntu bwayo ndetse kuri ubu akaba anabinyuza mu ndirimbo zihimbaza Imana mu gutambutsa ubutumwa bwe bwo gukangurira urubyiruko kureka ibiyobyabwenge Kuri ubu Kamugisha nk’umuhanzi arimo gutegura ibikorwa bitandukanye harimo kuzenguruka igihugu cyose agenda akangurira abanyarwanda by’umwihariko urubyiruko kuva kubiyobyabwenge mu rwego rwo kugirango Urwanda rugire urubyiruko rudakoresha ibiyobyabwenge kandi rurangwa no gusenga kuko Imana ariyo igena byose ikanakura abantu mu icuraburindi.


 Kamugisha Ronald uririmba indirimbo zihimbaza Imana  Ubusanzwe Kamugisha ni umusore ukijijwe nyuma yo guca mu mateka mabi ndetse akaba yaranaduhamirije ko burya umuntu wese ashobora gukizwa kuko ubuntu bw’Imana butajya burobanura, aha kandi yaboneyeho no gusaba abanyarwanda kumushyigikira ndetse bakanamuba hafi mu bihangano bye bya buri munsi. Yanditswe na Akayezu Snappy/Muhabura.rw

title: TANZANIA:Abakirisitu Gatorika bahinduriwe umunsi basengeraga ho
content: Mugihugu cya Tanzania  abayoboke bitorero ry’Abagaturika basabwe kuza senga kw’isabato cyangwase kuwagatandandu tariki 24 Ukwakira 2015 kugira ngo hatazagira umuntu uzitirwa nogusenga bika mubuza kwitorera umukuru w’igihugu mu matora ateganyijwe kuri 25 Ukwakira 2015 hazaba ari kucyumweru. Muri iki  gihugu cya Tanzania hatanzwe uburenganzira kubapadiri bose n’insengero zabo  muri icyo gihugu kuzasenga kuwa gatandatu (ku Isabato ku bemera amahame y’idini y’Abadivantisite b’umunsi wa karindwi) azaba ari  tariki 24 Ukwakira 2015 ubwo nyine ni mu rwego rwo kugirango kucyumweru tariki 25 Ukwakira 2015 kugirango abayoboke babo bazabone umwanya uhagije wokwitorera  umukuru w’igihugu, ndetse n’Abadepite  hamwe na njyanama z’uturere. Nkuko tubikesha ikinyamakuru kitwa MTANZANIA. Kibivuga   ko ibingibi byatangajwe n’umunyamabanga w’inama nkuru ya bepiskopi muri Tanzania (TEC) Musenyeri  SEVERIN Niwemugizi, musenyeri Niyomugizi  yasabye ko buri basenyeri bagomba kubikoragutyo  bamenyesha  aba padiri  yuko  abayoboke babo bazasenga kuwagatandatu. Ikindi nuko yasabye abayoboke bitorero gaturika kujya ba kurikirana abakandida babo mugihe biyamamaza  kugirango bumve imigabo n’imigambi baba fitiye, bityo bazitorere abayobozi  baba nogeye. Yashoje avugako bakomeza gusaba Imana Izabafashe Ibahe amahoro  murikigihe cyokwiyamamaza kwa bakandida , umunsi wa matora  nanyuma y’amatora   abakandida n’Abaturage  bazakire ibyavuye mumatora n’umutimamwiza  kugirango barusheho kugira ubumwe n’amahoro  mugihugu cyabo. Tubibutse ko amatora mugihugu cya Tanzania ateganyijwe kuba kuri 25 Ukwakira 2015  hazaba ari kucyumweru,  Mubakandida  bahabwa amahirwe murayo matora ni  John  Magufuri  guturuka mu Ishyaka riri kubuyobozi ( CCM) Chama Chama Mapinduzi. Hamwe na Edward Rowasa wavuye muriryo shaka rya CCM, akajya muri CHADEMA, Chama chakidemokrasia na Maendereo. Yanditswe na Bagabo John/Muhabura.rw

title: Minisitiri w’Intebe yashimiye byimazeyo abakirisitu ba Kiriziya Gatolika abasaba kuba Abanyarwanda beza
content:
Ibi yabibasabye kuri uyu wa 10 Ukwakira 2015 mu birori byo kwizihiza isabukuru y’ imyaka 50 diyosez ya Ruhengeri imaze ishinzwe byahuriranye n’ isabukuru y’ imyaka 25 umushumba wayo Nyiricyubahiro Harorimana Vincent amaze ahawe ubusaseridoti. Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Ruhengeri, Msg. Harorimana Vincent, yavuze ko igihugu cyavuye ahantu habi, kuri ubu kikaba kigeze ahantu heza, bityo agashimira ubuyobozi bw’igihugu ubufatanye bugirana n’amadini na za kiliziya mu kubaka igihugu. Agira ati” ni ugushimira Perezida wa Repubulika y’u Rwanda n’abamufasha mu buyobozi bw’igihugu cyacu, byinshi mu byo twagwezeho mu rwego rw’uburezi, ibyo twagezeho mu rwego rw’ubuvuzi, mu mibereho myiza y’abaturage, tubikesha ubufatanye bwiza n’inzego za leta zose uko zakabaye.” Yasabye kandi Abanyarwanda gukomeza kuba umwe bakorera mu bwuzuzanye bagamije kwiteza imbere kuri Roho no ku mubiri, batareba cyane ku byahise ahubwo bakarangamira kugira ahazaza heza.


 Minisitiri w’Intebe bwana Anastase Murekezi ari kumwe n’abakirisitu ba Diyosezi ya Ruhengeri
 Mu ijambo rye Minisitiri w’Intebe yagarutse ku ruhare rukomeye Kiliziya Gatolika yagize mu guteza imbere uburezi ndetse n’ ubuvuzi ashima iyi diyosezi uruhare ikomeje kugaragaza muri gahunda zigamije iterambere ry’ igihugu. Yagize ati:‘’Uyu munsi ni umwanya mwiza wo gushimira kiliziya Gatulika uruhare rwayo muri gahunda zose z’ ubuzima bw’ abaturage rurigaragaza, by’ umwihariko Diyosezi ya Ruhengeri mu bikorwa by’ uburezi kuva ku mashuri y’ incuke kugera kuri Kaminuza ya INES Ruhengeri, ubuvuzi ndetse n’ amahoteli afasha mu kwakira ba mukerarugendo hamwe no muri gahunda yo kuremera abatishoboye.’’ Iyi Diyosezi ya Ruhengeri yashinzwe mu mwaka w’1960, ikaba ifite ama Paruwasi 13, abarizwamo abakirisitu Gatolika 391, 695, ndetse n’abapadiri 74 bayifasha gukora umurimo w’Imana ndetse no gusakaza ubutumwa bwiza mu bakirisitu. Yanditswe na Akayezu Snappy/Muhabura.rw

title: Vatican: Umu padiri yemeye ko ari umutinganyi imbere y’Umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika Papa Francis
content:
Ubwo umushumba mukuru wa Kiliziya Gatorika yatangizaga ku mugaragaro  inama yo ku rwego rwo hejuru muri kiliziya Gatulika sinode, ihuza abepiskopi bo ku Isi yose ikayoborwa na Papa, ikaba yatangiye kuri icyi cyumweru tariki ya 4 Ukwakira. 



 Padiri Krzysztof Olaf Charamsa 
  Amakuru dukesha bbc ni uko mu gihe iyi  Sinode yatangiraga I Roma, byatunguranye cyane ubwo umupadiri ukomoka mu gihugu cya Pologne yatangazaga ko asezeye ku bupadiri, ndetse agahita avuga ko ari umutinganyi. Padiri Krzysztof Olaf Charamsa w’imyaka 43 yabwiye abanyamakur b’Isi yose ati “Ndashaka kubwira kiliziya yanjye ko nanze, namaganye, urwango no gutoteza amadini akorera abakora imibonano mpuzabitsina babihuje.” Aseka cyane Krzysztof Olaf Charamsa yongeho ati "Ndi umutinganyi" Hari ibintu bitatu kiliziya isanga biri kwigaragaza mu miryango y’ubu, ku buryo igomba kugira icyo ibivugaho n’icyo ibikoraho; Ubutinganyi, gushyingira abantu batandukanye no kwemerera abantu gutandukana. Izi ngingo eshatu nizo zari ku meza ya Sinode yabaye umwaka ushize wa 2014, none zirongeye kugaruka ku meza ya Sinode ya 2015. 

 Umushumba wa kiliziya Gatolika Papa Francis nawe ni umwe mu batunguwe n’uyu mu padiri
  Mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bitatu, sinode iri kubera I Roma iyobowe na Papa Francis, iraza kwiga byimbitse ku ‘muryango’ Iterambere rya muntu n’urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima, bituma haba impinduka buri munsi, ku buryo amahame yashyizweho kera, ushobora gusanga atajyanye n’igihe abantu b’ubu bagezemo. Hari izindi ngingo zigomba kwigwaho muri iyo sinode zirebana n’umuryango, harimo nka gahunda zo kuboneza urubyaro, kwemerera abagore gukuramo inda n’ibindi. Bamwe mu bayoboke ba Kiliziya Gatorika ntago bashimishijwe n’ibyo uyu mu Padiri yatangaje ku mugaragaro n’ubwo we agaragaza ko ari uburenganzira bwe ndetse kandi ko nawe ari umwana w’Imana nk’abandi bose. Yanditswe na Akayezu Snappy/Muhabura.rw

title: Inama yiga kuri Dosiye ya Rugamba Sipiriryani n’buryo ashobora kugirwa umutagatifu yatangiye ku mugaragaro
content:
Kurimiyi tariki ya 19 Nzeri I Kigali hatangijwe ku mugaragaro umuhango w’ab’ukwemera Gatolika, kugira umuntu wapfuye umutagatifu bica mu nzira y’itsinda ry’ababisabye n’abatanga ubuhamya mu kitwa Urukiko n’urubanza rwo kubumva .
 Mu nteko y’urukiko yari iyobowe na Musenyeri wa Arikediyoseze ya Kigali  Thadeo  Ntihinyurwa izaba ari Inteko igizwe n’itsinda ry’abasabiye Rugamba na Daphrose umugorewe ko bashyirwa mu mu rwego rw’abahire n’abatagatifu ndetse n’itsinda ry’abashinzwe kwiga ku mibereho n’imigenzereze yabo.
