Kimwe ni uko Yesu yabaraga icyaha ubwa gatatu kuri wa mugabo wibwira ko nta busambanyi yakoze (bitewe n’ubundi na za mpamvu zatumye akimubaraho kabiri), ikindi gishoboka ni uko Yesu yavugaga umugabo waba woheje umugore ngo ate umugabo we amwishakire maze bigaragare ko we "nta busambanyi yakoze." Niba Yesu yaravugaga ko umugabo uwo ari we wese ku isi urongoye umugore wasenzwe aba asambanye, noneho buri mugabo w’Umuyisirayeli wese, mu myaka magana ane mbere yaho, warongoye umugore wasenzwe, nk’uko amategeko ya Mose yabyemeraga, yakoze icyaha cy’ubusambanyi. Mu by’ukuri ubwo abagabo bose bari muri iryo teraniro bafite abagore bacyuye barasenzwe n’abandi bagabo nk’uko amategeko ya Mose yabibemereraga, ako kanya bahise bagibwaho n’icyaha kitari kibariho umunota umwe mbere yaho, kandi ubwo Yesu agomba kuba ari ho yari agihindura amategeko y’Imana. Kandi uhereye ubwo ni ukuvuga ngo umuntu wese uzajya ashaka uwatandukanye n’uwo bashakanye, yizeye amagambo ya Pawulo mu rwandiko yandikiye Abakorinto avuga ko icyo atari icyaha, azaba akoze icyaha cy’ubusambanyi. Umwuka ugize Bibiliya wantera gushima umugabo washatse umugore wasenzwe n’umugabo we. Niba ari umugore wahohotewe n’umugabo we wa mbere kubera kwikunda kwe, uwo mugabo namushima nk’uko nashima urongora umupfakazi, akamwitaho akamufasha. Uwo mugore abaye hari amakosa yakoze mu gutandukana n’umugabo we wa mbere, uwo mugabo umucyuye namushimira umutima we ushushanywa n’uwa Kristo mu kwizera ko uwo mugore azaba mwiza, akibagirwa ibyahise kandi akemera gusa n’uwigerezaho.  Ni nde muntu wasomye Bibiliya kandi akaba afite Umwuka Wera muri we ushobora kuvuga ko Yesu yabuzaga umuntu wese kuzashaka umuntu uwo ari we wese watandukanye n’uwo bashakanye? Mbese ibyo bihurira he no kudaca urwa kibera kw’Imana, kutabera kudashobora guhana umuntu kubera ko yahohotewe, nk’uko bimeze ku mugore wasenzwe azira ubusa? Mbese igitekerezo nk’icyo gihurira he n’ubutumwa bwiza, butanga imbabazi n’andi mahirwe ku munyabyaha wihannye? Bibiliya ikomeza kuvuga ko buri gihe iyo habaye gutandukana kw’abashakanye haba hari uwakoze icyaha muri bo cyangwa bombi bakaba bafitemo uruhare. Ntabwo Imana yigeze ishaka ko hari uwatandukana n’uwo bashakanye, ariko mu mbabazi zayo yemeye ko mu gihe habaye ubusambanyi umuntu yatandukana n’uwo bashakanye. Kandi mu mbabazi zayo yemeye ko igihe habaye gutandukana kw’abashakanye bashobora no kongera gushaka. Iyo ataba amagambo Yesu yavuze ku byerekeye kongera gushaka, nta n’umwe wasoma Bibiliya ngo yigere atekereza ko kongera gushaka ari icyaha (uretse nk’ahantu habiri gusa mu Isezerano Rya Kera n’ahandi hamwe mu Rishya, urugero nk’umukristo utandukana n’undi mukristo bashakanye akongera agashaka). Ariko hari uburyo bwumvikana twabonye bwo guhuza ibyo Yesu yavuze ku kongera gushaka n’ibyo ibindi Byanditswe bya Bibiliya bisigaye bivuga. Yesu ntiyarimo asimbuza amategeko y’Imana yerekeye ku byo kongera gusha ayandi akaze kuyarusha abuza umuntu kongera gushaka na rimwe, amategeko adashoboka kubahirizwa ku bantu bamaze gutandukana n’abo bashakanye bakongera gushaka (nko gusubiranya igi ryamenetse), kandi amategeko nk’ayo yatera urujijo akaba yatuma abantu bica andi mategeko y’Imana. Ahubwo Yesu yafashaga abantu gusobanukirwa uburyarya bwabo. Yafashaga abibwiraga ko badashobora gusambana kumenya ko ahubwo bakora ubusambanyi mu bundi buryo, mu buryo bw’irari ryabo no gusenda abagore babo uko bishakiye kose. Nk’uko Bibiliya yose uko yakabaye yigisha, umunyabyaha wihannye ababarirwa icyaha icyo ari cyo cyose, kandi agahabwa amahirwe ya kabiri n’aya gatatu, n’abatandukanye n’abo bashakanye barimo. Mu Isezerano Rishya nta cyaha kiri mu kongera gushaka uko ari ko kose, uretse gusa umukristo watandukanye n’umukristokazi, ikintu kitari gikwiriye kubaho kuko abizera nyakuri badasambana, ubwo rero nta mpamvu igaragara yo gutandukana. Biramutse bibayeho bagatandukana, bombi bagomba kugumira aho batongeye gushaka cyangwa bakiyunga bagasubirana. Yanditswe na Niyomugabo/Muhabura.rw

title: Mungire Inama: Umugabo wange afite akabazo mu gutera akabariro kandi mbona mbimubwiye yabyakira nabi
content: Mu mezi atandatu maze nshakanye n’uwo nari narihebeye, nahuye n’ikibazo gikomeye kandi bigoye kubaba nacyo. Umugabo wange ntanshimisha mu gutera akabariro, cyane ko yaba nge ndetse nawe nta n’umwe w’igeze akora imibonano-mpuzabitsina mbere yo gushakana, mpora nibaza uko yabyakira ndamutse mubwiyeko imyitwarire ye mu gitanda itanyura. Ndi mugore w’imyaka 24 y’amavuko, mvuka mu karere ka Nyarugenge, nta mwana mfite, mfite umugabo   tumaranye amezi atandatu dushakanye, nashakanye n’umusore twakundanye cy’ imyaka isaga ibiri. Kuko namukundaga nawe akankunda ntitwigeze dukora imibonano-mpuzabitsina na rimwe, none aho tubaniye nasanze atazi gutera akabariro. Ikbazo nibaza ni uburyo yakiyakira ndamutse muhishuriye ko adashoboye muri icyo gikorwa. Nkeka ko yambaza ndikumugereranya na nde. Nta wundi mugabo turaryamana kugeza ubu, nta n’ubwo mbabazwa n’uburyo abikoramo ahubwo mbabazwa n’uko atajya arenza umunota atararangiza, ibyo birambabaza cyane ndetse nkabura icyo nkora kuburyo hari n’igihe ntekereza ku byo kumuca inyuma. Urukundo mukunda na rwo rutuma ntabitinyuka kuko nzi neza ko nawe ankunda uko bikwiye. Gusa hejuru y’urwo rukundo hagomba kuzamo no kubaka urugo. None mu ngire inama mureke nigire gushaka undi ko kwihanganira ibi ari ihurizo? Yanditswe na Ukurikiyimfura Leonce/Muhabura.rw

title: Ibintu 7 byakwereka ko umugabo wawe adashobora kureka kugukunda nubwo byagenda bite
content:
Gukunda si ibintu byoroshye. Mugore cyangwa mukobwa niba ushaka kugira urukundo ruzahoraho ibihe byose ku buryo uzajya urwishimira ugomba gushaka umugabo ugukunda kandi ushobora kuguha urukundo rwe rwose yivuye inyuma. Ese uwo mugabo wamubwirwa niki?
 Dore ibintu 7 by’ingenzi byakwereka umugabo ugukunda mu buryo bwose bushoboka, nubwo byagenda bite adashobora kukureka: Biramuhangayikisha mu kumenya uburyo umeze Umugabo uba ashaka ko mushobora kumarana igihe kirekire mu kundana; cyangwa mushobora gukundana ubuziraherezo uzamubwirwa nuko muri we aba ahangayikishijwe no kumenya uko wumva umeze. Iyo abonye ikintu kuri wowe kidagenda neza cyangwa se akabona ko utishimye arakwegera akakuaza impamvu ituma utishimye. Akakubaza ati, “mukundwa cyangwa se mukunzi wabayiki ko utishimye? Ni iki kitagenda neza? Umeze ute?” Akimara kubikubaza asigara ashaka uburyo bwose bushoboka bwo kuba yakemura ikibazo kikava mu nzira mu buryo bwihuse. 
Yirinda ibintu byose bishobora kuba byagutera ikibazo mu buzima bwawe Ikindi kintu cya kabiri kizakwereka umugabo udashobora kureka kugukunda nubwo byagenda bite; yitondera ikintu cyari cyo cyose gishobora kugutera ikibazo kigatuma utishima mu buzima bwawe. Kuba azirikana ibintu uba wamubwiye ko udakunda, yatrangiza akabyubahiriza ntabirengeho akabiha agaciro kabone nubwo kaba ari akantu gato cyane, bizakubere ikimenyetso cyuko agukunda ubuziraherezo cyangwa akwitayeho. Igihe cyose ahora agutekereza
 Umugabo ushobora kuzahora agukunda igihe cyose ahora agutekereza mu buzima bwe. Kandi agafata umwanya umwanya munini muri we atekereza ku rukundo rwanyu. Yishimira kuba yahora akuratira abandi bagabo ko afite umugore mwiza umunyura kandi umushimisha muri byose kabone nubwo waba umubabaza ntacyo biba bimubwiye arabyirengagiza akabirengaho. Ikindi kandi nuko igihe kirekire gishoboka azahora yishimira kuba yajya ahora akuvugisha ashaka kumenya niba umeze neza cyangwa utameze neza. Ibyishimo byawe nibyo byiwe Umugabo kandi ugukunda uzamubwirwa nuko igihe cyose ibyishimo byawe bizamubera umunezero kuri we, nawe akumva yishimye. Iyo ufite ikibazo kigukomereye nawe kimubera umutwaro ukomeye mu buzima bwe. Ahora azirikana ibyishimo byawe nkukonawe aba ashaka guhora akubona wishimye, nta kantu k’umunkanyari kari mu maso yawe. Umunezero wawe, ibyishimo byawe byose bihinduka umunezero kuri we netse bikanahindukaibyishimo kuri we. Yishimira kuba agukunda wenyine Ikizakubwira umugabo udashobora kukureka mu buzima bwe nuko azishimira kandi agaharanira kuba yahora agukunda wenyine nta wundi mugore cyangwa umukobwa atekereza muri we. Azakubera inyangamugayo muri byose kandi ahore yumva yanakwitangira no mu bibazo byose ushobora guhura nabyo. Kuba yatekereza undi mugore cyangwa umukobwa bizamubera ihurizo kuri we, ndetse rimwe na rimwe ubone byanamutesheje umutwe. Umugabo udashobora kureka kugukunda mu buzima bwe uzamubwirwa nuko nta mutima urehareha umurangwaho kandi uba yumva mwakomeza mukikundanira ubuziraherezo. Amakosa yawe ntacyo aba amubwiye Umugabo uzahora agukunda uzamubwirwa nuko agomba guhora azi neza kandi azirikana muri we ko utari intungane muri byose, ndetse wanakora amakosa ntayiteho ukabona rimwe na rimwe yanakubabariye nta n’imbabazi wamusanye. Ikindi kandi nuko no mu gihe wamenye ko wakosheje ukamusaba imbabazi ntazatinda kuziguha kuko azi neza ko nta muntu udakosa kandi nta n’uhora atunganye. Iki kizakubere ikimenyetso kidasibangana cyuko atazigera aguhemukira mu buizima bwanyu cyangwa mu rukundo rwanyu. Igihe cyose aba akuri hafi aguhoza amarira Ikizakubwira umugabo ushobora kugukunda ubuziraherezo nuko igihe cyose abona ko utishimye, ubabaye azishimira kugusanganira akaguhoza amarira. Akakubwira ati, “mukundwa wirira ndi kumwe nawe.” Igihe cyari cyo cyose azishimira guhora akubahafi kandi aharanira ko wishima mu buzima bwawe; ndetse uzanamubwira nuko uzabona aharanira umunezero n’ibyishimo byanyu. Yanditswe na Bizimana Jean Damascene/Muhabura.rw

title: Dore  ibintu 20  ushobora gukora kugira ngo ubagarire urukundo kandi unashimishe uwo ukunda
content:
Dore ibintu ushobora gukora kugira ngo ubagarire urukundo kandi unashimishe uwo ukunda bityo utavaho witesha amahirwe yo gukunda no gukundwa.
 Urubuga rwa internet twifashishije tubitegura www.anvari.org  rugaragaza ko hari ibikorwa by’urukundo bigera kuri 50 umuhungu cyangwa se umukobwa ashobora gukora kugira ngo ashimishe uwo akunda kandi binamufashe no kumva ibyiza byo kuba mu rukundo. Muri ibyo 50 twabatoranirijemo 20 bishobora kubafasha  m’urukundo rwanyu.
Ibyo bikorwa ni ibi bikurikira:
 1. Mu gihe uri kumwe n’uwo ukunda, jya ugerageza kumubwira mu ijwi ryoroheje ndetse akenshi  nujya kumubwira akantu gasekeje cg se k’ibanga ujye  ukoresha kumwongorera, ngo kuko ibi bituma yumva ibizongamubiri n’itandukaniro riri hagati yawe n’abandi. 2. Gerageza kumufata mu kiganza igihe muri kumwe mugendana, ngo kuko ibi bituma akwiyumvamo cyane, akanumva ko utamuri kure. 3. Niba kandi yagusuye, muhamagare umujyane mu gikoni mutegurane ifunguro. Urugero nk’umureti, agafiriti, gukaranga ubunyobwa n’ibindi. Ibi  rero ngo biramushimisha kabone niyo mwateka ibitaryoshye. 4. Jya ukunda kumuha impano akenshi ndetse  wibande kuzihendutse cyane rwose ngo kandi ujye ureba iyo atatekerezaga ko wamuha. 5. Kora ubushakashatsi umenye umwenda akunda muyo ufite hanyuma ube ari wo wambara igihe cyose muri kumwe. 6. Numuramutsa, jya umuhobera cyane kandi umwegereye kabone niyo mwaba muherukana vuba. 7. Fata igihe umubwire mutemberane mujye ahantu kure n’amaguru kandi hitaruye nko ku mucanga, mu ishyamba n’ahandi. 8. Jya ukunda kumubwira ko ari we wenyine wifuza kandi utamubeshya. 9. Fata akanya igihe muri kumwe umufate ku rutugu, umurebe mu maso  na we akurebe, mumare nk’iminota ibiri mutavuga, ubone umubwire ko umukunda nibiba ngombwa unamusome utamuteguje. 10. Kora akantu kerekana ko mukundana igihe muri no mu bantu benshi. 11. Muririmbire kabone nubwo waba udafite ijwi ryiza ngo we biramshimisha 12. Mutumire aze musangire ifunguro haba mu rugo cyangwa se muri restora. 13.Mufate akaboko umurebe mumaso hanyuma umusome ku kiganza nurangiza uhite ugishyira mu gituza cyawe mu gice guherereyemo umutima (ibi biba byiza ngo iyo bikozwe n’umuhungu). 14. Jya umusaba uburenganzira bwo kumuhamagara  kenshi. 15. Mu gihe wagize akazi kenshi, gerageza gushakisha byibura iminota mike ujye ahantu hatari urusaku hanyuma umuhamagare wibuke no kumubwira ijambo ngo “ndagukunda” (I love you). 16. Gerageza kumukorera ibintu bimwereka ko harimo ubwitange ariko wirinde kumubwira ko witanze. Wowe bikore, hanyuma we abibone utarinze kubimubwira. 17. Gerageza kumushushanyiriza ibyishimo  byo kuba ari we muri kumwe mu rukundo. 18. Mufashe kwitoza kubwirana amagambo y’urukundo mu ndimi z’amahanga 19. Mujye mukorana gahunda zimwe na zimwe nko kujyana gusenga, kureba film, umupira  n’ibindi bitandukanye ariko mwirinde kubana  ahantu hamwe ( mu gipangu kimwe). 20. Jya wibuka amatariki afata nk’ingirakamaro  mu buzima  bwe nk’itariki ye y’amavuko, iy’umubatizo we, umunsi w’umutagatifu we n’izindi kandi umwereke ko wabyibutse. Yanditswe na Niyomugabo Robert/Muhabura.rw

title: EPISODE 5: Umubano usigaye uri hagati ya Jack na Fiston uhatse byinshi gusa ni amahirwe kuri Angel…………….
content:
Ubwo mwarimu akimara kwinjira twese twahise twirukira mu myanya yacu gusa Fiston we bahise bamuhagurutsa ariko mwarimu ntiyirirwa amubaza icyo twari turi gukora ahubwo yahise amubwira ngo yivuge hanyuma avuga amazina ye ubundi arongera aricara amasomo aratangira nk’uko bisanzwe. Bitewe rero n’uko mu mwaka wa mbere twabaga turi benshi ubwo batugabanyaga mu ma class abiri atandukanye ariko yose yo mu wa mbere. Twe twigaga muri A abandi biga muri B, Uwo munsi twarize amasaha yo kujya hanze muri break yarageze turasohoka gusa mbona Fiston arasohotse agragenda ahagarara ahantu wenyine nange ndagenda muhagarara iruhande turaganira nyine akomeza ambwira iwabo gusa kuko icyo gihe nange nabaga muri Famille Kicukiro yambwiye iwabo numva nshobora kuba mpazi cyane ko yari amaze no kumbwira ko akunda kujya gukinira Basketball kwa Carlos kandi nange ariho club nabyinagamo ikorera urumva twari duhuye twese turi abo mu gace kamwe ariko nanone Fiston we yari asanzwe afite Frank banabana kandi baturuka nawe hamwe. Ako kanya tukimara kwibwirana na Fiston hahise haza abakobwa babiri ngewe ntan’Umwe nari nzi urazi ibintu byo kuba ugeze kwishuli bwa mbere akenshi usanga abanyeshuli bose ubona basa ndetse uwo wabonye mu gitondo wabona undi ugashaka kumwitiranya ahanini bitewe n’uko bose baba bambaye imyenda isa kandi ari na benshi. Ubwo abo bakobwa baradusuhuje nange nahise ngira ubwoba ngo baje kutunyuzura dore ko muri icyo gihe aribyo byari bigezweho, gusa baradusuhuje ntungurwa no kumva umwe muri bo ahamagaye Fiston mu izina ntangira kumenya ko wa mwana ashobora kuba afite abantu benshi baziranye cyane ko yari yanambwiye ko hari Frank wiga mu wa kabiri baziranye kandi babana. Reo ako kanya bakimara kudusuhuza umwe muri bo yahise abwira Fiston ati se waraye neza nuko ahita ambwira ati “wowe singushaka hano nta mururu uhagararana n’abantu bakuze vuba hita ujya mu ishuli nonaha” ubwo nange nahise nkuramo akange karenge ba bakobwa ariko beza cyane basigarana na Fiston ariko nabo ntago hashize umwanya isaha zo kwinjira ziragera hanyuma Fiston ahita aza muri Class ansanga aho nari nicaye araseka cyane ati mwana uriya mu baby niwe wagukanze nawe urabyemera Icyo gihe yanyumvishije uburyo basigaye baseka ko ngira ubwoba cyane ariko nyine iyo uri umururu kubo byabayeho barabizi uba ufite ubwoba n’akana gatoya urusha urutugu karagukanga rwose ugapfukama ukanarira iyo bibaye ngombwa.
Icyo gihe rero Fiston yananyumvishije uburyo umwe muri abo bakobwa yankuze ahubwo yamubwiye ngo ambwire ko anshaka saa sita nitujya kurya njya ku mureba urumva namwe byabaga ari ukunjyana aho ashaka kuko yigaga mu wa kabiri ngewe ndi umururu ubwo sasa sita zarageze ngewe na Fiston turasohoka ubwo nyine twari twamaze kuba inshuti zidatandukana no kurya twarajyanye ariko tukigera ku muryango wa Refectoire(aho twariraga) tubona babakobwa nanone baje kutureba ubwo ngewe nashatse kubwira Fiston nti reka nikwepere sinshaka ko bongera kunkora nk’ibyo bankoze kare. Sasa umwe yatugezeho ahita atubwira ati muze tujye gusangira ubwo ariko Fiston we bari bamenyeranye ngewe nshaka gusa n’usigara ahita amfata akaboko aranjyana arangije ahita ambaza ati se ko ufite ubwoba kare nagukanze ? nange ndamubwira nti erega ndi umururu ngomba kubimenya kandi amaboko atareshya ntajya aramukanya nawe urabizi ibyo ngibyo. Ubwo twageze kuri table yabo nyine ariko mbona abakobwa bicayeho ari abakanganye gusa cyane ko n’ubwo nange nagiraga ubwiyemezi ariko icyo gihe nari ndi umururu ntago nagomba kwishyira hejuru. Ariko nkigera kuri table umukobwa umwe yahise avuga ari ariko murabona uyu muhungu adasa na Grace? ngewe numva nyine aranshanze cyane ko na Grace uwo ntawe nari nzi. Abantu bose baraje muri refe turicara kuri table ngewe na Fiston banadutandukanije kuko we yari yicaranye na wa mukobwa bari kumwe kare naho ngewe bari bampereje hirya ariko umukobwa twicaranye natinye no kugira icyo namuvugisha hanyuma hageraho umwanya wo kwivuga twebwe nyine twari abaruru nitwe bahereyeho ariko muri ako kanya ……………………… EPISODE ikurikira ni ejo iyi saha

title: EPISODE 4: Bwa mbere Fiston akandagiye mu Ishuli gusa ntago bimworoheye……………….
content: Duherukana ibya Angel na Fiston byananiye gusobanuka ndetse na Frank ubwe amaze kuhagera yabaye nk’uguye mu kantu cyane ko atiyumvishaga ko kuba Fiston yahuye na Angel ndetse n’uburyo yari azi Angel ari umukobwa uzwiho kwiyemera cyane mu kigo adashobora gushamadukira Fiston noneho w’umururu mu gihe undi yiga mu mwaka wa kabiri. Uko byaje gukomeza ni muri iyi Episode. Frank agisohoka yahise abona uburyo abo bombi barimo kurebana habuze n’umwe ugira icyo avuga , amera nk’ukubiswe n’inkuba ariko nawe abyitwaramo nk’umuntu ukuze niko guhita afata akaboko umukunzi we amusoma ku itama arangije aramubwira ati ni karibu Bae (honey). Ubwo binjiye mu nzu ariko Fiston hanze nawe asigara umutwe umeze nk’uri kumurya bitewe n’uwo mwana yari yarakunze akimubona ku munsi wa mbere akaba ahise asanga yifitiye undi mukunzi kandi adafite uburyo bwo ku mumwambura cyane ko uwo bakundana ari inshuti ye magara. Ubwo rero Frank na Angel we bageze mu nzu ikiganiro kirakomeza ariko ibintu bias n’ibyahinduye isura cyane ko ari Frank yari yabonye uburyo Angel yitwaye imbere ya Fiston  kandi bari bahoze bamuganiraho gusa na Angel yageze imbere ya Frank ananirwa guhisha amarangamutima ye kuri Fiston, ubwo ikiganiro cyabo kimwe cyahoraga ari honey na chch, umutarutwa, ubuzima bwange, za Chr n’utundi tuzina tugaragaza urukundo rudasanzwe zahise zihinduka ariko Frank nawe atangira abaza Angel uko byagenze Bakigera ku buriri kuko niho bicaraga cyane ko mu kindi cyumba cyabaga muri iyo nzu habagamo ibikoresho batekesha n’utundi tuntu ikindi rero baryamagamo niho banakiriraga abashyitsi gusa akenshi bakundaga kuganira mu cyongereza kuko bombi bari barize mu mashuli abanza muri Anglophone Frank:My Angel how are u feeling right now? Angel: Huuummmmm Am ok Frank: Ooh bae why re u acting like that? Please be open and tell me what’s wrong now Angel: why tha question? Frank: So how was ur day? Angel: Fine Frank: but it seem as there is something strange today or? Angel: you know wat? I’ve one question Frank: Already allowed to ask Angel: May you call the man who is outside? Ooh sorry I just want to know him first Frank: (Surprised)….. So why him? Angel: Please if u don’t want no prob and I just want 2leave coz I want to in the class Frank: But the way u’re acting now is so stranger Angel: huummm am leaving now. Frank: (Speechless) Angel: See u

title: Menya imyumvire abantu benshi bagira  ku mibonano mpuzabitsina idafite ishingiro na gato
content: Hari imyumvire abantu benshi bagira ku buzima bw’imyororokere cyangwa se no ku mibonano mpuzabitsina idafite ishingiro na gato. Iyi ni imwe muri iyo.  Abagabo nibo bakunda imibonano mpuzabitsina cyane kurusha abagore, ngo abagore nibo baryoherwa nayo cyane kurusha abagabo! Ibi sibyo na gato. Impamvu yo gutekereza gutya ni uko akenshi umugabo cyangwa umuhungu ariwe ufata iyambere mu kwegera umukobwa cyangwa umugore, akamuganiriza, akamugezaho ikifuzo cye.  Nkuko byemezwa n’abahanga muri psychologie, aba bombi bafite ubuzima bw’imyororokere butandukanye, nta n’umwe ukunda imibonano mpuzabitsina kurusha undi cyangwa ngo aryoherwe nayo kurusha undi. Uburebure bw’igitsina cy’umugabo bufitanye isano n’indeshyo y’intoki ze! Ibi nabyo nta shingiro bifite, nkuko byemezwa n’abaganga. Nta mahuriro kandi n’indeshyo y’ibirenge bye, cyangwa iy’ikindi gice cy’umubiri. Kwikinisha bitera ubuhumyi, cyangwa gupfa amatwi. Iyi ni imyumvire yakwirakwiye cyane cyane ahagana mu kinyejana cya 18, kubera imyizerere ya Kiliziya gatolika yari yiganje cyane, aho kwikinisha byafatwaga nko kubura ubwenge cyangwa ingeso yaturukaga kwa shitani. Ushobora kwandurira imitezi, mburugu n’izindi ndwara mu bwiherero rusange...Ibi nabyo sibyo kuko izi ndwara zihuriye mu rwunge abahanga babatije MST zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina gusa. Mikorobi zizitera ntizishobora kubaho igihe ziri hanze y’umubiri w’umuntu. Abagore ntibakora imibonano mpuzabitsina n’umuntu badafitanye urukundo. Aha ho ndumva nta bisobanuro byinshi umuntu yatanga, ni ngombwa gusa gutandukanya urukundo no kuryamana n’umuntu, bishobora kuba ikimenyetso cyo kubaha uwo babikoranye ariko ashobora kuba atamukunda na gatoya. Igitsina cy’umugabo gishobora kuvunika ? Sibyo, ntikavunika nta gufa kigira. Hashobora kubaho impanuka iteza gukomereka kwacyo gusa, nko mu mibonano mpuzabitsina ya huti huti, gukira nabyo ntibitinda ku kibazo cyo gukomereka nk’uko. Hari abantu bashobora gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina amasaha menshi ( sexe tantrique)...ikigereranyo kivuga ko imibonano mpuzabitsina imara hagati y’iminota 3-7. Kumara amasaha menshi birashoboka ariko iyo ntiba ikiri igikorwa cy’umubiri, ahubwo iba yabaye igikorwa cya roho Yanditswe na Niyomugabo/Muhanura.rw

title: Ibimenyetso 7 bizakwereka ko inshuti yawe igukunda by’ukuri
content:
Kugira inshuti yawe y’umugore cyangwa umukobwa ukwiyumvamo kandi ukwishimira ntako bisa mu buzima kuko biba ari iby’igiciro. 
 Rimwe na rimwe hari igihe ugira umwaku cyangwa se amahirwe make ugakundana n’umukobwa utakwitaho, ibi birababaza mu buzima kandi bikanica mu mutwe iyo ntakwihangana ugira muri wowe. Ibyo bimenyetso 7 bizabikubwira ni ibi bikurikira: 1.Kuba yakwitangira mu buzima bwe akemera kuba yakirengera ingaruka zawe
 Umugore cyangwa umukobwa ukwishimira mu buzima uzamubwirwa nuko azakwitaho mu buryo budasanzwe kandi akemera kukwitangira mu bibazo byose ushobora kuba wahura nabyo byose. Azakwitangira mu gihe abandi bazaba batakwitayeho bakwihanye, bizakunezeza mu gihe abandi bantu bazajya bakubwira ko umugore wawe ari umuntu mwiza kandi agira umutima ukunda utameze nk’uw’abandi bagore cyangwa bakobwa. 2.Abayumva muri we amezeneza cyane igihe muri kumwe cyangwa mutari kumwe Umugore uzumva akwishimira kandi yumva akunezerewe igihe cyaricyo cyose mwaba muri kumwe cyangwa mutari kumwe, ndetse rimwe na rimwe nawe ukabibona ko akwiyumvamo bizakunezeza cyane kandi bigushimishe. Iki kizakwereka ko umugore wawe cyangwa umukobwa ukundana nawe akwiyumvamo kandi agukunda by’ukuri. 3.Ntazagira ikibazo cyo kuba yagenda akuratira abandi cyangwa akuvuga mu bandi Igihe uzabona umukunzi wawe akwishimira kandi atagira ikimwaro cyo kuba yagenda akuvuga mu bandi; akwereka inshuti ze cyangwa imiryango ye bizahite biguhamiriza ko agukunda cyane kandi yishimiye kuba muri kumwe mu rukundo. 4.	Kutagira urwikekwe igihe muri kumwe Iyo umukunzi wawe akuvugira cyangwa akuganiriza igihe muri kumwe nta rwikekwe rumugaragaraho, ibi bizakwereka ko hari ikintu cyikitari icy’uburyarya kimugaragaraho muri we mu rukundo agukunda. Azajya ahora akwishimira akwiyumvemo igihe cyose mwaba muri kumwe cyangwa mutari kumwe, uzajya ubona yishimira kuba yakuvugaho nko mu ruhame cyangwa se yishimira ko mwakorana imibonano mpuzabitsina nta kibazo kibanje kubaho. 5.	Kuba muri mu bandi, nko mu ruhame mwasohokanye nta kibazo bizamutera
 Ikizakubwira ko umugore wawe cyangwa umukobwa mukundana aguunda by’ukuri, nta buryarya bugaragaramo uzabimenyera nko mu ruhame rw’abandi bantu ubwo atazatinya cyangwa ngo agire igisebo cyo kuba yakwereka urukundo agukunda. Uyu mukobwa cyangwa mugore uzamubwirwa nuko uzajya ubona akwishimira nko mu bandi akishimira ko muba muri kumwe igihe cyose. 6.	Uzamubwirwa nuko uzabona agufasha muri byose mu rukundo rwanyu
 Umugore ukwishimira azishimira no kuba yahora agufasha mu bintu abona bitagenda neza cyangwa binaniranye; azahora ari umufasha wawe kandi ubone ari umuterankunga wawe ukomeye haba mu makuba cyangwa mu byago. Urukundo ni ikintu gikoye cyanekandi kiremereye ku bantu barujyamo bazi ibyo barimo gukora, Atari ukuryayryana. Kwiyumvanamo no kwishimirana muri byose bizagaragaza urukundo mufitanye kandi bizakwereka ko uwo mukunzi wawe atakubeshya. 7.	Arangwa no kugushimira ku byo umukorera byose
 Iyo umugore cyangwa umukobwa mukundana aguha agaciro kandi akwishimira uzamubwirwa nuko ibintu uzajya umukorera azajya abigushimira, kabone nubwo kaba ari akantu gato cyane kadafite n’agaciro kuri wowe. Ugushimira ni ikintu cy’ingenzi cyerekana agaciro aguha kandi agaciro ubwakokerekana ko umukunzi wawe akwishimira kandi agukunda, hari nicyo uvuze mu buzima bwe. Igihe uzabona umugore wawe cyangwa umukobwa mukundana akwereka ibi bintu birindwi n’ibindi bitabashije kuvugwa haruguru uzamenye ko agukunda by’ukuri kandi aguha agaciro mu bandi no mu buzima bwe muri rusange. Yanditswe na Bizimana Jean Damascene/Muhabura.rw

title: Dore impamvu zituma Inkumi zibeshya Abahungu
content:
Muri iki gihe usanga abakobwa bafite ingeso itari nziza yo kubeshya abasore barenze umwe ngo barabakunda kandi bigasa n’ aho byabaye umuco ku bakobwa n’ ubwo n’ abasore ari uko, ariko iyo bigeze ku bakobwa usanga byarafashe indi ntera.
 Kugira isoni no gutinya abahungu Abakobwa benshi usanga bagira amasoni yo kubwira abahungu icyo batekereza, bigatuma bapfa kwemera ibyo babwiwe byose kuko hari abahungu bamwe na bamwe wamubwira ko nta rukundo wamuha bikaba byamubabaza cyane ndetse bikavamo inzika ndende. Gukunda utuntu no kutagira urukundo Abakobwa b’ ubu usanga bakunda utuntu ku buryo batabasha guhakanira umusore uwo ariwe wese babonaho udufaranga kugira ngo babashe guhabwa ibyo bakeneye byose. Ibi bituma umukobwa ashaka kwigwizaho abasore kugira ngo icyo aburiye kuri umwe akibone ku wundi. Abakobwa batendeka abasore ni abakunda amafaranga
Uburyarya bw’ abasore Kubera ko muri iki gihe uburyarya bumaze kwibasira cyane cyane abasore, usanga bigoye kugira ngo umukobwa abashe kwizera ko ibyo abahungu baza bamubwira byaba ari ukuri. Kwirinda kugumirwa Iyo umukobwa ageze mu gihe cyo guteretwa n’ abasore benshi, ntabwo abasha kugira uwo ahakanira kuko aba yumva ko agize uwo ahakanira cyangwa akagira uwo yizera cyane byazamugiraho ingaruka zo kwisanga nta n’ umwe akigira nk’ inshuti, akazahera iwabo nta mugabo abonye.
Gushaka guhitamo neza. Abakobwa benshi bakunda gukora iki kintu cyo gutendeka kugira ngo abashe guhitamo yitonze akurikije uko abona inshuti ze zihagaze, kuko hari ubwo baza kumusaba urukundo nyamara ariko akaba atarabonamo uwo yifuza.
N’ ubwo abakobwa benshi babikora nk’ aho ari inzira nziza bakoresha ngo babashe kugira abakunzi beza cyangwa bagaragare neza, ariko ibi bibabaza abahungu cyane kuko hari ubwo umuhungu aba yarakunze by’ ukuri maze yasanga umukobwa yaramutendetse bigatuma yaguhemukira kubera umujinya Yanditswe na Niyomugabo/MUHABURA.RW

title: Imitoma 12 irenze ushobora kwifashisha kugira ngo ugushe neza umukunzi wawe
content:
Koherereza amagambo meza umukunzi wawe ukoresheje ubutumwa bugufi ni ikintu cy’ingenzi cyane ku buryo utazatekereza no kwicuza mu buzima bwawe. Dore imitoma irenze 12 ubwira umukunzi wawe agahita agurumana umuriro w’urukundo:
 1.	Ndi kumwe nawe sinzigera nicuza mu buzima bwanjye, igihe kirekire ntikizigera kimbera nk’imyaka igihumbi. 2.	Nsagwa n’ibyishimo byo kuba ndi kumwe nawe igihe cyose, kuvugana nawe, ndetse no kumva uri hafi yanjye bituma numva nezerewe mu umutima wanjye. 3.	Ni wowe si yanjye narintegereje, imbaraga zinsunika zinjyana aho uri kuko kuba aho uri ntako bisa. 4.	Nishimira cyane kugusoma kurusha uko nasoma undi muntu uwariwe wese kuko iminwa yawe impumurira neza nkumva nayigumana. 5.	Iyo utari kumwe nanjye mbura ingingo zimwe na zimwe z’umubiri wanjye, nkumva nsigaye njyenyine ku isi. 6.	Iyo uri kumwe nanjye mu mwanya mwiza nk’uyu w’umunezero, kugutekereza byonyine binzanira ibyishimo bidasanzwe, ese waba ubizi? 7.	Mu gihe wumva uri wenyine, ujye ureba hagati y’intoki zawe wibuke ko ariho intoki zanjye zikwirwa neza honyine kurusha uko nazifatisha hagati y’intoki z’undi muntu. 8.	Iyo nkubonye ntekereza ijuru mu gihe gito ubundi nkumva niho nibereye bigatuma ndushaho kuba hafi y’Imana kuko ariyo yakungeneye. 9.	Ubuzima bwanjye nabuboneye muri wowe, kuko iyo utabaho nta buzima bwiza mba mfite kuko kubaho nkubona iruhande rwanjye binyongerera iminsi yo kurama ku isi. 10.	Bavuga ko umuntu agwa mu rukundo rimwe gusa ariko njye iyo nkubonye iruhanjye utuje undebana akanyamuneza n’ubwuzu bituma nongera kugwa mu rukundo inshuro zitabarika. 11.	Rimwe na rimwe mba numva umutima wanjye ugiye guritswa n’ibyishimo bivanze n’umunezero iyo nkutekereje kuko akenshi bituma mbura amahoro mu mutima wanjye. 12.	Sinigeze mbasha kumenya neza ko nzagira ubuzima bw’umunezero mbukesha wowe igihe nakubonaga mu maso yanjye bwa mbere nkumva ibyishimo bitashye umutima wanjye. Source: www.elcrema.com Yanditswe na Bizimana Jean Damascene/Muhabura.rw

title: Muhungu menya amagambo ukobwa ashobora ku kubwira, ugakeka ko ari ukuri,nyamara atariko
content:
Ikintu gitangaje ku bakobwa ni kimwe, ni uko bashobora kuvuga ikintu nyamara ataricyo bagamije, ndetse bamwe batabizi bashobora kubifata uko umukobwa abivuze , nyamara ku muhanga akamenya urwo rurimi icyo rusobanura.
 Igihe kinini, imvamutima z’abakobwa zikunze gutuma avuga ibintu nyamara Atari byo yashakaga gusobanura. Ese byaba byarakubayeho?  Wabyitwayemo Ute?  Ntago bitangaje rwose kuko bitewe n’aho umutima we uba uri ndetse n’ibyiyumviro bye ntibyagutangaza  umubajije uti urankunda agasubiza ati Oya. Ushobora gutekereza ko ibisubizo Umukobwa aguhaye aribyo? Oya dore bimwe mu bintu umukobwa ashobora kukubwira ukamenyako ataribyo yasobanuraga bitewe n’igihe arimo.   Ndakwanga. Haba hari umukobwa waba warigeze kukubwira gutyo?  Kukubwira ngo ndakwanga bifite byinshi bisobanura. Mu byukuri ntago aba ashaka kukubwira ko akwanga, ahubwo ashobora kuba ashaka kukubwira ko “ acyeneye ko uhindura uburyo wamufataga mbese ukamufata neza cyane kurushaho”  naho iyo akubwiye ngo aragukunda hari ubwo  abashaka kukubwira ko “ Utakwitayeho neza cyane”. Ubwo rero jya witondera amagambo akubwira yose. Ntago ngukeneye. Iri jambo na ryo abakobwa bakunze kurivuga bitewe n’igihe barimo, ni amagambo bavuga mu gihe gito ntagutekereza mbese imitima yabo idahari. Akenshi azabikubwira igihe murimo gukora utuntu dutandukanye wenda muganira mwenyine ahantu hiherereye, mbese igihe mwageze mu isi y’urukundo.   Ntacyo bimbwiye. Iri jambo na ryo ntukarifate uko arivuze ngo uveho wanamurakarira. Buri kintu cyose kigira icyo kivuze ku mukobwa bitandukanye n’abahungu badakunze kwita ku bintu cyane. Hari ubwo uzakora ikintu akubwire ko ntacyo bimutwaye nyamara nyuma y’icyumweru 1 ubone cyamugizeho ingaruka. Ubwo rero jya umenya uko witwara icyo gihe. Ndakwizera.  Ohhh Ndakwizera. Nubwo yaba koko akwizera, ntago byamubuza kukugenzura ngo amenye ko waba ufite indi nshutu y’Umukobwa. Ubwo rero ntukabifate nk’uko abikubwiye. Ntago ndakaye. Iki ni kimwe mu bintu buri mukobwa wese azi kuvuga, ashobora kukubwira ko atarakaye nyamara yenda guturika. Ushobora kuba nawe ubibona kandi nawe ari uko ariko wamubaza ati “ oya Ntago ndakaye” gerageza rero kumushimisha kugeza nawe ubibonye n’ubwo aba yabikubwiye. Reka Tube inshuti bisanzwe.
 Iyi mvugo ikunze gukoroga umubare utari muke w’Abahungu ndetse ikanababaza cyane. Ari ko mubyukuri binababaza umutima pe. Ubwo rero ashobora kubikubwira ashaka kukwerereka ko hari icyo utarimo gukora neza, cyangwa se yagize amasoni yo guhita akwemerera. Ntibindeba.  Iki Iki??????????!!   Ayo magambo yituma wibazo byinshi kuko ,uko aba abivuze siko biba bimeze ahubwo biba bimureba cyane ndetse abyitayeho, gusa akakubwira gutyo.
 Dukeneye kuvugana ho gato ikintu. Mu binzwi iyo umuntu akubwiye ko afite icyo kukubwira aba agifite koko kandi akakubwira ikintu gifatika. Ariko kumukobwa si uko bimeze ahubwo aba ashaka kukubwira ko hari ibitagenda neza mu mubano wanyu. Ubwo rero ujye ugenda uzi icyo agiye kukubwira. Ntago unkunda?
 Ashobora kukubazo icyo kibazo, ugakeka ko akeneye kukubaza niba umukunda koko!!  Nyamara we abashaka kukubwira ko agukunda.
Nkunda uriya mukobwa mwarimo kuganira.  Niba uri umugabo uzi ubwenge, menya impamvu akubwiye ayo magambo maze ube witegura gusobanura ibyo warimo uganira n’uwo mukobwa mwari kumwe kandi utamubeshye. Ibuka ko abakobwa bakunda gufuha cyane ndetse bakanabigaragaza . Icyitonderwa: Ibyo byose  twavuze jya ubyemera bitewe n’aho abikubwiriye ndetse n’uko umubona mu maso ye. Biriya rwose bibaho cyane kuko murabizi ko abakobwa bagira amasoni ashobora kwanga ariko kwemera kwe. Yandanditswe na Ukurikiyimfura Leonce/MUHABURA.RW

title: Impamvu 5 zitera abagabo guca inyuma abagore babo bakigira mu b’abaturanyi
content: Gucana inyuma ni ikibazo kirigufata indi ntera mu bashakanye, hari impamvu ziza ku isonga ahanini zitera abagabo kurarikira abagore b’abaturanyi. Bamwe ngo ntibaba banyuzwe nimyitwarire y’abagore babo ngo bitewe n’igitutu kirimo no kwita ku bana cyangwa se bafite nk’ ibibazo by’ubukene abandi ugasanga bafite amatsiko gusa yo kumva uko no kubonana n’abandi bagore batari ababo bimera. Hari impamvu z’ingenzi zitera abagabo kuca inyuma abagore babo bakigira mu b’abaturanyi nk’uko tubikesha ubushakashatsi bwakorewe ku ngo zo muri Nigeria 1.	Biroroha kubeshya icyo ugiye gukorayo Aha, abagabo biborohera kubeshya abagore babo aho bagiye. Bikoza ku baturanyi bakikorera ibyabo maze bagataha babeshya ko bavuye nko kunywerayo cyangwa kuhataramira bisanzwe. Aha ngo ntacyo umugore yarenzaho ndetse na nyir’urugo ntabyitaho cyane. 2.	Iyo nyir’urugo abafashe nyamugabo abona ibyo yireguza Aha ni mu gihe umugabo avuye iwe akajya gusenya urw’umuturanyi we. Iyo umugabo nyir’ urugo abafashe, uwaje gusenya yiregura avuga ko yaraje kureba umugabo mugenzi we, agasanga adahari maze akaba aganiriza umugore. Nyir’urugo na we ngo ntacyo arenzaho. 3.	Nta tumanaho nka Facebook, ibaruwa cyangwa telephone bisaba Birumvikana ko kubera baba baturanye, ntabwo gupanga iyo gahunda bibasaba ibikoresho by’itumanaho. Umwe yinyabya hirya agahura n’undi bakuzuza umupango nta mususu. 4.	Kuba bahorana  Iki ni kimwe mu byoroshya iki cyaha. Kuba umugabo ahora abona umugore buri gihe, baba bamaze kumenyerana buri umwe azi icyo undi akunda kuburyo no kumutereta byoroha kuko babikora mu rwenya, mbese batebya ku buryo n’ubabonye abifata nk’ibisanzwe 5.	Kuba nta gahunda z’urukundo ziba zibyihishe inyuma Ni gake umugabo yatekereza ibyo gukunda umugore w’umuturanyi. igishoboka cyane aba ari ukumurarikira. Nk’ibisanzwe rero gukora imibonanompuzabitsina byoroha hagati y’abantu badafitanye urukundo kurusha ababibangikanya na rwo. Yanditswe na Lucky van Rukundo/Muhabura.rw

title: Menya ibintu Abahungu benshi  bahita bihutira kureba iyo bahuye n’umukobwa bwa mbere
content:
Abahungu benshi bafite ibintu bahita bihutira kureba iyo bahuye n’umukobwa bwa mbere.Bakobwa mbibire n’akandi kabanga mutari muzi,mugomba kuba mwiteguye aho muri hose kuko abahungu baba babareba buri segonda buri uko ushinguye ikirenge. Niyo mpamvu n’abatoranyirije ibi bintu  abahungu baba bari kubarebaho.
 1.Isura:
Isura buriya nicyo kintu cya mbere abahungu bafata nk’ingenzi bahita bareba mugihura.Uko useka,uko usa,iko useka,amaso yawe,niba ufite ibiheri ,mbese buri kimwe kiba mu maso.Niba ushaka gukurura umuhungu shaka uburyo wacya mu isura. 2.Amabere:
Ushobora kutabikunda cyangwa ukabikunda,Niba umusore agiye kukwitegereza,arubika umutwe ubundi yitegereze n’amabere yawe.Ibintu by’ingenzi aba ashaka kurebaho ni uko amabere yawe angana,nuko ateye.Ariko uretse ko abahungu bakunda bitandukanye,ni nako basuzuma amabere yawe bitandukanye,hari abakunda amabere manini,abandi aringaniye gusa ibyo ntibikagitere ikiba zo. 3.Amabuno:
Ubundi amabere n’amabuno byagakwiye kuza ku mwanya wa 2 kuko urebye byose biranjyana,ariko nahisemo gushyira amabuno ku mwanya wa gatatu.Imiterere y’amabuno ndetse n’ingano yayo ni kimwe mu bintu abahungu badashibora kwihanganira mu kwitegereza.Mwe icyo mugomba kumenya bakobwa,nuko abahungu baba babitegereza ku mabuno yanyu iyo muri gutambuka mu nzira. 4.Imyambarire:
Imyambarire y’abakobwa burya ni kimwe mu bintu bishobora gukurura umuhungu,Niba wambaye neza cyangwa wambaye nabi umuhungu ashobora guhita abibona mu masegonda macye akikubona.We akibona imyambarire yawe ashobora guhita avuga niba uri umukobwa w’iyubashye cyangwa utiyubashye. 5.Imisatsi:
Naratunguwe nanjye gusanga umusatsi w’umukobwa ari ikintu umuhungu nacyo kirangaza umuhungu.Buriya umusatsi nawo uri mu bintu umukobwa agira byarangaza umuhungu mu gihe ari kukureba,ubundi insokozo y’umusatsi ikurura umuhungu bidasubirwaho kuko iyo ayirembye yumva akwishimiye kandi akabona niba koko ikubereye. 6.Ibitugu:
Ibitugu by’umukobwa nabyo bikurura abahungu cyane.Niba utari unabizi ibitugu byawe mukobwa nibyo bikwerekana uko uteye,haba mu ngano yawe,amataye,amabuno,ibirenge,mbese buri kimwe kigize umubiri wawe.Umuhungu akimara kubona ibitugu byawe ahita akumenya wese uko uteye. Yanditswe na Niyomugabo/Muhabura.rw

title: EPISODE 3: Fiston yongeye guhura na Angel mu buryo butunguranye ariko bombi Babura uwabanza undi…………………
content:
Duheruka Fiston na Frank batashye muri Ghetto aho Frank yari asanzwe aba wenyine bagiye kubana ndetse na Diregiteri hamwe na Maman wa Fiston yabyemeye nta kibazo gusa ariko nanone Diregiteri yahise abwira Frank ati nubwo mugiye kubana hanze y’ikigo ariko umenye neza……. ….. Fiston yahise abibwira Diregiteri hanyuma nawe arabemerere gusa Diregiteri yabwiye Frank ati umenye neza ko ngomba kujya menya neza ko mwize neza kandi Fiston akajya aza kunyereka amanota agira mu ma quiz agenda akora kugira ngo nze ndeba niba hari ikitagenda nzahita mbatandukanya. Ubwo na Frank yahise amwemerera ko nta kibazo azamwitaho kandi akajya amusobanurira nk’umuntu utari umenyereye kwiga muri Secondary birumvikana yari amenyereye ibya Primary kandi nabwo baba biga bataha bitandukanye no kwiga uba ku kigo cyangwa muri Gettho Aho urya ari uko uvuye kuri boutique kugura ibyo kurya mu gihe iwanyu wavaga ku ishuli ubaza ibyo bahishije utazi n’aho byavuye. Fiston na Frank ubwo bahise bafata ibyo bikapu bya Fiston baragenda bajya muri ako kavumo ka Frank bagiye kujya babanamo ari babiri, Gusa iyo Ghetto yari iri ahantu hari amazu menshi ari mu gipangu asanzwe abamo n’abandi banyeshuli ahanini usanga inzu imwe ibamo babibiri babiri uretse Frank niwe wenyine wabaga mu nzu ari umwe. Ubwo bageze aho ngaho nyine basanga hari n’abandi bana benshi muri icyo gipangu dore ko haba ari mu gihe cy’amasomo cyangwa ikitari icyamasomo hataburagamo abanyeshuli cyane ko kujya kwiga uba muri Ghetto biba ari ubushake ujya mu Ishuli iyo bikujemo kuko ntawe ujya akubaza ngo kuki utagiye kwiga kuko nta Animateur uhaba aho ngaho. Ubwo bakigera mu rugo aho ariko bashatse ibyo guteka kuko bwari bwije barateka hanyuma ari nako baganira mbese nk’abantu bari bamaze n’iminsi batabonana cyane ko banaturuka muri catier imwe kandi baba banafite byinshi baziranyeho by’aho iwabo muri Cartier. Gusa Fiston yaje kugera ku bijyanye n’urugendo rwe hanyuma abwira Frank iby’umukobwa wamwakiriye akigera ku marembo y’ikigo hanyuma amubwira ko yitwa Angel gusa Frank akimara kumva iryo zina yahise asa n’uhindutse mu maso naho Fiston: Bite se Angel uramuzi? Frank: Ubundi se mwahuye gute wamenye gute ko yitwa Angel? Fiston : Hhhh ntubizi se ko ndi umu Nyakigali? Ubwo nawe kweli uririrwa ubaza ubusa Frank: Nonese yakubwiye ko yiga mu wa kangahe? Fiston: Sha reka kumbaza byinshi gusa wumve ngo nange umukobwa yantunguye cyane kuburyo utabyumva mbese ndumva n’ubu nta mahorro mfite kubera Malayika (Angel ) wange nahuye nawe uyu munsi Frank: Hhhhh (aseka cyane) bivuze ngo rero umugore wanjye wamukunze? Fiston: Reka reka, Uriya mwana usa kuriya urakeka wamwiharira wenyine se? kbsa nureba nabi ndamugutwara kandi ntago ari blague man ubyumve kbsa Frank: Ariko man jya ureka Blague ngewe sinkina ku mwana wange, ahubwo ka mpite muhamagara aze hano kundeba
Ubwo ako kanya Frank yahise ajya munzu afata telephone ahamagara Angel amusaba kuza ku musura ngo basangire ibya nimugoroba Frank: Hello chch Angel: Ndakumva mukunzi mwiz Frank: Chr none ko nshaka ko uyu mugoroba uza tugasangira ibya nimugoroba? Angel: Urumva ari iki wansaba nkakikwima ngifite mukunzi wange? Ahubwo mukanya ndaba nkugezeho

title: EPISODE 2: Fiston yemerewe kujya kuba hanze y’ikigo muri Getho na Frank ariko ikibazo ni uko…………
content: Ubushize Angel yari aherekeje Fiston amugejeje kuri biro bikoreramo ubuyobozi bw’Ikigo (Adminitration), bari bamaze gusezeranaho gusa Angel amaze kubwira Fiston ngo azajye aza ku mureba mu ishuli yigamo amusuhuze gusa hari ikintu Angel yari agiye gusa Fiston n’ubwo tutigeze tubasha kikimenya ni muri iyi Episode ……………. Angel: Nonese uwagusaba ikintu hari ikibazo? Fiston:Ntakibazo nukuri uburyo wangiriye neza nta kintu nakwima pe Angel: Nonese waretse tukaza kongera kubonana nimugoroba ko abanyeshuli baragaruka hano mu kigo kwiga (yavugaga gukora Etude ya nimugoroba)? Fiston: Nonese urumva naza kukubona gute n’ubwo ibyo wari unsabye byoroshye kandi nanakubwiye ko nta kintu wansaba ngo nkikwime kandi uzi neza uburyo wangiriye neza Angel: Cyangwa reka tubireke basi tuzabonana ejo ku manywa ngewe nzaza kukwishakira ntugire ikibazo Fiston :Urakoze nukuri nzaba ngutegereje, ahubwo reka njye mu biro kureba abayobozi ubwo nawe ugire ibihe byiza Angel: Sawa kandi nkwifurije amahirwe muri iki kigo

title: EPISODE 1: Fiston ageze ku ishuli bwa mbere ku marembo yinjira mu kigo ahura n’umukobwa…….
content:
Fiston ni umwana wavukiye ndetse anakurira mu mujyi wa Kigali gusa yaje gutsinda ikizamini gisoza amashuli abanza bamwohereza kwiga mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba ku kigo yari agiyeho kwiga mu mwaka wa mbere cyemereraga ko umunyeshuli yiga aba mu kigo cyangwa akaba yakwiga ataha iwabo ndetse no muri Getto byaba byemewe ntakibazo. Fiston rero nk’umwana wakuriye mu Mujyi wa Kigali yagiye kwiga kuri icyo kigo kiri mu karere ka Kayonza, Intara y’I Burasirazuba ageze ku ishuli byabaye ngombwa ko ahasanga undi muhungu witwa Frank wari waraturutse mu gace kamwe na Fiston dore ko bose baturukaga mu karere ka Kicukiro, ndetse bose bari basanzwe baziranye ariko Fiston ajya kuza kwiga ntiyari aziko aje kukigo cyigaho uwo Frank. Fiston rero kuko ajya kuva mu rugo iwabo bari basanzwe baziranye na Directeur w’icyo kigo yari agiye kwigaho ntibyabaye ngombwa ko ajyana n’iwabo ahubwo Maman we yahamageye Directeur amubwira ko amwoherereje umuhungu we ngo amwiteho urumva Fiston yakuviriye mu rugo ajya ku Ishuli hari ku wa mbere mu masaha y’ikigoroba nibwo yafashe imodoka imujyana ku ishuli ubwo rero urumva kuri we nibwo bwambere yari agiye ndetse akoze urugendo rurenga mu karere ka Kicukico yerekeza mu ntara y’I Burasirazuba usibye I Kabuga gusa ntahandi yari azi ubwo yagendaga mu modoka abaza abantu gusa kuko ikigo cyari kiri hafi y’umuhanda ndetse ari ukugera I Kayonza muri Gare ugafata aka motto k’amafaranga 300 kakakugeza neza ku marembo y’ikigo Amasaha yaragiye aricuma Fiston ari mumodoka gusa amaherezo agera aho yumva shoferi aravuze ati bamwe bavuze ko baviramo I Kayonza muvemo vuba ndimo kwihuta ubwo Fiston yumva ko byanga bikunda yageze I kayonza niko kuva mu modoka afata ibikapu bye maze n’aba motari bahita bamusamira hejuru ababwiye ikigo bahita bamubwira bati kugerayo ni 300 icara kuri motto tugende. Umuhungu yakwicariye kuri Motto n’ibikapu bye byose uko ari bibiri ndetse na Envelope irimo inkweto, ubwo motto yaragiye imuhagarika ku marembo y’ikigo hanyuma arayishyura yerekana ibyangombwa aho ku basekurite barinda ikigo amaze kubyerekana baramureka arinjira gusa akinjira imbere yahise abona umukobwa mwiza ariko ufite ikinyabupfura kidasanzwe hanyuma Fiston n’ubwoba bwinshi aramusuhuza Fiston: Mwiriwe?
Umukobwa : Bite?
Fiston: ni byiza, none wamfashije ukanyobora ko ndi mushya hano?
Umukobwa: Ok ntakibazo ngwee banyita Angel (Enjo), niga hano mu mwaka wa kabiri
Fiston: Urakoze nange nitwa Fiston nje kwiga mu wambere  nturutse mu karere ka Kicukiro
Angel: OK, None birashoboka ko wazana nkagutwaza igikapu kimwe nkakugeza aho ubuyobozi bukorera ukajya kwiyandikisha bakaguha aho kurara?
Fiston: Eeh, Eeh ngewe? Sha nyine nta kibazo nditwaza ahubwo handangire aho ibiro(Bureau) biri mze nijyane
Angel: Sha nta kibazo nukuri zana ngutwaze
Fiston:Sawa nukuri urakoze Ubwo uwo mukobwa mwiza yafashe cya gikapu kimwe ndetse anafata kimwe kinini muri ibyo bibiri bagenda baganira Angel: Ubu ntiwananiwe urugendo rungana gutya ukoze kuva I Kigali ukagera inahangaha?
Fiston: (N’Ubwoba bwinshi) …...Sha ntakibazo nukuri ndumva ntacyo bitwaye namenyereye kugenda cyane kandi urugendo runini ndi mu modoka
Angel:Sha nyine rero dore tugeze kuri Administration (Aho abayobozi bakorera) ngaha turahageze maze ngewe niga muri rirya shuli uzajye uza kunsuhuza kandi nkwifurije amahirwe masa sibyo?
Fiston: Nukuri urakoze cyane ubwo nzajya nza kukureba
Angel: Nonese uwagusaba ikintu hari ikibazo? EPISODE 2 Ni Ejo nimugoroba

title: Wifuzaga kumenya ko  umukobwa  agukunda , dore bimwe mu bimenyetso uzamubonaho
content:
Rimwe na rimwe biragora ko umuhungu yamenya ko umukobwa amushaka cyangwa atamushaka, iyo umukobwa ashaka ko umuhungu yamusaba urukundo hari ibimenyetso amugaragariza. Niba wifuzaga kumenya ko umukobwa runaka agukunda ndetse yifuza cyane ko mwakundana dore bimwe mu bimenyetso uzamubonaho. 1.	Yishimira cyane kuganira nawe Iyo umukobwa akunda umuhungu yishimira cyane kumarana igihe nawe baganira, akunda kandi kumutega amatwi akumva ibyo amubwira. 2.	Arishima cyane iyo akubona Iyo akubona iruhande rwe bimutera akanyamuneza kuko iyo umukobwa yibonamo umuhungu yishimira cyane burigihe kumubona. 3.	Anyurwa no kuganira nawe ibintu runaka Iyo umukobwa akwibonamo ashimishwa cyane no kuganira nawe ku bintu bitandukanye, nta ngingo n’imwe itamushimisha kuyiganiraho iyo aganira nawe. 4.	Akwereka ko hari byinshi muhuriyeho Iyo umukobwa akwibonamo ahora akwereka ibintu mwembi muhuriyeho kandi bikamushimisha. 5.	Buri gihe iyo adahuze arabikumenyesha Iyo umukobwa atagukunda ahora akubwira ko ahuze nta mwanya afite ndetse n’iyo yaba adahuze ariko iyo umukobwa akwibonamo azakumenyesha igihe cyose afite umwanya n’ubwo utabimubaza. 6.	Akunda kugukoraho Abakobwa nabo bajya bagaragarisha ko bibona mu bahungu bari kuganira kubakoraho, iyo umukobwa muganira akajya akunda kugukoraho nabyo ni ikimenyetso ko akwibonamo cyane. 7.	Ntajya avuga ku bandi bahungu iyo muri kumwe Iyo umukobwa akunda umuhungu amwereka ko ntawundi mukunzi afite cyangwa akamubwira ko amaze igihe Atari mu rukundo yirinda cyane kuba yavuga ku bandi basore mu gihe muri kumwe, akubwira ko atarabona umusore ubereye bakundana. 8.	Inshuti ze zikuziho byinshi
 Iyo umukobwa yibona mu muhungu cyane yisanga ahora amuvugaho iyo ari kumwe n’inshuti ze, nuhura n’inshuti ze ugasanga zikuziho byinshi uzamenyeko yakuganiriyeho nazo cyane. Niba wibazaga rero niba umukobwa runaka agukunda cyangwa wateganyaga gusaba urukundo ukibaza niba uzakirwa neza ibi bizagufasha kugenda utikandagira. Source: elcrema.com Yanditswe na Abraham UWIMANA/Muhabura.rw

title: Ese kuki bamwe bakundanana bakarambana, abandi bagakundana Urudashoboka?
content:
Abahanga mu by’imibanire y’abantu ndetse n’impuguke muby’ubuzima bahamya ko bitoroshye kubona igisobanuro nyacyo cy’iri jambo “Urukundo” gusa bitewe n’ahantu cyangwa igihe runaka umuntu ageze mo hagenda habaho ibisobanuro binyuranye by’Urukundo, ahanini usanga n’imico itandukanye y’ahantu bigira icyo bihindura ku gusobanura icyo Urukundo aricyo ndetse hakamenyekana n’impamvu bamwe bakundana bakarambana abandi nabo bagakundana urudashoboka cyangwa ntibarambane. Bibiliya yo Isobanura urukundo mu buryo butandukanye gusa hari igisobanuro kirimo gikomeye aho bagera bakavuga bati “Imana ni urukundo” ahandi usanga hari abemera ko mu mateko y’Imana irivuga ngo Mukundane ni ryo risumba ayandi mategeko kuko bavuga ko uramutse wakunze mugenzi wawe utatekereza ku mugirira nabi n’ibindi byinshi ugasanga rero ariho bahera bemeza ko Urukundo ari itegeko risumba ayandi imbere y’Imana. Ubusanzwe mu buzima tubano hano ku Isi umunsi ku munsi cyane twinjiye mu Isi y’Urukundo kuko nicyo Nyamukuru kuri ubu turiho usanga Abantu bakundana aha tuvuze cyane ku rukundo ruba hagati y’umukobwa n’umuhungu ruganisha kukuba babana bagakora umuryango ndetse bakabyara bakororoka nk’uko Imana yabigennye, bijya bibaho rero ko umuhungu akundana n’umukobwa bakagera no ku rwego rwo kubana gusa hari n’abakundana kubw’impamvu runaka urwabo ntirurambe gusa umugani w’abantu ndetse n’uburyo Imana yaremye isanzure burya ngo nta nkweto ijya ibura iyayo amaherezo buri wese agera aho akabona  uwo bahuza.
Kuri uyu munsi wa none ho usanga byarahindutse aho umuntu asigaye akunda mugenzi we kubera impamvu runaka, nk’amafaranga cyangwa izindi nyungu runaka aba amukurikiyeho ninayo mpamvu usigaye ubona bamwe bakundana urukundo ntirumare kabiri cyangwa ngo rurambe. Ku rundi ruhande ariko hari ikintu gikunze kubaho hano mu Rwanda by’umwihariko bitewe n’amateka yaranze igihugu cyacu aho usanga imiryango yaratatanye kuburyo hari nk’ubwo ushobora kumara imyaka myinshi warabuze umuvandimwe cyangwa abavandimwe bawe urugero nk’aba babuze mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi noneho nyuma mukazahurira nk’ahantu utazi neza ko ari n’umuvandimwe wawe nyuma ukaba wanashiduka mwakundanye kandi wenda ari n’umuvandimwe wawe
Kuri iki tuvuze haruguru bikunze kubaho ahenshi Atari no mu Rwanda usibye ko twe mu Rwanda tugira imvugo tubishyiramo ngo ni ugukunda urudashoboka iyo wakundanye n’umuntu utazi ko ari umuvandimwe wawe nyuma bikazaba ngombwa ko wisanga ari umuvandimwe wawe cyane aha bimenyekana iyo mugeze muri cya gihe cyo kubana kuko aha bisaba ko imiryango yanyu yose uko yakabaye ibasha kugaragara hanyuma rero mukanamenyana kuburyo bwimbitse. Ibyo byose rero biratuganisha ku nkuru y’ibyabayeho aho umukobwa Marine yakundanye na Jack bakagera ku munota wa nyuma umwe akamenya ko undi ari musaza w’undi n’undi ari mushiki w’undi bisanga mu rukundo rudashoboka
Ni inkuru ndende muzagezwaho mu bice bitandukanye ikazaba ikubiyemo ubutumwa bushobora kugira byinshi buhindura mu muryango Nyarwanda. Tukurarikiye kutazacikwa iyi nkuru ndende URUDASHOBOKA. Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/MUHABURA.rw

title: Ese ingano y’igitsina cy’umugabo ni ngombwa, uburyo 5 wamenya umugabo ufite agatsina gato
content:
Abantu bibaza niba ingano y’igitsinacy’umugabo ari ngombwa! Abagabo bafite igitsina gito baba baragize icyo bita Small Penis Syndrome, mu bibaranga harimo kudashaka gutinda kuri icyo kibazo, ngo abakobwa baranabakunda cyane kubera bakoresha impano cyane mu rukundo rwabo. Bakobwa namwe bagora, niba wajyaga wibaza uko wamenya aho umukunzi wawe ahagaze, dore ibintu bitanu wamumenyeraho. 5. Bene uwo muntu usanga yiyemera
Umugabo/sore ufite igitsina gito usanga yikwizaho ibintu bihenze kugira ngo abakobwa n’abagore beza bamwemere. Yumva abantu bamafata nk’umugabo uhamye n’iyo yaba Atari we. Iyi umubwiye ko afite agatsina gato ata umutwe kandi akanabihakana. 4. Bene uwo muntu agira umujinya w’umuranduranzuzi rimwe na rimwe n’ishyari
Usanga uyu muntu akunda kugira ishyari no kwikeka guhoraho. Usanga afuha cyane iyo amenye ko umukunzi we arikugira icyo avugana n’abandi bantu b’igitsinagabo. Ibi byiyongera ku mujinya mwinshi kandi ugoye kuwitararikamo 3.  Ntajya ashaka kuba ahantu bari kuvuga ku gitsinga
Uretse n’umugore we, ubundi ntaba ashaka ko hari n’umuntu w’igitsinagabo aganira ku gitsina. No mu gihe cyo kuganira n’umukunzi we ntaba yifuza ko batinda kuri ibyo bintu, ahita abitaruka bakivugira ku rukundo gusa. 2. Ahora ashaka kumvisha abantu ko ingano y’igitsina atari ngombwa
Mu rwego rwo kwihagararaho ahora asobanurira abantu ko ingano y’igitsina ntacyo imaze kandi bifite icyo bivuze. 1. Agira ubuntu imbere y’inkumi
Bene uyu muntu, ahora agenera impano ab’igitsinagore. Akabafata nk’abamikazi b’ubwongereza. Yanditswe na Lucky van Rukundo/Muhabura.rw

title: Muhungu Niba Ujya Utinya Kubwira Umukobwa Ko Umukunda  Kora ibi!
content:
Kubwira umukunzi wawe ko Umukunda ni iby’ Ingenzi cyane mu rugendo rwanyu rw’urukundo. Mbabazwa no kubona abantu batazi uburyo bwo kwereka abakunzi babo ko babakunda babicishije mu bikorwa ndetse n’ibimenyetso. 
 Ushobora kwereka ko Ukunda Umukobwa cyangwa umuhungu ko Umukunda utiriwe umujyana ahantu ngo umusabe urukundo , ndetse akaba yanarukwima kuko ntaho bigaragarira. Urukundo si amagambo ahubwo ni ibikorwa. Kandi kubivuga siko kubikora dore amwe mu mayeri wakoresha maze ukamwereka ko Umukunda byimazeyo  nkuko tubikesha  tuko  Ushobora kubinyuza mu magambo. Ubu ni uburyo rusange buri muntu wese akoresha mu kwerekana urukundo, ndetse ni nabyo udashobora gukora ngo wizereko byacamo kuko nta gahunda biba bifite. Hari aba bona nta mpamvu zo kubivuga, ariko nabwo ni bumwe mu buryo tutagomba gutesha agaciro. Amagambo meza asize Umunyu.
 Imvugo nziza nazo ziba zikenewe cyane hagati y’abashaka kujya mu rukundo, ubu kandi ni bumwe mu buryo wakoresha. Kumubwira amagambo atandukanye n’ayo wabwira abandi bimwereka ko umukunda, ayo magambo ni nka “ ndagukunda, ufite byinshi usobanura mu buzima bwange, ndagukeneye, na uri umwamikazi w’umutima wange. Utuzina tw’urukundo.
 Kugira ngo umwereke ko ari umwihariko ugomba kumwita amazina afite aho ahuriye n’urukundo, kwita umukunzi wawe  aya mazina bituma amenya ko umukunda “ Sweet heart, Mutima, cher. Chuchu, wange nkunda” byerekana uburyo umwitaho kurusha abandi. Kumukora ku mubiri we. Ubu ni uburyo bwiza cyane buri wese yakabaye akoresha, mu byukuri ntushobora gukora ku muntu utishimira niyo mwaba muri kumwe wirinda ko mwegerana ndetse mukaba mwanahuza imibiri, ari uwo ukunda ntumenya igihe wamukoreyeho.  Ushobora kumufata ukuboko,ikiganza ndetse n’ahandi bikamwereka ko Umwishimiye cyane. Kumuha Agaciro ndetse ukamwitaho cyane. Guha umuntu agaciro birorshye pe gusa ntushobora kubikorera umuntu usanzwe ,uwari we wese, ahubwo ubikorera uwo wishimira gusa. Ibyombijyana no kumwubaha, kumwitaho, kugira uburyo umwitwaraho ndetse ukabikorana urukundo.
Kumuha Impano. Niba ufite uwo wihebeye ntumuhe impano biragoye kumenya ko umukunda kuri we, abantu batanga impano mu buryo butandukanye,ariko murukundo impano iba ifite icyo isobanura. Igihe uhaye impano umukunzi wawe bimufasha kumenya ko umwitayeho kuko utaba wabikoreye abandi. Bavandi hari n’ibindi byinshi ariko ibi nibyo by’ingenzi. Yanditswe na Ukurikiyemfura leonce/MUHABURA.RW

title: Menya  impamvu abagore bakunda abagabo cyangwa abasore bakuze
content:
Bamwe mu bagore usanga bashimishwa no kwikundira abasore bakuze cyangwa abagabo aho gukunda abasore bari mu kigero kimwe. Aba bagabo ngo baba bafite umwihariko abasore bakiri bato benshi badakunze kuba bafite nk’uko bitangazwa na elcrema. Bazi gufata abagore neza kuruta abakiri bato Imwe mu mpamvu ituma abagabo bakuze bakundwa n’abagore kuruta abakiri bato, ngo ni uko bamenya kwita ku bagore cyane kurusha abakiri bato. Kubera kumara igihe kinini ngo baba barahuye n’abakobwa benshi igihe cyo gufata umwanzuro rero ngo uwo ahisemo amwitaho. Bemera umugore uko ari Mu gihe abagabo bakiri bato akenshi bashimishwa n’umugore usa neza cyangwa ufite uburanga burangarirwa n’abandi, ngo si ko biri ku bagabo bakuze kuko bo ngo bita ku kiri mu mugore kandi ngo bazi kwihanganira intege nke ze. Abagore bakunda abagabo bifite
 Abagore benshi bakunda abagabo bafite amikoro usanga akenshi kandi aba bagabo baba baramaze kugira imitungo yabo mu gihe abagabo bakiri bato akenshi aribwo baba batangiye kuyishaka batarafatisha ubuzima.
Akenshi baba bakuze mu bitekerezo Abagore ngo babangamirwa no kubana n’umugabo udafite ibitekerezo bireba kure nyamara ngo usanga akenshi abagabo bakuze baba berekeje ibitekerezo byabo ku mishinga y’ejo hazaza ngo bigatuma benshi mu bagore bishimira kuba bakunda bene aba bagabo. Abagabo bakuze ntibajya bapfusha igihe cyabo ubusa Kuba aba bagabo batajya bagira ubwoba bwo kuvuga ikibarimo ngo bitandukanye n’abasore bakiri bato kuko ngo niba ashaka ko mukundana nk’inshuti zisanzwe arabikubwira cyangwa akakubwira niba ashaka ko mwazabana mu gihe ngo abasore bakiri bato usanga hari ubwo bahuzagurika mu gufata ibyemezo. Ntabwo baba bakita ku byahise Mu gihe abasore bakiri bato usanga hari aho baba bagitekereza ku bakobwa bahuye mbere ngo abasore bakuze ntago uyu mwanya bawugira kuko ngo ibitekerezo byabo biba byararenze kuri iyi mitekerereze ahubwo ngo bashimishwa n’abo bari kumwe kandi bagashishikazwa no kubitaho.


Abagabo bakuze ntibajya bapfusha igihe cyabo ubusa photo internet Yanditswe na Niyomugabo/Muhabura.rw

title: Dore Ibanga wakoresha kugira ngo ushimishe umukunzi wawe
content:
Buri mugabo ibyo akenera kugira ngo yishime bitandukanye cyane n’ibyo undi mugabo runaka ashobora gukenera. Umugabo aba akeneye gushimishwa n’umukunzi we mu buryo bwinshi butandukanye utitaye ku myaka ye, ubwoko bwe, urwego abarirwamo cyangwa imbamutima. Mugore cyangwa mukobwa dore ibanga riri mu bintu bitanu by’ingenzi wakorera umukunzi wawe bikamunyura umutima ibihe byose, mwaba muri kumwe cyangwa mutari kumwe. Dore ibyo bintu 5 wakora ukamera nk’umutwaye umutima: 1.	Kumuha icyubahiro:
 Icyubahiro ni kimwe mu ntwaro z’urukundo umuntu ashobora gutsindisha uwo bari kumwe akamwiyegurira ubuziraherezo. Umugabo wese aba ateze icyubahiro ku mugore we, nubwo waba utamukunda akeneye ko wamwubaha ukamuha icyubahiro cye ibihe byose. Icyubahiro ugabo aba agukeneyeho nuko wamuha agaciro ndetse ako gaciro umuhaye ukamenya ko hari icyo kavuze. Numukorera bino uzaba umwiyeguriye bihoraho. 2.	Kumushimira ku byo agukorera Ugushimirwa ni irindi reme ry’urukundo kandi umugabo wese aba akeneye mu rukundo rwanyu. Abagabo bakunda gushimirwa kuko biranakwiye, ari nawe ntiwakishimira ko wakora akazi udashimwa wageraho ukakareka ugashaka uburyo wabona akandi kakunyuze kandi kagushimisha. Gushimira umukunzi wawe ntako bisa kuko bimwereka ko ibyo agukorera nawe bigushimisha ataba ameze nk’umuntu ucurangira abahetsi.
Azakomeza agukunde mu gihe uzajya unyurwa n’urukundo aguha ubundi ukamushimira. 3.	Kumuhora hafi Birazwi cyane ko abagabo benshi baba bashaka gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina cyane kurusha ibindi, ariko ngo ibyo sibyo by’ingenzi byatuma yishima cyane. Ahubwo aba akeneye ko wamuhora iruhande umwitahomuu buryo butandukanye kuko ngo bimugusha neza kurusha uko yakarinze kubikwibwirira. Buri mugabo akunda ko umukunzi we yamuba hafi amukorakora ahantu hose hashoboka kuko biramunezeza cyane bigatuma yumva ameze nk’aho ari mu ijuru rya kabiri. Ibi nubikora uzaba umwigaruriye bihoraho. 4.	Kutamuhemukira Ubudahemuka ni ikintu cy’ingenzi mu rukundo kuko ngo umutima mwiza ari udahemuka kandi uwiteka ngo aranawishimira. Umukunzi wawe ntiyifuza ko waba umuhemu kuri we ubundi warangiza ntubimubwire, dore ibanga wakoresha nuko udashobora kumuca inyuma ngo uryamane n’undi mugabo atari we. Urukundo rutagira ubuhemu n’umutima w’uburyarya ruba ari urrukundo rukomeye cyane, ntirushobora gusenyuka nubwo habaho irengayobora. 5.	Kutiyitaho ngo wibagirwe umukunzi wawe Abagabo benshi bakunze gushimishwa n’utuntu tudafatika, niyo mpamvu gushimish umugabo atari ibintu bigoranye cyane. Ikintu gikurura umugabo ntabwo kigoranye kandi iyo uharaniye kwishimisha we ukamwihorera ntabwo bimushimisha habe na gato. Haranira kuba ibyishimo by’umukunzi wawe, kuko nawe azagerageza uko ashoboye byose abe uwo gushimisha umukunzi wawe. Ayo yari amabanga atanu wamenera umukunzi wawe akishima cyane, akava mu bye akagukunda ubuziraherezo, ubundi mukibanira akaramata mu buzima bwanyu bwose. Yanditswe na Bizimana Jean Damascene/Muhabura.rw

title: Mugore nawe mukobwa wikomeza kwibeshya ku nzarati
content:
Inzaratsi ni iturufu baruryi(ABAPFUMU) bakunze kwifashisha mu kurya ingo n’inkundo za bankomwa hato ugasanga umugore arashutswe ngo tanga ibi umutima w’umugabo wawe tuwukugabize  ajye atekereza wowe gusa. Nyamara hari ibintu byoroshye wakorera umgabo wawe cyangwa umukunzi wawe ukitwa umubitsi w’umunezero we.  Muhabura.rw twabashakiye muri byo 9 by’ingenzi.
    1.BANZA WEMERERE UMUGABO WAWE KO ARI UW’AGACIRO KURI WOWE.
 Burya umugabo uzabona abyuka ijoro ajya guhaha cyangwa kurinda umutekano w’urugo,wibaze ko wenda biza gutyo gusa! Oya! Ahubwo buriya umugabo aremanye ubudahangarwa muri we kandi yumva ari nako yagaragara mu muryango,wowe rero nkumugore we gerageza umwereke ko ubizi, kandi ko ntawundi nkawe.  2. MUGORE SHIMIRA UMUGABO WAWE. Ntabwo ari ngombwa ko umugabo wawe azamuKA impinge cyangwa ngo akugenere ibya Mirenge wo ku Ntenyo ngo akunde abone ishimwe. Kandi singombwa ishimwe riboneshwa amaso ku mugabo.ahubwo mugore gerageza kweraka umugabo wawe ko icyuya cye ukibona mu ishimwe ryaba rito cyangwa rinini,kuko burya umugabo ntajya yifuza ibyo atakoreye ariko nanone icyo akoze niyo cyaba gito mu bushobozi afite yumva yagishimirwa.mugore rero gerageza gushimira umugabo wawe.    3.MUHE URUKUNDO N’UMUNEZERO. Nubwo abagore bakunze kwibeshya ko urukundo rw’umugabo ruboneka mu minsi ye yambere bakimenyana,burya baba bishuka kuko umugabo ahorana urukundo ahubwo uko ishingano ze zigenda ziyongera  niko agenda agira guhuga kuburyo arushaho gukenera kwitabwaho no gukundwa.kuburyo iyo abibonye arushaho kumva ko ishingano zitaruta umukunzi we. Wowe rero nkumugore icyo usabwa ni uguhoza umugabo wawe mu ntekerezo umuha urukundo kandi ugerageza no kumwitaho,kuko bimugarura mu rukundo bikanamwibagiza uburure bw’umunaniro.   4. MUGORE EREKA UMUGABO WAWE ICYUBAHIRO.
 Burya umugabo ni ikiremwa kiremanye kamer y’igitinyiro n’icyubahiro.umugore rero burya ishingano ze ni ukurinda icyubahiro n’igitinyiro by’umugabo we,umugabo nawe akamenya gutetesha umugore we ko ari inshingano ze.mugore rero numenya icyubahiro cy’umugabo wawe ukakimurindira ntuzatangazwe no kukugira umurinzi w’umunezero we.   5.MUGORE TEGURIRA UMAGABO WAWE IFUNGURO.
 Umugabo akunda ifunguro riteguye neza,iyo agukunda rero yumva yanafungura ibyateguwe nawe.nawe rero nk’umugore zirikana ako kantu ukagire ibanga ryawe.    6.MUBERE UMUFANA UKOMEYE.
 Umugabo burya akunze kugera ku musaruro uwariwo wose yiyushye akuya,mugore rero wowe icyo usabwa cyonyine ni ukumwereka ko icyuya cye ukibona,mufane ku musaruro we muke cyangwa mwishi uturutse kubushobozi afite mwereke ko yakoze,ba umuterankunga we wambere.    7.MUGORE TANDUKANA NO NKWISHYIRA IMBERE. Nikoko ibyiza biraryoha ariko burya umugabo ntaremanye kamere yo kwikunda bityo rero nawe ntiyifuza kukubona muri iyo ndorerwamo,ahubwo ibanga icishe bugufi azakwizamurira numwereka ko ariwe ushyize imbere.  8. MUGORE BA UMUNYAKURI.
  Ni koko ukuri guca mu ziko ntigushye uwo ni umugani,nyamara umugabo nawe burya ntakunda umuntu umubeshya,mugore rero ukuri ni iturufu ikomeye yagufasha kwigarurira umunezero n’amarangamutima by’umugabo wawe.  9. HITAMO UBURYO BWIZA BWO KUVUGISHA UMUGABO WAWE.
 Umugabo wawe gerageza kumurinda imvugo mbi,nk’ibitutsi,incyuro n’ibindi. Nibyo nta zibana zidakomanya amahembe. Ariko niba habayeho gusubiranamo n’umugabo wawe irinde imvugo zeruye nk’ibitutsi,incyuro no kumwibutsa intege nke ze kuko kamere ya kigabo ibi byose ibizira kubi. Ngayo nguko abafite amaso ntibabwirizwa kureba abafite amatwi ni mwumve ibi tubikesha urubuga Rolling ston. Yanditswe na J.de Dieu Ntakirutimana/Muhabura.rw

title: Abahungu benshi bibaza impamvu abakobwa batabakunda! Dore bimwe  wakora kugirango ugire igikundiro
content:
Abahungu benshi bibaza impamvu abakobwa batabakunda cyangwa ngo babirukeho, nyamara hari abandi usanga inkumi zibirukaho ndetse bafite igikundiro cyane kuburyo byifuzwa na buri wese. Dore bimwe mubyo wakora kugirango ugire igikundiro Kwambara neza Niba ushaka ko abakobwa bagukunda gerageza kwambara neza no guhora ukeye ahantu hose, kuko abakobwa benshi bakunda umuhungu wambara neza kandi akanabigendera. Abakobwa bakunda abahungu biyubaha
Kwiyubaha
 Niba utiyubaha ntabwo abakobwa bashobora kugukunda kabone n’ iyo waba wambara neza bingana gute, kuko bakunda umuhungu wiyubaha utavuga ibigambo byinshi cyangwa ngo akore ibikorwa bigayitse mu bantu. Gukunda akazi Abakobwa bose ntibakunda umuhungu udakora kuko bavuga ko ntacyo ashobora kukumarira nawe ubwe nta gitekerezo afite cyo kwiteza imbere, nibwo usanga abahungu birirwa mu rugo ntakazi basuzugurwa cyane, n’ iyo yaba afite uburanga ugasanga ntagikundiro cy’ abakobwa agira. Kutajarajara Abakobwa benshi banga umuhungu ujarajara mu bakobwa ndetse bakanavuga ko ari indaya kuko abakobwa bose abageraho abasaba urukundo. Iyo rero wirinze ibi bituma ugira igikundiro ku bakobwa kuko baba babona uzi ibyo ukora kandi udakina mu rukundo. Kutiyemera Abakobwa bakunda umuhungu uvugisha ukuri utiyemera mu bikorwa cyangwa mu mivugire ye. Iyo rero izi ngeso umuhungu atazigira bituma abakobwa bamukunda cyane ndetse bakanabimwereka kuko baba bumva ko ari inyangamugayo mu rukundo. Kudahubuka Umuhungu utajya uhubuka cyangwa ngo ahuzagurike mubyo akora bimutera kugira igikundiro aho ari hose, kuko abakobwa bose baba bamwifuza ko yababera inshuti, kandi koko nibyo usanga umuhungu udahuzagurika ntawe utamwifuza. Yanditswe na Niyomugabo/Muhabura.rw

title: Amakosa 9 Wakirinda Gukorera Umukunzi Wawe
content:
Urukundo ni ikintu gikomeye cyane hagati y’abakundana. Iyo utagize ukora ngo urukundo rwanyu rukomeze gukomera ntirushobora gukomera habe na mba. Ariko ushobora gutuma rukomera mu gihe wabashije kwirinda amwe mu makosa akunda gukorwa mu rukundo.
 Aya ni amakosa 9 akomeye cyane ushobora kwirinda mu rukundo:
 1.	Kudaha agaciro urukundo Buri wese akunda agaciro mu buzima busanzwe, noneho iyo ari umuntu ukunda ukamuha agaciro biramushimisha cyane, biba ntako bisa kuri we. Kudaha agaciro umukunzi wawe bishobora gutuama umubano n’urukundo ufitanye n’umukunzi wawe bicyendera, ugashiduka nta rukundo rukiri muri mwe. Guha agaciro uwo mukundana bimwereka ko umwitayeho kandi nawe bikamwongerera kugukunda cyane. Wikihugisha cyane nta kintu kiguhugije ngo uburire umwanya umukunzi wawe. 2.	Gufata imyanzuro uhubutse
 Iri ni irindi kosa rikomeye cyane mu rukundo hagati y’abakundana rikunze gutuma habaho intongana n’imirano itarangira mu ngo. Gufata imyanzuro uhubutse ntago ari byiza kuko bituma urukundo rwanyu rudashobora kuramba. Ikiza cyatuma urukundo rwanyu rubasha gutera imbere nuko mwajya mufatira hamwe umwanzuro. Ibi byatuma hahoraho ibiganiro mpaka hagati yanyu, bigatuma hahora impaka za ngo turwane za buri gihe mu rugo. 3.	Indwano zitari ngomwa Kumenya gucunga umujinya wawe nti iby’agaciro. Ni ibintu bitangaje kumva ko imirwan yabura hagati y’abakundana cyangwa se abarushinze. Abakundana bo bakunze kurwana nta n’ikintu kigaragara bapfuye, akenshi ari ubusa bapfuye. Ntago ari byiza rero ko mu ngo hahora mo imirwano kuko ntago ari myiza ishobora gutuma uwo mwashakanye mutandukana kuko ntakwihanganira umujinya wawe utabasha kugenzura. 4.	Kwihagararaho uri mu makosa
 Twese dufite uburyo twihagararaho mu bintu bitandukanye, ariko kwihagararaho mu gihe uri mu makosa ntabwo ari byiza kuko akenshi bikunze gutuma habaho ugutandukanye kw’abashakanye cyangwa kw’abakundana.
Kwihagararaho akenshi bikunze guterwa n’umujinya, urwango, kwikunda, nibindi bitandukanye. Genzura umujinya wawe ndetse n’amakosa yawe kuko bishobora kugukururira gushwana n’umukunzi wawe mu buryo butari buteganyijwe. 5.	Kutanyurwa n’urukundo Urukundo rugira byinshi akenshi ushobora no kurugira imbamutima yawe. Iyo utanyuzwe n’urukundo rw’umukunzi wawe n’umukunzi wawe nawe ntago aba akunyuze. Kutanyurwa n’urukundo aguha akensi biramubabaza cyane kuko ntago aba yiyumvisha uburyo mwakomeza gukundana utanyuzwe n’urukundo agukunda. Ibi bituma habaho ugutandukana kw’abakundana kuko baba batishimiranye. 6.	Kugerageza kwiharira ubuyobizi
 Mu rukundo iki ni ikintu kibi cyane kugerageza kwiharira ubuyobozi mu rugo, gushaka kwereka umukunzi wawe ko umurusha uruhare runini kuri wowe, kurusha uko mwafatanya ngo mujye mwumvikana muri byose bituma urukundo rwanyu rugenda ruzamo ibitotsi. Ni byiza guhuza n’umukunzi wawe kuko birushaho gukomeza urukundo rwanyu. Kumvikana ni intwaro ikomeye cyane mu rukundo rwanyu, kuko niyo yonyine yagira aho ibavana n’aho ibageza. 7.	Kutanyurwa Gushima ibyo umukunzi wawe agukorera ni ikintu cy’ibanze mu rukundo kuko bituma urukundo rwanyu rugira aho rugera. Iyo umukunzi wawe ugerageje kumuha umwanya ndetse ugaha n’agaciro ibyo akubwiye bituma nawe abasha kwishimira umubano wanyu. Urkundo ni ikintu gikomeye cyane hagti y’abakundana. Bityo biba byiza iyo nibura unyuzwe n’urukundo aguha kandi ukagerageza kumwereka ko byagushimishije kandi ukabimubwira  ko byaguhimishije kuko nawe bituma agerageza kwigirira icyizere cy’ibyo agukorera. Ha agaciro umukunzi wawe ndetse ugahe n’urukundo aguhakuko bizatuma mubasha kugira aho mugera mu iterambere ry’urukundo rwanyu. 8.	Guca inyuma uwo mwashakanye
 Ni kenshi wumva ibi, ngo abashakanye cyangwa abakundana bacanye inyuma. Ibi rero ntabwo ari byiza mu rukundo habe na gato kuko bituma ugira iraha cyangwa ubuhehesi buhoraho. Uretse ibyo kandi nta nubwo uwo mwarushinganye abyemera; kuko akenshibishobora guhita bimutera kumva ko we nta gaciro cyangwa urukundo umufitiye, agahera aho yishakira ubundi buryo yakibonera uwamwishimira. Kumuca inyuma bituma abona ko ntacyo avuze imbere yawe bityo bigatuma akubonamo umwanzi we, ari nabyo akenshi bibyara ugutandukana kwa hato na hato. 9.	Kutumva umukunzi wawe
 Umbano ni ikintu cyiza cyane hagati y’abakundana, kandi biba ari umunezero udasanzwe iyo uri kereka ko uwo mukundana umwumva kuko bituma abona ko uwitayeho.  Kumva ibitekerezo by’uwo mwashakanye bituma abasha kubona ko muri gutahiriza uugozi umwe, bityo bizatuma abasha kwirekura mu bitekerezo agerageze akubwire icyatuma urukundo rwanyu runabasha gutera imbere ndetse  n’iterambere ryo mu buzima busanzwe. Mugore cyangwa mugabo, musore na we mukobwa ayo ni amwe mu makossa uzagerageza kwirinda gukora mu gihe ushaka ko urukudo rwanyu rutera imbere mukibanira akaramata n’ubuzira herezo. Yanditswe na Bizimana Jean Damascene/Muhabura.rw

title: Inzira 9 zatuma ubushuti ufitanye n’umuntu burushaho gukomeza
content:
Inzira 9 zatuma ubushuti ufitanye n’umuntu burushaho gukomeza
Ni byiza kubaka ubushuti bukomeye mu buzima n’abantu wihitiyemo, ariko ntibikunze kubaho kunshuti zose cyangwa nyinshi muzo waba ufite kubaka ubushuti bukomeye.
Ubushuti bwinshi abantu bagirana bugenda burangira nyuma nyuma y’igihe runaka, ariko hari ibintu bituma ubwo bushuti burushako gukomera no gukomeza kubaho, nubwo hashobora gushira imyaka cyangwa hagacaho igihe kirekire mwaratandukanye.
 Ni gute ushobora gutuma ubushuti ufitanye n’inshuti yawe burushaho gukomera cyane? Dore inzira 9 zatuma ubushuti buramba ufitanye n’inshuti yawe:
 1.	Guhitamo inshuti nziza Mbere yuko utekereza kuba wagira ubushuti bwiza n’abandi ugomba guhitamo inshuti nziza mu buzima mbere na mbere. Ni gute wamenya inshuti nziza? Ubushuti bwiza ni igihe uzaba wahisemo inshuti ushobora kwizera muri byose, abantu mushobora gusangira akabisi n’agahiye, abantu wumva iyo hari ikintu bakubwiye kandi nabo bakumva mu buzima iyo ubabwiye ibyawe byose. Kugira ubushuti bwiza ni ikintu cyiza kandi cy’ingenzi mu buzima. 2.	Kuba mushobora kunga ubushuti bwanyu Igihe kirekire inshuti nziza zigira ugushwano kutumvikana mu buzima, ariko kuba mushobora kongera mu kiyunga ubushuti bwanyu bugakomeza kubaho ni ikintu cy’ingenzi cyane. Kumvana mukanabasha gusabana imbabazi mukongera mukiyunga ni byiza kuko bituma ubushuti bwanyu burushaho kuramba. Ubushuti bwiza bwubakirwa kuri ibyo. 3.	Gushimira inshuti yawe
 Ba umuntu ushobora kwereka ko wishiiye cyangwa wanyuzwe n’ibyo inshuti yawe yagukoreye, kandi ugerageze kuyiba hafi mu gihe ikwiyambaje. Ijambo murakoze cyangwa izindi nzira zose wakoresha kugira ngo ubushuti bwanyu bubahe kuramba. Ibi bintu ni byo wakora kugira ngo ubushuti bwanyu burusheho kuramba ubuziraherezo. 4.	Kugira ubushuti butagira aho bubogamiye Ubushuti butagize aho bubogamiye ni ingenzi kandi ni bwiza cyane. Inshuti zidafite aho zibogamiye kandi zitikunda zumvana zifashanya muri byose. Inshuti nk’iyo ntitekereza inyungu zayo gusa ahubwo inakora ngo iharanire inyungu za bagenzi be. Izi nshuti zifashanya muri byose kandi ibihe byose ni zo nshuti wagakwiye gutekereza kugira mu buzima bwanyu kuko ubushuti bwanyu buzaramba bukanarushaho gukomera. 5.	Kutagira ishyari Ishyari ntabwo ari ryiza ku bushuti bwanyu habe na gato. Iyo ufite ishyari ry’ibyo inshuti yawe igeraho mu buzima, ntabwo ubwo bushuti bwanyu mwaba mufitanye bwazaramba ahubwo buhora ari bwa bundi buhoramo intonganya n’amakimbirane atarangira n’urwangano. Inshuti nziza ni izishimira ibyiza mugenzi we cyangwa bagenzi be bagezeho kandi igahora iharanira ko yagezaho ibyiza n’udushya kuri mugenzi wayo ndetse n’abandi muri rusange. 6.	Kugira itumanaho hagati yanyu Kugira ubushuti burambye ni ikintu cyiza cyane kandi gishimisha uwari we wese. Ubushuti bwanyu ntago bwaramba mu gihe nta kuganira kuri muri mwe ngo mwungurane ibitekerezo munabazanye amakuru. Gerageza ushake uburyo bwose wakoresha kugira ngo uganirize inshuti zawe mwunngurana inama n’ibitekerezo byo mu buzima busanzwe, bagasangira buri kimwe cyose kandi bakanaharanira inyungu za buri umwe. 7.	Guharanira inyungu za buri wese Iyi ishobora kuba intego nziza mu buzima kuko iyo ubushuti ari ubufashanya buba ari buharanira inyungu za buri wese. Gufashanya muri byose ni intwaro nziza mu buzima kuko ituma ubushuti bwanyuburushaho kuramba ndetse ubuziraherezo. Byagakwiye kuba intego yawe guharanira inyungu za mugenzi wawe kuko byubaka ubushuti bukomeye cyane. 8.	Gukunda inshuti zawe ukazikundira uko ziri

Kwemera ishuti zawe no kuzikundira uko ziri birushaho kuba byiza. Inshuti ntabwo ari ikwiyemeraho cyangwa ngo ikwereke ko hari aho mutandukaniye. Inshuti nziza ni izizakubahira uko umeze kandi zikanakubahisha mu bandi. Ni inshuti idapfobya ibyo wahisemo ngo ishake kubita hasi kwereka ko ntacyo bivuze, ahubwo ikakungura inama n’igitekerezo cy’uburyo byabasha kugerwaho. Icyo gihe uzaba wahisemo inshuti nziza. 9.	Kugira urukundo Gerageza gufata inshuti zawe uko ushaka ko zabaho kandi uziheshe agaciro mu rugaga rw’abantu benshi, ujye ukunda abantu cyane cyane inshuti zawe nkuko wikunda. Gufashanya muri byose no kugira umutima utabara ni iby’igiciro, kandi bituma inshuti zawe zihora zikubaha zikanakubahisha no mu bandi. Umutima mwiza ni umutima ufashanya muri byose, umutima wumva bagenzi babo, ukagira inama buri umwe umwe mu nshuti ze ndetse n’izindi nshuti zo ku ruhande zihariye. Ubushuti ni ikintu gikomeye kandi cy’ingenzi iyo kibungabunzwe uko byagakwiye kugenda. Izo zari inzira icyenda wakora kugira ngo urukundo n’ubushuti ufitanye na bagenzi bawe burusheho gukomera no kugira ubuzima burambye. Yanditswe na Bizimana Jean Damascene/Muhabura.rw

title: Dore Amafuti 5 Inkumi zikora ngo abasore bihutishe ubukwe
content:
Umukobwa n’umuhungu bakundana ndetse bamaranye igihe kinini mu rukundo,maze umukobwa yabona umusore bakundana nta gahunda y’ubukwe amubwira ya vuba kandi we akeneye umugabo,agakora ibishoboka byose ngo ubukwe butahe,ariko nyamara usanga biteza ibibazo birimo kubengwa,kubarisha nabi umusore,ubukene nyuma y’ubukwe n’ibindi kuko biba bitarateguwe neza cyangwa bisa no guhatiriza.
 1.Kuryamana : Hari ubwo umukobwa aba amaze igihe kinini akundana n’umusore ariko bararyamana,maze yabona atamubwira ubukwe vuba agahitamo kuryamana na we kandi kenshi gashoboka yibwira ko aribwo buryo bwo kumwereka urukundo,maze bikaba aribyo bizatuma afata umwanzuro wa vuba.Nyamara akenshi usanga bibeshya kuko hari nubwo batabana. 2. kwiteza inda : umubare munini w’abakobwa usanga biteza inda ku basore bakundana ngo nibwo bazahita bafata umwanzuro wo kubashyira mu rugo,ariko abenshi ntibibahira kuko hari nubwo barinda babyarira iwabo nta bukwe bubaye. 3. kuvuga ubukwe cyane : usanga kandi abakobwa benshi bibeshya ubukwe n’abasore bakundana,bakabibwira abantu bose b’incuti n’imiryango kandi ntacyo umuhungu aramubwira.Ibi nabyo abenshi babikora mu rwego rwo kugira ngo umusore niyumva abantu bamaze kumenya ibayabo ndetse bamubaza ubukwe,ngo azahita afata umwanzuro avuge igihe cy’ubukwe,ariko icyo sicyo cyatuma umuhungu afata umwanzuro atateguye. 4. Kurata ubukire :  hari abandi bakobwa usanga baziko abahungu bakunda ubutunzi,maze bakajya biyemera amafaranga n’imitungo badafite,kugira ngo barebe ko umuhungu yakwemera ubukwe mu gihe cya vuba byaba ngombwa akaniyemeza kuzikorera ubukwe mu mafaranga ye.Ibi umusore ashobora kubyemera ndetse ubukwe bukaba,ariko asanze ya mitungo ntayo afite cyangwa ubukene buaza mu rugo niho hava ya mibanire mibi bitewe no gukora ubukwe bwihuse. 5. Guhindura idini :  Hari ubwo umukobwa aba akundana n’umusore,badahuje idini n’imyemerere ariko kuko ashaka ko bakora ubukwe agahita ahindura idini nta n’ubwumvikane yibwira ko byatuma ahita afata umwanzuro vuba rimwe na rimwe bagatandukana nta bukwe buraba,umukobwa agasubira mu idini yahozemo.
Ibi ni bimwe mu by’abakobwa bakora iyo bakundanye n’abasore igihe kirekire bakabona nta gahunda y’ubukwe ya vuba kandi bo babukeneye,maze bagatangira gushaka uburyo bafata umwanzuro,kandi akenshi ntibibahire bwanaba nyuma yahoo hakazaba ingaruka.Ikiruta ibi byose nukuganira n’umusore mukundana ukamubwira ko ushaka ubukwe,hanyuma mukagira uko mwitegura ndetse kakubwira ighe yumva yaba yiteguye neza kandi nawe ukamutegereza,niba umukunda koko.



Yanditswe na Niyomugabo/Muhabura.rw

title: Amagambo 11 Wabwira Umukunzi Wawe Akamunyura Umutima
content:
Urukundo ni nk’ubugenge. Gukunda nawe ugakundwa ntako bisa, kandi ni ikintu cyiza cyane gishobora kuba ku muntu uwariwe wese.
Aya magambo benshi dukunze kwita imitoma ashobora gushimisha umutima w’umukunzi wawe kandi bikanatuma arushaho kugukunda cyane, byimazeyo.
 Dore amagambo wabwira umukunzi wawe akarushaho kugukunda byanyabyo:
 1.	Urukundo ni inzira ebyiri zidahinduka umuntu ashobora kugendamo nta kibazo; ibi wabibwira umukunzi wawe ushaka kumwumvisha ko ari inzira yawe ugendamo kandi ikuyobora ahantu hose unyuze. 2.	Wankunze rimwe ariko njye igihe cyose nkurebye ndushaho ku gukunda ibihe byose. 3.	Ushaka gusobanukirwa impamvu nkukunda n’icyo nkukundira byantwara amajoro yose, ushaka kumubwira ko umukunda byimazeyo. 4.	Nishimira kuba ndi kumwe nawe, kuvugana nawe ni iby’igiciro cyinshi kandi mba numva wanyigumira iruhande ibihe byose. 5.	Igihe uzumva uri wenyine, ujye ureba iruhande rwawe mba ndi kumwe nawe aho intoki zawe ziba zigukumbuye 6.	Ndagukunda kandi mba numva ntifuza kuba ntakubura iruhande rwanye kuko ubuzima bwanjye bushingiye kuri wowe rukundo rwanjye 7.	Igihe nakubonye narimfite ubwoba bwo kuba nahura nawe. Mpuye nawe ngira ubwoba bwo kuba nagusoma, nkusomye ndumva ngize ubwoba bwo kukubwira ko nkukunda. Ariko ubu kuko nkukunda ukaba ari byose byanjye, nkubuze nasara. 8.	Uri akabavu ko mu mbavu zanjye kandi uri akara ko mu mara yanjye. Iyo nkubuze nta mutekano ngira muri njyewe, mba numva nahungabanye. 9.	Naguhaye ikibanza mu mutima wanjye kitavogerwa n’uwariwe wese, kuko nifuje kugituzamo wowe wenyine. 10.	Muri iyi si ya rurema uri umuntu w’agaciro mba numva nshaka gohora mbona imbere yanjye, simba nifuza kukubura iruhande rwanjye kuko undutira bose. 11.	Kugukunda nta gihombo kirimo kandi niyo utankunda nzakomeza nkukunde kuko kugukunda nawe bigize intego y’ubuzima bwanjye.



Yanditswe na Bizimana Jean Damascene/Muhabura.rw

title: Mbigenze nte! ngo mwibagirwe nubwo yantanye abana
content:
Muraho bakunzi ba MUHABURA.RW.
 Nanjye ndashaka kubagisha inama ku kibazo mfite kinkomereye. Natandukanye n’umugore wanjye tumaze igihe kitari kinini dushakanye  , dufitanye abana babiri, njye mfite imyaka 30. Tumaze imyaka ibiri dutandukanye, kandi mu gutandukana kwacu byatewe n’uwahoze arinshutiye nta ramushaka   akaba nawe yaratandukanye n’umugore we kubera ko yamucaga inyuma, ubu bakaba birirwana ahantu hose bigaragara ko batakihishira.
